Mes01-mlesystem-001.Content: System Information: Greetings. Meryl has been disconnected, your message was not delivered.

Mes02-mleplayer-005.Content: It really is a little complicated.

Mes02-mlesystem-001.Content: System Information: We are sorry to report that Meryl is currently refusing to communicate with anyone. As a result, your message has not been transmitted. Thank you for your understanding.

Mes03-mlesystem-001.Content: Astra Shelter Alert: High readings of radiation today. Avoid outdoor activities, and try to remain within the safe areas of the shelter.

Mes03-mleplayer-001.Content: Yes... The radiation readings are little high.

Mes03-mleplayer-003.Content: I suppose it must be the effect of Omnium.

Mes03-mleplayer-004.Content: They say it got worse after the Cataclysm.

Mes03-mleplayer-006.Content: I can't begin to guess what the world would be like...

Mes03-mleplayer-008.Content: With you onboard, I'll have to work even harder!

Mes03-mlesystem-002.Content: System Information: We apologize for the inconvenience, the communication is temporarily interrupted due to radiation. Message delivery failed. Please try again later.

Mes04-mleplayer-003.Content: I like how reliable you are!

Mes04-mleplayer-004.Content: There'll be more to do tomorrow.

Mes04-mleplayer-005.Content: Are you used to this sort of life now?

Mes04-mleplayer-007.Content: There have been so many missions lately...

Mes04-mleplayer-008.Content: You've gotta be tired, Meryl, working all this time...

Mes04-mleplayer-009.Content: I'll send it to you now.

Mes04-mleplayer-010.Content: I'll share the mission info with you in a minute.

Mes04-mlesystem-001.Content: System Information: Hello. The other party has set their status as Away, and might not respond to your messages immediately. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Mes05-mleplayer-010.Content: Well, there are some errors, after all.

Mes05-mle-005.Content: The sword's power will be affected.

Mes05-mleplayer-012.Content: I'll try my best to correct myself.

Mes06-mle-001.Content: Why are you being so impetuous recently?

Mes06-mleplayer-006.Content: No. I'm just a little down.

Mes06-mleplayer-010.Content: Seems like I've hit the bottleneck.

Mes06-mle-005.Content: Is there anything I can do?

Mes06-mleplayer-012.Content: I'm happy as long as you're around, Meryl.

Mes06-mleplayer-013.Content: I hope you're always with me.

Mes06-mleplayer-015.Content: I just need to pull myself together.

Mes06-mleplayer-016.Content: Alright, let's finish off what's on our plates first.

Mes07-mle-001.Content: The recent missions have been a lot harder...

Mes07-mleplayer-001.Content: It'll be fine with you on our side, Meryl.

Mes07-mleplayer-002.Content: It's fine. Your power's been growing recently.

Mes07-mleplayer-004.Content: The missions will be a breeze.

Mes07-mleplayer-005.Content: If you're still worried, I can enhance you further.

Mes07-mleplayer-007.Content: Ever since you were enhanced, Meryl, my combat strength has shot up.

Mes07-mleplayer-008.Content: With you by my side, we can tackle anything.

Mes07-mleplayer-0010.Content: Don't think about that. Come check out these enhancement materials.

Mes07-mleplayer-0011.Content: Which materials do you want to enhance yourself?

Mes07-mleplayer-016.Content: I think I may have gotten carried away...

Mes07-mleplayer-017.Content: How could I have hurt you like this, Meryl...

Mes07-mlesystem-002.Content: System Information: We regret to inform you that the other party is offline, so your message will not be delivered.

Mes07-mleplayer-020.Content: I have to offer a proper apology.

Mes07-mlesystem-003.Content: System Information: We regret to inform you that the other party is offline, so your message will not be delivered.

Mes08-mleplayer-002.Content: Oh thank goodness, you're not ignoring me anymore.

Mes08-mleplayer-004.Content: I know you might not forgive me.

Mes08-mleplayer-005.Content: I shouldn't have hurt you like that, Meryl.

Mes08-mleplayer-007.Content: I really need you, Meryl. That's the truth.

Mes08-mleplayer-008.Content: You're tough and powerful, always an inspiration to me.

Mes08-mle-004.Content: Because I am a weapon. A force.

Mes08-mleplayer-010.Content: No, it's because you're a really important friend to me!

Mes08-mleplayer-011.Content: Because I want to be with you all the time! Meryl, I... I like you the most!

Mes08-mleplayer-013.Content: You don't have to forgive me...

Mes08-mleplayer-014.Content: That's all I have to say.

Mes08-mle-006.Content: I don't know why I always have the feeling I'm seeing a familiar figure.

Mes08-mleplayer-018.Content: You're not angry with me, Meryl?

Mes08-mleplayer-019.Content: Meryl, I know what I did was wrong.

Mes08-mle-009.Content: I'm going to go adjust the data.

Mes09-mle-001.Content: I found some information at Hykros.

Mes09-mleplayer-004.Content: This is the data on Meryl.

Mes09-mle-003.Content: The data is a bit fragmented...

Mes09-mle-004.Content: It's very basic information. Very normal.

Mes09-mleplayer-007.Content: Actually, I've also checked it out.

Mes09-mleplayer-008.Content: I also have a record of Meryl's information.

Mes09-mleplayer-009.Content: For instance, Meryl likes the color white.

Mes09-mle-006.Content: Well, actually, I like blue the most.

Mes09-mleplayer-012.Content: Yes, and blue really suits you.

Mes09-mle-007.Content: I want to go to Hykros and search again.

Mes10-mle-001.Content: Will you be free anytime soon?

Mes10-mle-002.Content: I want to visit Warren Snowfield again.

Mes10-mle-003.Content: "Victor"... The name's not ringing a bell...

Mes10-mle-004.Content: The record states that we are twins...

Mes10-mleplayer-009.Content: Well, Victor is your little brother.

Mes10-mle-005.Content: But I don't know... I don't remember a lot of things.

Mes10-mleplayer-015.Content: Twins have the same birthday, right.

Mes10-mleplayer-016.Content: You were born on 10 October, right?

Mes10-mle-009.Content: Victor was also born on 10 October...

daily01-mleplayer-001.Content: You like snow, don't you, Meryl?

daily01-mle-002.Content: It's cold and it feels nice.

daily01-mleplayer-005.Content: So you don't like summer either?

daily01-mleplayer-009.Content: The sea is pretty in the summer. Let's go check it out together in the future.

daily01-mleplayer-010.Content: There's a hot cuisine that's delicious. Let's go have some next time.

daily02-mlesystem-001.Content: System Information: Meryl is typing... typing...

daily02-mleplayer-001.Content: Feels like you are in a good mood, Meryl.

daily02-mleplayer-002.Content: I wanted to ask you if you received my gift or not just now.

daily02-mleplayer-005.Content: I'm happy that you like it.

daily02-mleplayer-007.Content: I'll buy you more next time.

daily02-mleplayer-008.Content: I'll buy you some more right now!

daily04-mleplayer-001.Content: Why are you saying sorry all of a sudden?

daily04-mle-002.Content: The flower you gave me wilted.

daily04-mle-003.Content: Freezing it doesn't protect it well either.

daily04-mleplayer-006.Content: It can't be preserved in that way.

daily04-mle-004.Content: How I wish it wasn't so fragile and transient.

daily04-mle-005.Content: It's a little cruel and sad, that's why...

daily04-mleplayer-009.Content: Yes. No flowers from now on then.

daily04-mleplayer-010.Content: I won't buy any more flowers.

daily05-mle-002.Content: The scan indicates a 60% wear and tear.

daily05-mleplayer-006.Content: Let's get it fixed right now.

daily05-mleplayer-007.Content: "Rosy" has been with Meryl for a long time now.

daily05-mleplayer-008.Content: Has Meryl's weapon always been Rosy?

daily05-mle-005.Content: Yes, ever since I became an Executor.

daily05-mleplayer-010.Content: Oh, that is something to envy.

daily05-mleplayer-011.Content: It can go with you wherever you roam.

daily05-mleplayer-012.Content: Been around you longer than we've been together!

daily05-mle-008.Content: Well, I... I wanted to... Get it fixed quickly...

Mes01-kldyplayer-002.Content: Did I completely forget to introduce myself?

Mes01-kldy-002.Content: Well, it is better to formally introduce oneself. Especially if we might be working together.

Mes01-kldy-004.Content: Reach out if you have any problems.

Mes02-kldy-001.Content: I just remembered there's something I need to bring up.

Mes02-kldy-003.Content: So any kind of feline just sets me off... I really don't know how to coexist with them.

Mes02-kldy-004.Content: Meeting one the other day, I was pretty surprised. I felt like I hadn't seen a cat for a long time.

Mes02-kldyplayer-006.Content: Ha-ha! Does this count as a weakness then?

Mes02-kldyplayer-007.Content: Let me handle any feline matters in the future.

Mes02-kldy-006.Content: Even though it's a little awkward, I worry that something could go wrong during a mission.

Mes02-kldyplayer-008.Content: Understood. I'll bear it in mind.

Mes02-kldy-008.Content: Okay. I'll have to bug you about this cat business!

Mes03-kldy-001.Content: Would you like to see the analysis of my recent mission data?

Mes03-kldy-002.Content: Yep, so far, so good. I'll send you the details later.

Mes03-kldy-003.Content: Completion: A. Efficiency: A. Material Retrieval...

Mes03-kldy-005.Content: That's strange. I haven't noticed anything off with retrieval, recently...

Mes03-kldyplayer-007.Content: I wonder where the problem could be.

Mes03-kldy-006.Content: You should probably check the retrieval system first. It's been a while since the last update.

Mes03-kldy-007.Content: Maybe it's a problem with the retrieval system itself.

Mes03-kldy-010.Content: Hold on. Let me see what's going on here.

Mes03-kldy-011.Content: The bits I just checked all look normal. I wonder what else it could be...

Mes03-kldy-016.Content: No worries! It seems the data uploaded to the retrieval system was corrupted.

Mes03-kldysystem-001.Content: Alright. I'll go over the data one more time, and send you a concrete report a little later.

Mes04-kldy-001.Content: Have you... Not been sleeping well these past few days?

Mes04-kldy-002.Content: Oh, you don't look after yourself as expected.

Mes04-kldy-004.Content: You'll have some problems if you keep going like this.

Mes04-kldy-005.Content: Too much pressure? Are the missions too demanding?

Mes04-kldy-006.Content: Alright then. Just don't push yourself too hard.

Mes04-kldy-007.Content: If you ever need me, or even just someone to lend an ear, I'm always here for you.

Mes04-kldy-008.Content: Well, seeing you in such a state affects me too.

Mes04-kldy-009.Content: It's tough on everyone to see you so listless and exhausted.

Mes04-kldy-010.Content: Well, I'll drop it for now.

Mes05-kldy-003.Content: Yeah, her! With the long white hair, wearing the blue dress? Always so cold.

Mes05-kldy-004.Content: She doesn't seem to like engaging with other people, and comes across as really frosty. I've never heard her speak, either.

Mes05-kldy-006.Content: Whenever I see her, she's either sitting in a daze or staring into the middle distance. She seems so solitary, so alone.

Mes05-kldy-007.Content: I am concerned! I really care!

Mes05-kldy-008.Content: Well... I don't know why... I care so much...

Mes05-kldyplayer-010.Content: Just kidding. Don't think too much.

Mes05-kldyplayer-011.Content: You're a very warmhearted person after all, Claudia.

Mes05-kldy-011.Content: Maybe chatting now and then would be nice?

Mes05-kldy-012.Content: I kind of want to try getting to know her.

Mes05-kldy-013.Content: But I don't want it to be weird and one-sided... It wouldn't be good to upset her...

Mes05-kldy-014.Content: This is all stuff I've been thinking to myself. I don't really know anything about her.

Mes05-kldyplayer-013.Content: I doubt you would. Give it a go!

Mes05-kldy-016.Content: Okay, it can't hurt to try.

Mes06-kldy-002.Content: There's a really bad guy, a conman who pretended to help an old lady, but ultimately scammed her out of every penny she owned.

Mes06-kldyplayer-004.Content: You managed to track him down?

Mes06-kldy-003.Content: I was asking about something else at first before I overheard this.

Mes06-kldy-004.Content: The worst thing is, I was too late. By the time I found this swindler, he already spent all the money.

Mes06-kldy-005.Content: And the old lady wasn't the only victim! I made a few inquiries and found out that loads of other people had been conned too. I was furious!

Mes06-kldy-006.Content: I left the thief with a reliable friend of mine, an innkeeper. He'll help me keep an eye on this guy.

Mes06-kldy-007.Content: He's gonna be working in the inn, and every penny of what he earns will go towards paying back his victims.

Mes06-kldy-008.Content: Ugh! I really hate these sorts of people.

Mes06-kldy-009.Content: I dealt with a lot of petty thieves back when I was an Executor. Some proper bandits, too.

Mes06-kldy-010.Content: Even though the world today is pretty chaotic, and everyone's scrabbling for few resources, I still think there is a certain bare minimum of conscience that humans should have.

Mes06-kldyplayer-011.Content: People can't... Or at least they shouldn't.

Mes06-kldyplayer-014.Content: Feel better getting it off your chest?

Mes06-kldy-012.Content: I feel much better. I'd expect nothing less from such a good partner! Thank you.

Mes07-kldy-001.Content: I thought my clearance in Hykros was already high enough...

Mes07-kldyplayer-001.Content: I thought it was pretty high!

Mes07-kldy-002.Content: I applied for permission to access some records and information, but apparently, my clearance isn't sufficient and my request was denied.

Mes07-kldy-005.Content: Do you think that Dr. Joaquin's clearance would be enough?

Mes07-kldy-006.Content: I'm concerned with a few things, and want to go over the information on "Operation Dark Apocalypse" one more time.

Mes07-kldyplayer-008.Content: What did you manage to see?

Mes07-kldy-007.Content: There's too little information, and a lot of relevant records have too high clearance requirements. Some of them have been set as private as well.

Mes07-kldyplayer-009.Content: There has to be a way.

Mes07-kldy-008.Content: I still think that asking Dr. Joaquin is the best bet.

Mes07-kldyplayer-011.Content: Let me know when and I'll go with you.

Mes08-kldy-001.Content: Did you get the thing I sent you?

Mes08-kldy-004.Content: You seem a little different today.

Mes08-kldy-006.Content: To be honest, your unhappiness is almost overflowing the chatbox...

Mes08-kldy-007.Content: What happened? Is it something you can't tell me?

Mes08-kldy-008.Content: I guess I'll wait for you to be in a better mood?

Mes09-kldy-001.Content: Do you prefer strawberries or pinecones?

Mes09-kldy-002.Content: I bought a lot, and if you like, I'll send you some both.

Mes09-kldy-003.Content: No worries. It's nothing. I didn't blame you for what happened last time.

Mes09-kldy-004.Content: There will always be times when you want to be alone. Don't worry, don't worry. Let's choose what to eat first!

Mes09-kldyplayer-003.Content: I want to talk to you.

Mes09-kldyplayer-004.Content: I have something to tell you.

Mes09-kldy-007.Content: I worried you. I should have been upfront with you. No wonder you didn't know how to tell me.

Mes09-kldy-008.Content: My body is fine. The medical staff at Hykros will take good care of it.

Mes09-kldy-009.Content: It's very nice of you to be so thoughtful to me. In fact, I'm very satisfied with my current state.

Mes09-kldy-010.Content: It is enough for me to know you, fight with you, be understood by you, stand up for my own justice, and walk the path I want to stick to once again.

Mes09-kldy-011.Content: I don't care much about my body anymore. Anyway, she is well protected and lies comfortably in Hykros.

Mes09-kldy-012.Content: This is the path I have chosen. I have no regrets, and I will always keep going. Always.

Mes09-kldy-013.Content: So are you willing to stay by my side?

Mes09-kldy-014.Content: Well, then, that's a promise between you and me.

Mes10-kldy-004.Content: I also want to formally introduce you to "me."

Mes10-kldyplayer-004.Content: What time? I'll freshen up first.

Mes10-kldy-008.Content: You make me feel nervous now...

Mes10-kldyplayer-008.Content: You're important to me, after all.

daily01-kldy-001.Content: I don't know which one to pick...

daily01-kldy-003.Content: I can't decide which one to choose.

daily01-kldy-004.Content: Yes, but I like the other one a lot, too.

daily01-kldy-006.Content: Thanks for your help. I'll go buy the hat first.

daily02-kldy-001.Content: The weather has been variable lately. You must take good care of your health.

daily02-kldy-002.Content: Seems like a lot of people are getting sick.

daily02-kldy-003.Content: I'm a little worried about your health.

daily02-kldy-004.Content: Don't overexert yourself to complete missions.

daily02-kldy-005.Content: I'm on standby 24 hours a day. Do call me if you're in need.

daily03-kldyplayer-003.Content: I spent ages picking out the right one.

daily03-kldy-003.Content: Why does it feel like I've just completed a particularly hard mission?

daily03-kldy-004.Content: You look to be so bothered. Ha, ha.

daily03-kldyplayer-005.Content: I wanted to give you your favorite thing.

daily03-kldyplayer-006.Content: I hope I've picked the most suitable one.

daily03-kldy-005.Content: Actually, I'd like anything simply because it's you who gave it to me.

daily04-kldy-002.Content: Hmm, we met during the data maintenance. And then I went to say hello.

daily04-kldy-003.Content: Ha-ha. Hmm... How to put it in words...

daily04-kldy-004.Content: Rather cold, indeed. But it's not like you can't get along with her at all.

daily04-kldy-005.Content: She didn't ignore me, and her attitude was not too bad.

daily04-kldy-006.Content: You can tell that she's really serious. She was especially focused and careful when she maintained the data.

daily04-kldyplayer-005.Content: You're really in love with her...

daily04-kldy-007.Content: You're making fun of me again...

daily04-kldy-008.Content: I just can't leave people like her alone...

daily04-kldy-009.Content: I just hope we could meet again.

Mes01-zero-001.Content: You're the guy who just uses Zero, right?

Mes01-zero-003.Content: I prefer not to waste my energy and intelligence on insignificant people or events.

Mes01-zeroplayer-006.Content: And why am I considered insignificant...

Mes01-zero-004.Content: You are the conduit I use to reach the outside world.

Mes01-zero-006.Content: I'm under no obligation to explain.

Mes01-zerosystem-001.Content: System Information: You do not currently have the authorization to use this chat channel. This may be due to changes to the channel settings. Please try again later.

Mes02-zero-001.Content: Has anyone rather... Strange contacted you lately?

Mes02-zeroplayer-003.Content: Does this have something to do with a mission?

Mes02-zeroplayer-005.Content: Is there anything I can do?

Mes02-zero-005.Content: ... So much so that it makes me wonder why I restored access to the channel for you.

Mes02-zero-006.Content: You must know that most people aren't foolish enough to lock themselves out of their own channel.

Mes02-zero-007.Content: I don't deny that you take things seriously, but that doesn't mean I approve of your abilities.

Mes02-zeroplayer-009.Content: Look, it's obvious you asked me.

Mes02-zeroplayer-010.Content: I only thought because you asked me...

Mes02-zero-008.Content: You think too much. Didn't I make it clear to you before? I don't trust you.

Mes03-zero-002.Content: Are you making fun of me?

Mes03-zero-003.Content: Really. Then why don't you explain.

Mes03-zero-004.Content: Is it an intentional result that all of your abilities' numeric values are below average?

Mes03-zero-008.Content: Boost your average value by at least 10 points.

Mes03-zero-009.Content: I have no interest in working with worthless people.

Mes03-zerosystem-001.Content: System Information: The other party left, so your message was not delivered.

Mes04-zero-001.Content: I analyzed the recent mission, and it was a disaster... Doesn't look like you have a brain up in that head of yours.

Mes04-zero-002.Content: Well, I don't want you to affect me at all. For the smooth execution of future missions, I've drawn up some regulations which will be sent to you later.

Mes04-zero-003.Content: There are a few points that I would like to emphasize you must follow. Don't bother asking why.

Mes04-zero-005.Content: Seeing as I've been entrusted with mission planning and execution, you will follow my instructions.

Mes04-zero-006.Content: Either that, or you solve the mission yourself.

Mes04-zero-007.Content: No. 2: When necessary, the best equipment's mine.

Mes04-zero-008.Content: I don't want any errors or problems in my calculations because of the equipment. Of course, my phenomenal ability should be able to prevent that, even with a pile of scrap metal.

Mes04-zero-009.Content: But I like shiny new toys.

Mes04-zero-010.Content: No. 3: I don't go out, and I don't do chores.

Mes04-zero-011.Content: You're responsible for all communication, purchasing, and preparation required for going out. This includes food and daily necessities.

Mes04-zero-012.Content: I'm not picky. I can eat whatever.

Mes04-zero-013.Content: No. 4: You'll join me in game time.

Mes04-zero-014.Content: Additionally, I shall get time off each week. Everyone needs a little downtime to rest and recharge.

Mes04-zero-015.Content: There are a dozen or so other points. I've written them simple enough, so you should be able to understand. Go read them yourself.

Mes04-zero-016.Content: What? I was thinking about your mission analysis.

Mes04-zero-017.Content: Wasn't someone recently going around saying to work hard?

Mes04-zero-018.Content: Whatever. The regulations have been sent. I'm tired now, it's time for a nap.

Mes05-zero-001.Content: Tsk, the data's been transmitted. Why do I always have to remind you?

Mes05-zero-002.Content: Two new games of this month.

Mes05-zero-003.Content: That's the price of you keep asking me to look up such non-nutritious rubbish.

Mes05-zero-005.Content: I've given you everything I can find about Executor Observers.

Mes05-zero-006.Content: The genius Observer system has only been around a while, the brainchild of someone pretty senior.

Mes05-zero-007.Content: Hykros, already severely understaffed, sent Observers to support Executors on a one-to-one basis.

Mes05-zero-008.Content: It's amazing that such a system would be used at all.

Mes05-zero-010.Content: Don't make me look up such tedious things again.

Mes05-zero-011.Content: Also, don't forget the games you promised me.

Mes06-zero-001.Content: Hmph, quite a rare thing you sent me.

Mes06-zero-002.Content: Ultimate Fighter 2333: Deluxe Edition... The writing on the box is already so faded.

Mes06-zeroplayer-001.Content: I just found it by chance.

Mes06-zeroplayer-002.Content: Um. I hope you like it?

Mes06-zero-003.Content: It may be a little shabby, but still worth looking into.

Mes06-zero-004.Content: Next time you could at least keep the packaging intact.

Mes06-zero-005.Content: I have to say, I didn't expect you to like such old games.

Mes06-zeroplayer-006.Content: I'm not sure that I would get it, though.

Mes06-zero-006.Content: It's practically ancient by now. I doubt anyone but me would be able to resolve it these days.

Mes06-zero-007.Content: After all, it's not like anyone else could decipher it. All I need to read it for is a few seconds, though.

Mes06-zero-008.Content: All set. Let's give it a spin.

Mes06-zeroplayer-009.Content: Hold on! I don't know how to play!

Mes06-zero-009.Content: Tsk... You even need an explanation for this? Pick a character. Fight. It's not that difficult.

Mes06-zeroplayer-011.Content: It's my first time playing this.

Mes06-zeroplayer-012.Content: I really do need some explanation...

Mes06-zero-011.Content: You can work it out while playing. Log in now.

Mes07-zero-001.Content: Did that old dude Joaquin come looking for you?

Mes07-zero-002.Content: Then what's with the sudden curiosity about the archive?

Mes07-zero-003.Content: I thought that annoying old man was shooting his mouth off again...

Mes07-zero-004.Content: That Executor archive is riddled with exploits. I'm too nice to not make a list pointing them out.

Mes07-zero-005.Content: That old man Joaquin saw it, and we ended up arguing for, like, forever. Super annoying.

Mes07-zero-006.Content: He made me promise not to edit other Executor archives.

Mes07-zero-007.Content: But I never said anything about my own.

Mes07-zeroplayer-008.Content: But you wrote the stuff in the archive?

Mes07-zero-009.Content: There's still a lot I don't remember. Maybe the info they've got is accurate.

Mes07-zero-011.Content: Why are that some things I remember so clearly, down to the minutest detail...?

Mes07-zero-012.Content: I never thought about the problems with this information.

Mes07-zero-015.Content: I never even went to verify it. Not once.

Mes07-zero-016.Content: There's something fishy about it. I'll take a look.

Mes08-zero-003.Content: It's pretty evident that parts of my memory were deliberately erased.

Mes08-zero-005.Content: I don't even know if what I remember is real or not.

Mes08-zero-006.Content: I went through all the data I could find about myself...

Mes08-zero-007.Content: There are no problems! No problems at all. That's the point.

Mes08-zero-008.Content: It's so normal that it's abnormal.

Mes08-zero-011.Content: I unearthed even deeper data, and...

Mes08-zero-012.Content: While I was decrypting the data, my connection was forcibly severed.

Mes08-zero-013.Content: I've tried several times since, and each time someone would interfere with my program.

Mes08-zero-014.Content: There's only one person who could do this sort of thing...

Mes08-zerosystem-001.Content: System Warning! Comms link connection manually severed. Warning!

Mes08-zerosystem-002.Content: System Warning! Unauthorized intrusion in the comms system! Warning!

Mes09-zero-002.Content: I finally got the chat system back.

Mes09-zero-003.Content: Hey, that guy actually hacked my system.

Mes09-zerosystem-001.Content: System Warning! Unauthorized intrusion in the comms system! Warning!

Mes09-zero-005.Content: "Don't worry, I have already processed all of your records, and I won't leave a trace."

Mes09-zero-006.Content: "Why are you guiding Rei to search for the past? That doesn't make sense to him."

Mes09-zero-007.Content: "Did I not explain? The carrier only needs to perform the work of the carrier."

Mes09-zero-008.Content: "Through you and Rei, I can understand everything that has happened to you."

Mes09-zero-009.Content: "While you do help me get in touch with the outside world, you don't need to know anything about me except what I have set up for you. Don't cross the line."

Mes09-zeroplayer-007.Content: Isn't Rei qualified to know everything?

Mes09-zero-011.Content: "This is for your own good. The time has not yet come, so you are not qualified to know now."

Mes09-zero-012.Content: "I programmed Rei, and his safety feature doesn't allow him to search for anything about me."

Mes09-zero-013.Content: "Don't go any further. I'm warning you."

Mes10-zero-002.Content: He won't have a chance to sneak in again.

Mes10-zero-003.Content: What did that guy tell you?

Mes10-zero-004.Content: He deleted the record, how boring he is.

Mes10-zeroplayer-004.Content: Let me take care of you.

Mes10-zero-005.Content: Tsk, this is such a long message for me.

Mes10-zero-008.Content: The point is to make me obedient.

Mes10-zeroplayer-008.Content: Maybe it's better not to investigate.

Mes10-zero-010.Content: Who would listen to him? Stupid.

Mes10-zero-011.Content: Once the programming is completed, I will make him pay for this.

daily01-zero-001.Content: So you can eat bread with jam.

daily01-zeroplayer-002.Content: Aren't they supposed to be eaten together?

daily01-zero-002.Content: Bread is bread. Jam is jam. Eat them separately.

daily01-zeroplayer-004.Content: It should be tastier when you eat them all together.

daily01-zero-003.Content: Is it better? I wasn't paying attention.

daily01-zero-004.Content: All foods taste the same to me. All I care about is that they keep me functioning.

daily01-zeroplayer-005.Content: Perhaps I should teach you how to cook.

daily01-zeroplayer-006.Content: I'll sync some recipes to yours.

daily01-zero-006.Content: You thought I would say so?

daily01-zero-008.Content: Cooking is the thing I hate the most!

daily02-zero-001.Content: Those people can't be seriously expecting to break my record.

daily02-zero-002.Content: That's unthinkable. I'm the "champ of the champ."

daily02-zero-003.Content: Well, I shared the Ultimate Fighter 2333: Deluxe Edition online, but I didn't expect so many people would play it.

daily02-zero-004.Content: My score ranks the first. What's so surprising about that?

daily02-zero-006.Content: A Wanderer who has challenged me many times just won't give up. They've sent me an invitation again.

daily02-zero-007.Content: I get bored playing games in which I'm always crushing my opponent.

daily02-zeroplayer-007.Content: You don't have to accept it.

daily02-zero-008.Content: Humph, it's time they learned the outcome of challenging the king...

daily02-zero-009.Content: I'm entering the arena. Watch the streaming if you're interested.

daily03-zero-001.Content: I want to take a leave tomorrow.

daily03-zero-002.Content: A new product will be released.

daily03-zero-003.Content: I wanna be the first to get it.

daily03-zero-006.Content: I have a premonition that I would never get it if you helped me.

daily04-zeroplayer-001.Content: Don't you want to play games?

daily04-zero-005.Content: Can't you find something interesting for me?

daily04-zeroplayer-003.Content: Wanna go out for a walk?

daily04-zeroplayer-004.Content: How about taking a look outside?

daily04-zeroplayer-008.Content: Play the Ultimate Fighter with me?

Mes01-smr02-001.Content: Seems like the message was sent successfully.

Mes01-smr02-002.Content: It might look a little strange but is easy to master.

Mes01-smr02-003.Content: Is this for communicating with you...?

Mes01-smrplayer02A-001.Content: Come find me if you're bored and want to chat.

Mes01-smrplayer02B-001.Content: In case of emergencies, use this to get in touch with me.

Mes01-smr03-001.Content: I think I can do that.

Mes01-smr03-002.Content: Oh, I think I forgot to introduce myself.

Mes01-smr03-003.Content: I'm Samir... Outside my daily job, that is.

Mes01-smr03-004.Content: I'd better have some fun here.

Mes02-smr01-001.Content: Sometimes I wonder, what sort of life do you lead?

Mes02-smr01A-001.Content: Ah, that's just the sort of normal, regular life I long for.

Mes02-smr01A-002.Content: Living a rich and full life every day is a type of blessing.

Mes02-smr01B-001.Content: Although most people live this kind of life.

Mes02-smr01B-002.Content: But if possible, it's worth making each day a little more fun and interesting.

Mes02-smr03-001.Content: If you ever have some downtime, why not go exploring?

Mes02-smrplayer02-001.Content: Is there anywhere you especially want to go?

Mes02-smr04-002.Content: Where to go, what to do... I like to be impulsive, live in the moment.

Mes02-smr04-003.Content: If you have somewhere to recommend.

Mes02-smr04-004.Content: Why not tell me about it?

Mes02-smr04-005.Content: I will seriously consider it as my next destination.

Mes03-smr01-001.Content: What sort of person do you think my prototype was? I mean the Executor Samir.

Mes03-smrplayer01-001.Content: I always assumed you would understand her more than I do.

Mes03-smr02-002.Content: I am but a battle support AI, born through using her weapon as my prototype and adopting certain technology.

Mes03-smr02-003.Content: My settings mean that, in battle, I do have the same thinking and logic as her.

Mes03-smr02-004.Content: But the things I like, or am interested in, have undoubtedly come from her too.

Mes03-smr02-005.Content: This personality, all the little ways she's influenced it... How exactly did it happen? This is what I wonder about.

Mes03-smr02-006.Content: While I was being designed, I seem to have had all the prototype's memories erased.

Mes03-smrplayer02A-001.Content: That's a wonderful insight. It seems I've been misunderstanding Simulacra.

Mes03-smrplayer02B-001.Content: I thought you were basically a second "her." It appears I was mistaken.

Mes03-smr03-001.Content: Well, in that case, I'm in no rush to solicit your opinion.

Mes03-smr03-002.Content: But I should emphasize this again:

Mes03-smr03-003.Content: I am an AI weapon, possessing just the same battle experience and skills as her, and identical in personality too.

Mes03-smr03-004.Content: Her memories, her past, her formative experiences... These are hers alone.

Mes03-smr03-005.Content: But my future, my personal development... These are mine alone.

Mes03-smr03-006.Content: It is important to me that you can distinguish between the two of us.

Mes04-smr01-001.Content: Oh? Did you mark my book?

Mes04-smr01A-001.Content: As expected, it was you who circled the murderer's name.

Mes04-smr01A-002.Content: It's always easy to work out who did it.

Mes04-smr01B-001.Content: Someone circled the murderer's name in my novel.

Mes04-smr02-001.Content: I'd already worked out who did it, anyway.

Mes04-smr02-002.Content: Though I always enjoy the pressure of uncovering the truth.

Mes04-smr02-004.Content: All hidden machinations are about to be revealed.

Mes04-smr02-005.Content: It's like ripping off the final layer of a gift wrapped numerous times.

Mes04-smr02-006.Content: But a hole suddenly appeared on the giftbox, and the surprise in it simply fell out!

Mes04-smr02-008.Content: I'll be sure to pay back this disappointment!

Mes04-smr02-009.Content: Just wait till you see what happens.

Mes05-smr01-002.Content: That curiosity is so integral to humans.

Mes05-smr01-003.Content: If it was lost... Life would become so boring.

Mes05-smrplayer01B-001.Content: Are you trying to say "I'm boring"?

Mes05-smr02-002.Content: If I don't find something interesting to do soon... The bullet holes in here are gonna start multiplying.

Mes05-smr03-001.Content: Oh? I'm not exactly easy to persuade.

Mes05-smr03-002.Content: If you want to distract me from obliterating that wall, how about we go explore some ruins?

Mes06-smr01-001.Content: I think... Some of my memories have come back.

Mes06-smr01-002.Content: No. Precisely, it's something that "Samir" went through, some formative experience that greatly influenced my personality.

Mes06-smr01-003.Content: Fascinating. Seems some errors occurred in several processes.

Mes06-smr01-004.Content: These are the most accurate answers to everything I was curious about.

Mes06-smr02-001.Content: Building up hope for someone, the intense pain of her leaving, and the torment you inflicted upon yourself.

Mes06-smr03-002.Content: Honestly, I can't tell you exactly what happened.

Mes06-smr03-003.Content: The limitation of recollected memories is one reason.

Mes06-smr03-004.Content: Another is that I can't exactly empathize.

Mes06-smr03-005.Content: Her rage. Her paranoia. I can almost understand where such strong emotions come from, but it's like reading someone else's story.

Mes06-smr03-007.Content: Would I be any different if I'd had more information...?

Mes07-smr01-001.Content: I am a woman of simple tastes. I like bullets, gunpowder, dynamite...

Mes07-smrplayer01B-001.Content: Some not-so-great memories have come up.

Mes07-smr02-001.Content: Don't worry, I'm just rehearsing some villain-speak.

Mes07-smr03-002.Content: It's just that bad guys are so much more dramatic than heroes.

Mes07-smr03-003.Content: Suspense, surprise... There are loads of techniques to elevate a dramatic performance.

Mes07-smr03A-001.Content: Maybe we're quite a good match in this regard.

Mes07-smrplayer03B-001.Content: While I can never truly empathize, I can understand.

Mes07-smr03B-001.Content: Ha, I guess I'm pretty unconventional.

Mes07-smr04-001.Content: But I suppose it's just my personality.

Mes07-smr04-002.Content: I have a few suspicions about what made me this way.

Mes07-smr04-003.Content: Still, I need some time to pull myself together. Let's talk more about this later.

Mes08-smr01-001.Content: You probably know that Executor Samir had a much different personality to mine.

Mes08-smr01-002.Content: Her bygone pleasant and calm personality, and her dedication to that person... Their influence has rekindled me through my memory restoration.

Mes08-smr01-003.Content: It's like having two completely different datasets in front of you, both equally usable.

Mes08-smr01-004.Content: How on earth am I meant to choose between them? Do I have to choose?

Mes08-smr01-005.Content: Two radically different personalities... Which one is the real me?

Mes08-smr02-002.Content: An AI searching for its personality. Isn't it ridiculous?

Mes08-smrplayer02-001.Content: Not at all, that sounds perfectly reasonable to me.

Mes08-smr03-001.Content: I will do my best not to be unduly influenced by her.

Mes08-smr03-002.Content: But I think that's a pipe dream. I came from her, after all.

Mes08-smr03-003.Content: I'm confused about who I really am.

Mes08-smr04-002.Content: I feel like I've been overlooking something...

Mes09-smr01-001.Content: I think I seem to have come out of that confusion.

Mes09-smr01-002.Content: It may be hard to imagine, but it's true...

Mes09-smr01-003.Content: When the memory of her came back, I inevitably fell into the same mood.

Mes09-smr01-004.Content: There was a short time when I confused "Samir" with "me."

Mes09-smr01-005.Content: Not only did I lose myself in these two personalities, but my paranoia drove me to madness.

Mes09-smr01-006.Content: Am I her past? Or am I her present? Not that it matters.

Mes09-smr01-008.Content: As I said before, I should be completely separate from her.

Mes09-smr01-009.Content: Huh... I didn't expect a memory that shouldn't be recalled to be so troublesome.

Mes09-smrplayer01-001.Content: I'm so glad you've found your own way.

Mes09-smr02-001.Content: And I am able to realize this because of you.

Mes09-smr02-002.Content: It's you who woke me up... I'm someone's partner.

Mes09-smr02-003.Content: There's someone who wants me to live just as myself.

Mes09-smr02-004.Content: Instead of being trapped in the past, living in someone else's shadow.

Mes09-smr02-005.Content: I always feel like when I say these things, I don't sound like me.

Mes10-smrplayer01B-001.Content: You want me to look upside down?

Mes10-smr01B-002.Content: Ahem, that's just my way of saying it.

Mes10-smr02-001.Content: Sending a message that way is not frank.

Mes10-smr02-002.Content: But I want to be true to myself while... getting your attention.

Mes10-smr02-003.Content: The days I've spent with you are very pleasant.

Mes10-smr03-002.Content: I'll be here for as long as you need.

Mes10-smr03-003.Content: I just wanted to make a formal reply to your concerns over the past few days.

Mes10-smr03-005.Content: I have to say... I used to think I was independent, and I didn't need anyone.

Mes10-smr03-006.Content: Neither you nor my prototype would affect me.

Mes10-smr03-007.Content: But your company and the revival of memory about her... They've undoubtedly shaken me.

Mes10-smr03-008.Content: I'm connected to you now, and I'm so grateful to be your partner.

Mes10-smr03-009.Content: I hope you'll keep letting me accompany you on your exploration of the unknown. Let's go on an adventure together.

daily01-smr01-001.Content: Sometimes I wonder what line of work would I be in if I were not a fighter.

daily01-smrplayer01A-001.Content: It's kind of hard to imagine Samir as someone who doesn't fight.

daily01-smrplayer01B-002.Content: I thought you like shooting a lot.

daily01-smr02-001.Content: Shooting is not all there is to life.

daily01-smrplayer02-001.Content: What about an author of mystery novels? You like them, don't you?

daily01-smr03-001.Content: I do like this kind of novel a lot.

daily01-smr03-002.Content: Although I'm good at deductions, I may not be able to quiet down and write stories.

daily01-smr03-003.Content: If I must make an account or something, I prefer to be Boswell.

daily02-smr01-001.Content: Today is sunny and cloudless again. Boring.

daily02-smrplayer01A-001.Content: Don't you like sunny days, Samir?

daily02-smr02-001.Content: It's not so much a preference for a certain kind of weather, but a dislike for a monotonous life.

daily02-smr02-002.Content: I'd be more excited if it's cloudy.

daily02-smr02-003.Content: The churning, the brewing. When on earth will the storm be here?

daily02-smr02-004.Content: It's unpredictable. It's like looking up at suspense.

daily02-smrplayer02A-001.Content: I like it when the weather changes a lot as well.

daily02-smr02A-001.Content: Looks like we're similar in many ways.

daily02-smrplayer02B-001.Content: I'll be in trouble if I don't have an umbrella with me.

daily02-smr02B-002.Content: Let me send you an umbrella if it's necessary.

daily03-smr01-001.Content: I'm quite the expert on pranks.

daily03-smr01-002.Content: Perhaps I should write a book about it...?

daily03-smr01-003.Content: Analysis on 160 methods of pulling pranks, something like that.

daily03-smr02A-002.Content: It's okay. I have other means.

daily03-smrplayer02B-001.Content: What do you intend to use these methods for?

daily03-smr02B-001.Content: Good question. Now, who's the lucky one for me to experiment on...

daily03-smr02B-002.Content: I have planned for my future!

daily04-smr01-001.Content: Is there anyone you can't let go?

daily04-smrplayer01-001.Content: Why did you say that? Did you recall something?

daily04-smr02-001.Content: No, it's just some kind of idea that popped out.

daily04-smr02A-001.Content: Is that so... Looks like it's some kind of common experience.

daily04-smr02A-002.Content: Maybe I should not say something like that.

daily04-smr02A-003.Content: But I don't want to see you be like someone who wouldn't let the past go...

daily04-smr02A-004.Content: If you really can't let it go, I hope I could bring you some comfort.

daily04-smrplayer02B-001.Content: There wasn't anyone whom I couldn't let go of though.

daily04-smr02B-001.Content: Oh, I'm actually happy to hear you say that.

daily04-smr02B-002.Content: At least it means that you won't experience that pain.

daily04-smr02B-003.Content: I mean the things that my prototype went through.

daily04-smr03-001.Content: The fact is, I care very much about this topic.

daily04-smr03-002.Content: The memories I recall still affect me.

daily04-smr03-003.Content: Every time I think of this experience, I seem to become another person.

daily04-smr03-004.Content: After all, it was very tough.

daily04-smr03-005.Content: I'll keep it together. Ha... I'm not good at being sentimental after all.

daily05-smr01A-001.Content: Don't be nervous. Just a few conclusions I reached.

daily05-smr02-003.Content: Sometimes I'm truly amazed by your energy. How do you manage to get so many things done without exhausting yourself?

daily05-smrplayer02A-001.Content: To be honest, I also get tired from the sheer number of missions.

daily05-smr02A-001.Content: Well, in that case, why not try actually taking a break when you can?

daily05-smr02B-001.Content: A human who doesn't feel tired all the time? How amusing...

daily05-smr02B-002.Content: I'm beginning to have my doubts... You're not an AI too, are you?

daily05-smr02B-003.Content: Of course, I doubt any AI would be as interesting as you.

Mes01-xm01-002.Content: Sorry, it's taken me a while to say hello. I'm Huma.

Mes01-xm01-003.Content: I'm, uh, kinda new to all this. I might need to rely on you and the others for guidance, just until I find my feet.

Mes01-xm02-002.Content: But anyway, first things first. I'm gonna get in the right headspace.

Mes01-xm02-003.Content: I know my stamina isn't great, but I'll work hard to improve it! I don't want to hold everyone back...

Mes01-xm02-004.Content: I might need to bug you again if I have any problems while I'm learning.

Mes02-xm01-001.Content: I have confidence in my strength. Please, call on me any time if I can be of help.

Mes02-xmplayer01A-001.Content: I like how reliable you are!

Mes02-xm01A-001.Content: I just want to be of help.

Mes02-xmplayer01B-001.Content: Didn't you say that you're not very strong?

Mes02-xm01B-001.Content: This, well... In simple terms, it's like the difference between endurance and explosiveness.

Mes02-xm02-001.Content: For example, I can help pick up and move around really heavy things that would normally need a trailer or even a Cybernetic Arm to move.

Mes02-xm02-002.Content: But I wouldn't be able to keep it up, if I had to carry such a thing very far...

Mes02-xmplayer02A-001.Content: I would call that a pretty amazing power!

Mes02-xmplayer02B-001.Content: I'd say that would be expected.

Mes02-xm03-001.Content: Yeah, I want to be able to help more.

Mes03-xm01-001.Content: I'm sorry, @player_name. I wasn't at my best earlier...

Mes03-xm01-002.Content: I hope I didn't cause any trouble?

Mes03-xmplayer01B-001.Content: I didn't notice... Are you okay?

Mes03-xm01B-001.Content: Yes. It still flares up, but a lot less often now.

Mes03-xm02-001.Content: ... Whenever it happens, it feels like I can't breathe for a really long time.

Mes03-xm02-002.Content: I don't want to be a burden on you and everyone else at crucial moments...

Mes03-xmplayer02-001.Content: Don't push yourself too hard. Be sure to rest.

Mes04-xm01-001.Content: Hmm... I'll probably send you mail later.

Mes04-xm01-002.Content: I really like using mail to communicate.

Mes04-xm02-001.Content: Hmm... Maybe because appearance is no obstacle to this kind of communication?

Mes04-xm02-002.Content: It's easy to convey what you really mean.

Mes04-xm02-003.Content: I never found it easy talking with people, before.

Mes04-xm02-004.Content: Maybe it was because I looked a little fierce, so people were afraid to chat to me...

Mes04-xm03-001.Content: Ah! My pulse has suddenly quickened.

Mes04-xm03-002.Content: My face feels like it's burning! Please, excuse me...

Mes05-xm01-001.Content: I think it's almost time for a physical.

Mes05-xm01-002.Content: The doctors in Hykros scheduled it a while ago.

Mes05-xm01-003.Content: I'll be there and back in no time. Hope you can approve a little vacation.

Mes05-xmplayer01B-001.Content: You don't need to ask for something like this! Go whenever you want.

Mes05-xm01B-001.Content: Seeing as we're traveling together, it's only proper to ask in advance.

Mes05-xm02-003.Content: Many of my parameters have been modified.

Mes05-xm02-004.Content: It's likely they'll need some adjustment.

Mes05-xmplayer03-001.Content: Why don't I go with you?

Mes05-xmplayer04-001.Content: I want to get to know you a bit better.

Mes06-xm01-001.Content: You remind me of the doctors I knew in Hykros.

Mes06-xmplayer01B-001.Content: I remind you of a doctor?

Mes06-xm01B-001.Content: Sorry... Maybe it's because I've only ever really known doctors...

Mes06-xm02-001.Content: I think you're a good person. So are the doctors.

Mes06-xm02-002.Content: Everyone is patient with me, even though sometimes I can be a little slow.

Mes06-xm02-003.Content: I'm well aware that there's a lot I don't understand, and that I am not proactive enough...

Mes06-xm02-004.Content: If it wasn't for the help and guidance of others, I'd probably be totally useless...

Mes06-xm02-005.Content: I'd like to talk to you more.

Mes06-xmplayer03B-001.Content: I'm happy to give you whatever help you need.

Mes07-xm01-001.Content: Every second, all manner of shocking things transpire on Aida...

Mes07-xm02-001.Content: When us Simulacra were initially programmed, all the knowledge and experience of our prototype were incorporated into our databases.

Mes07-xm02-002.Content: Huma  I mean the original, prototype Huma  was one of the most learned people I can think of, but had very little practical experience.

Mes07-xm02-003.Content: So I'm a little embarrassed that... I'm the same.

Mes07-xm02-004.Content: I wanted to learn much more. I searched through databases, and gradually increased my knowledge both of past events on Aida, and what it's like now.

Mes07-xm02-005.Content: Even dry, dusty descriptions can elicit sympathy for those who are suffering...

Mes07-xm02-006.Content: But it makes a whole different impact, seeing something with your own eyes versus simply reading about it...

Mes07-xm02A-001.Content: It's a tragic yet beautiful scene. Humanity undergoes such trials and tribulations, yet rises once again as people fight for survival.

Mes07-xm02B-001.Content: Wonderfully touching, tender sentiments, motivating me to protect these people.

Mes07-xm03-001.Content: I'm aware that any protection offered by this shield is limited, but I want to do something for them... Or would I be out of my depth?

Mes07-xm03-002.Content: Phew... I think I need to contemplate a bit more the meaning of what I've seen, as well as what I can and what I should do...

Mes07-xm03-003.Content: Can we visit many more places together, @player_name?

Mes08-xm01-001.Content: I get a strange feeling, looking upon the Banges scenery...

Mes08-xm02-003.Content: To be honest, I still don't understand. It could just be that this place somehow speaks to me, makes me feel at home.

Mes08-xm02-004.Content: Can we stay a while in Banges, next time we go?

Mes08-xmplayer02B-001.Content: Do you want to remember, Huma?

Mes08-xm02B-001.Content: No, I don't think it matters if I can't remember... It's okay.

Mes09-xm01-001.Content: What does losing memory feel like?

Mes09-xm01-002.Content: As far as I am concerned, it's like the memory, or lack thereof, is what has originally happened. My mind is like a white sheet of paper.

Mes09-xm01-003.Content: It's just like there was no memory in the first place, not that it has been lost.

Mes09-xm01-004.Content: But still, occasionally I have a feeling of emptiness, like something has been dug out of my brain, and when I recognize it, I can feel the pain...

Mes09-xmplayer01A-001.Content: My amnesia is very similar to what you described.

Mes09-xmplayer01B-001.Content: My amnesia is different from what you described.

Mes09-xm02-001.Content: Well, both you and my prototype have amnesia.

Mes09-xm02-002.Content: But the situation we've been presented with...

Mes09-xmplayer02-001.Content: You and I are in different situations.

Mes09-xm03-002.Content: I've thought that, compared to other Simulacra, I'm probably pretty close to the prototype.

Mes09-xm03-003.Content: But even if we're all white paper, each piece of white paper has nuances...

Mes09-xm03-004.Content: My prototype, who grows up in the Hykros ward, and I, who grow so much journeying with you...

Mes09-xm03-005.Content: How do I describe it? It's like our memories merge into a painting, which is getting more and more smudged...

Mes09-xm03-006.Content: Our personalities might become very different in the future.

Mes10-xm01-001.Content: I've got a lot of things I didn't understand before figured out now.

Mes10-xm01-002.Content: I am Huma. At the same time, Huma and I are the same...

Mes10-xm01-003.Content: In the process of innocently accepting things, I am slowly taking shape and deciding what kind of person I'd like to be.

Mes10-xm01-004.Content: I want to commemorate the one and only me that has gradually been shaped by my journey with you.

Mes10-xm01-005.Content: To that end, I'm going to try writing a book from now on.

Mes10-xm02-001.Content: Travel notes, journals, essays, something like that.

Mes10-xm02-002.Content: I love reading books, so does prototype.

Mes10-xm02-003.Content: When I'm done writing the book, I'd like to send it to my prototype if I can...

Mes10-xm02-004.Content: Because I know better than anyone how much my prototype wants to know about the outside world.

Mes10-xm02-005.Content: I'm so lucky to be travelling with @player_name.

Mes10-xmplayer02-001.Content: I'm excited to travel with you, too.

Mes10-xm03-001.Content: Let me continue to guard you on your journey.

daily01-xm01-001.Content: It's a joy to grow plants.

daily01-xm01-002.Content: They're lives that are by my side and in arm's reach.

daily01-xm01-003.Content: So I always feel secure when I'm close to plants.

daily01-xmplayer01-001.Content: Teach me how to grow greeneries.

daily01-xm02-002.Content: Oh, but if you haven't tried it yet, @player_name...

daily01-xm02-003.Content: I'll teach you how to grow them when I become full-fledged.

daily01-xmplayer02-001.Content: Now Huma is the master here.

daily02-xm01-001.Content: The book I want to fill my words with...

daily02-xm01-002.Content: Compared to last time, there has been quite an increase in content this time.

daily02-xm01-003.Content: I'm delighted to see it being filled bit by bit as I gain more experience.

daily02-xmplayer01-001.Content: Let me be your first reader after you finish writing the book.

daily03-xm01-001.Content: Molten Shield V2 is a weapon customized for me by Hykros staff. I'm very grateful...

daily03-xm01-002.Content: Although it's the heaviest of all weapons. I don't find it hard to use.

daily03-xm01-003.Content: But I kind of wish that it could be made bigger and heavier if it's possible.

daily03-xmplayer01B-001.Content: There should be a reason for its design.

daily03-xm02-001.Content: A stronger and wider protective umbrella.

daily03-xm02-002.Content: I simply hope I can do more for people...

daily03-xm02-003.Content: It's specialized for defense, so maybe the portability should be sacrificed a little? That's what I thought before.

daily03-xm02-004.Content: Since you said it's the most reasonable and efficient design, I'm comfortable with that.

daily03-xm02-005.Content: What remains for me to do is to hone my skills and see how much of Molten Shield V2's potential I can use.

daily04-xm01-001.Content: I'll do the rehabilitation exercises that doctors in Hykros taught me on a regular basis.

daily04-xm01-002.Content: Other than the power I got from my illness... there isn't any particularly special thing about my body.

daily04-xm01-003.Content: In contrast, I'm no longer healthy because of my past ailments.

daily04-xm01-004.Content: That's why I must persist in carrying out this training for years on end.

daily04-xmplayer01-001.Content: I want to stretch my limbs, too.

daily04-xm02-001.Content: You can try it if it pleases you.

daily04-xm02-002.Content: The moves may be simple, but you get to mobilize all your body parts.

daily05-xm01-001.Content: I recently found another example in which the actual situation did not match the knowledge written in the book.

daily05-xm01-002.Content: While books and databases give people the chance to explore the world without ever leaving their homes, can the quality of such limited exposure truly equal seeing things with one's own eyes...?

daily05-xm01-003.Content: In the end, practical experience matters...

daily05-xmplayer01-001.Content: Let's enjoy more beautiful scenery together.

daily05-xm02-002.Content: @player_name is always really hands-on, right? Do you read often, too?

daily05-xm03-001.Content: If only one could experience everything the world has to offer.

daily05-xm03-002.Content: However, there are still things that can only be glimpsed in books. Knowledge, for example, of things that no longer exist in our world...

daily05-xm03-003.Content: Like events recorded in historical records. I can give you a few recommendations later.

Mes01-cl01-001.Content: Intel logged. From today, you can work as my partner... But this is in name only. I haven't yet approved it myself.

Mes01-cl02-001.Content: That's all for now... Though if any missions come up in the future, we should let each other know.

Mes01-clplayer02B-001.Content: Don't know how to use machines?

Mes01-cl03-001.Content: No! Not at all! I'm just not too familiar with this era's equipment!

Mes01-cl03-003.Content: That's the end of the communication. Unless there is something absolutely vital about which you have to inform me, then please, do not contact me again.

Mes02-cl01-001.Content: This may be a little presumptuous, but I still want to know... How exactly do you define "partner"?

Mes02-clplayer01B-001.Content: You mean someone you care for, and do your best to look after?

Mes02-cl02-001.Content: Oh, I see... So that's why you do so many pointless things.

Mes02-cl02-002.Content: Listen, according to my understanding, partners aren't friends. You don't need to seek my approval.

Mes02-cl02-003.Content: Don't you worry about me, cause I won't be bending over backward for you.

Mes02-cl02-004.Content: All you gotta do... Is to work together with me as equal. Is that clear?

Mes02-cl03-001.Content: Whatever works for you is fine... Just don't be coming round here every day and we're cool.

Mes02-cl03-002.Content: Heh, let's call it a day, now we're on the same page...

Mes03-cl02-001.Content: Eh!? How... How did that happen? I didn't mean to send it...

Mes03-clplayer02B-001.Content: Strange, it's like my memory just disappeared.

Mes03-cl03-002.Content: Oh, forget it. It'll have been seen now, anyway. No use crying over spilled milk.

Mes03-cl03-003.Content: I was wondering if you... Do you have any knowledge of or interest in marine creatures?

Mes03-cl04-002.Content: Well, as a matter of fact... I recently updated some useful databases, to understand how progress is coming in this era's marine exploration.

Mes03-cl04-003.Content: While I was doing so... I found some traces of intentional tampering.

Mes03-cl04-004.Content: It appears that some categories of marine creatures have been deliberately misclassified. Images of some of the creatures have also been altered... Some have had things like extra limbs and organs added...

Mes03-cl04-005.Content: I requested permission to revise some of the material, but this was rejected. It's totally unreasonable!

Mes03-clplayer04A-001.Content: Do you think the radiation could have caused them to evolve?

Mes03-clplayer04B-001.Content: I mean, it's been a long time since the era your prototype lived in, Shiro.

Mes03-cl05-001.Content: Ev-Evolve!? I suppose... Yes, that could be a possibility.

Mes03-cl05-002.Content: Actually, no! Isn't evolution a really long process? How could it all happen at the same time?

Mes03-cl05-003.Content: But in that case... If radiation keeps increasing, then it's not out of the realm of possibility...

Mes03-cl05-005.Content: I need to consider this further.

Mes04-cl01A-001.Content: No way! Could I really have...

Mes04-cl01A-002.Content: I didn't... Didn't send to the wrong person!

Mes04-clplayer01B-001.Content: Then why would you say that?

Mes04-cl02-001.Content: This is a new species I just found in the database. Pretty cool, right?

Mes04-cl02-002.Content: They are camouflaged as highly toxic fungi, to avoid being eaten by marine predators.

Mes04-cl02-003.Content: However, they still contain chloroplasts and must ascend to the surface every day to photosynthesize.

Mes04-cl02-004.Content: This species' characteristics may be evidence of changes in the contemporary marine environment.

Mes04-cl03-001.Content: Seems like you're starting to act more like a partner now.

Mes04-cl03-002.Content: Well, that's it for today. Wait for me to make other interesting discoveries... I'll be sure to share them with you.

Mes05-cl01-001.Content: Every time I saw the ocean, I would realize how insignificant humanity is.

Mes05-cl01-002.Content: It's such a shame...Mastering interstellar travel, humans have long since lost their wonder of the oceans...

Mes05-cl01B-001.Content: It surely is hard to understand...

Mes05-cl02-001.Content: No matter what, humans who have made it off-planet really should acknowledge where they came from. That's the only way for a better future to be forged...

Mes05-cl02-002.Content: It's a pity... Maybe I was the only one who felt that way...

Mes05-clplayer02-001.Content: Then you have one companion now.

Mes05-cl03-003.Content: Even though you have your flaws as a partner, you're not bad as a kindred spirit.

Mes05-cl03-004.Content: Then I look forward to seeing how you perform in the future.

Mes06-cl01-001.Content: I heard you've accepted some pretty difficult missions lately...

Mes06-cl01-002.Content: I know it's what you have to do to climb the ladder, but... You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you?

Mes06-cl02-002.Content: It's because you're always so eager to please, I worry that you'll damage your health!

Mes06-cl02-003.Content: Uh-oh! Sent that a little impulsively...

Mes06-clplayer02A-001.Content: Looks like I've seen Shiro's cute side.

Mes06-cl02A-001.Content: I blame these keys for being too close together...

Mes06-clplayer02B-001.Content: Looks like I've seen a rare side of Shiro.

Mes06-cl02B-001.Content: You're... laughing at me, are you?

Mes06-cl03-002.Content: Don't get carried away! I only approve of you the tiniest little bit. You'd better keep up with me, otherwise, I'll leave you behind.

Mes06-cl03-003.Content: So... You gotta know your limits. Don't overdo it.

Mes06-cl04-001.Content: Well, don't face everything all by yourself. It's not a shame to ask for help.

Mes06-cl04-003.Content: Okay, well... I have stuff I need to do now.

Mes07-cl01-001.Content: There have been many tragedies recently, caused by conflicts between AIs and their partners, so I thought to come to ask...

Mes07-cl01-002.Content: What do you think of me?

Mes07-cl01-003.Content: No. Listen, don't get me wrong, I just think that getting to know each other a little more would be good for our future work.

Mes07-cl02-003.Content: How about some more suitable... realistic... Inspirational descriptions at the very least?

Mes07-clplayer04-001.Content: All in all, as my partner, you are one of a kind.

Mes07-cl05-001.Content: Oh. O-Okay... I never had a clue... So that's what you think of me.

Mes07-cl05-002.Content: Ahem... Seeing as I've been marked so highly, I'll have to show even more strength in the future.

Mes07-cl05-003.Content: Nice talking with you today. So long... Eh...Par-partner...

Mes08-cl01-001.Content: I... I heard that you can return any previously purchased Simulacra...

Mes08-cl01-002.Content: I don't think it's likely but... You haven't thought about replacing me, have you?

Mes08-cl02-002.Content: Hmph. Forget it. I'm well aware of my own temper!

Mes08-cl02-003.Content: Don't think I'm going to humor you. Replace me if you want! I like being by myself, anyway!

Mes08-clplayer02A-001.Content: Well, in that case, let's exchange for a Shiro who approves of me a bit more!

Mes08-cl03-002.Content: You... Aren't thinking of replacing me?

Mes08-clplayer03-001.Content: I really value you as a partner, Shiro. There's no way I'd replace you.

Mes08-cl04-002.Content: Sorry... I dropped my comms device.

Mes08-cl04-003.Content: Ahem... Anyway, looking at your performance so far, you're still a long way off earning my approval.

Mes08-cl04-004.Content: However, the silver lining is that this means you have lots of room to improve. If you keep trying, that is...

Mes08-cl04-005.Content: Who knows? My approval could come any second.

Mes09-cl01-001.Content: Sometimes I wonder if the sea is like us AIs in some respects.

Mes09-cl02-001.Content: This question always pops into my head when I look out over the sea.

Mes09-cl02-002.Content: The sea remains unchanged in people's eyes, no matter how many years pass...

Mes09-cl02-003.Content: It's the same with AIs. However long it's been, humans still think that we're the same as our prototypes.

Mes09-cl02-004.Content: We're the same as the sea in this respect... Restricted and defined by other people...

Mes09-clplayer02A-001.Content: The way I see it, Shiro's Shiro.

Mes09-clplayer03A-001.Content: Relationships between individuals are defined by themselves. For instance, we're partners because we see each other as such!

Mes09-cl04-002.Content: Ha! I never thought I'd see the day that you'd help me understand something.

Mes09-cl04-003.Content: Yes... I'm not the same person as I used to be. Now I have a partner with whom to share my joy and pain, and to explore the future together.

Mes09-cl04-004.Content: Will you... Will you stay with me? As I walk my path, striding into the future?

Mes09-cl05-001.Content: Thank you... I'm blessed to have a partner like you.

Mes10-cl01-001.Content: You've become more and more reliable lately. Although you do occasionally make little mistakes... you're much better than when you first started.

Mes10-clplayer01-001.Content: Do you recognize me now, Shiro?

Mes10-cl02-001.Content: Stupid, stupid... The answer to this question is clear, even if you didn't ask it.

Mes10-cl03-003.Content: But don't get complacent. I have high standards. If you misbehave just a little bit, or if I'm unsatisfied... I will immediately leave you.

Mes10-cl04-002.Content: In any case, you can give me more advice from now on.

Mes10-clplayer04-001.Content: Of course. I'm happy to help!

daily01-cl02-001.Content: Crap! I mixed them up again...

daily01-cl02-002.Content: I-I'm sorry. It was blocked automatically by the system just now. I've turned it off.

daily01-cl02-003.Content: Speaking of which, you only saw the prompt when you opened the interface, didn't you? Is there something you need to tell me?

daily01-cl03-002.Content: I'm going to turn the auto-blocking back on if you don't have anything else to say.

daily01-clplayer03-001.Content: But I also wanted to talk to you, Shiro.

daily01-cl04-002.Content: It's just that there are still some data I need to deal with... It shouldn't be long before I get to clear my schedule.

daily01-cl04-003.Content: A-Anyway, we'll get to whatever you want to say later!

daily02-cl01-001.Content: Some of AIs seem to be a bit too leisurely...

daily02-clplayer01-001.Content: Isn't it nice that AI also has their own life?

daily02-cl02-001.Content: Do you have some misunderstanding about the purpose of our existence?

daily02-cl02-002.Content: I thought only those who are unconditionally enthusiastic about their jobs are selected to be made into AIs.

daily02-cl02-003.Content: We're meant to be working as long as we're activated... Or am I wrong?

daily02-clplayer02-001.Content: Your hatred seems to be a bit deep, Shiro...

daily02-cl03-001.Content: Isn't that obvious? At least my curiosity for the ocean is endless.

daily02-clplayer03A-001.Content: Alright then... I was going to ask you to play with me.

daily02-cl04-002.Content: Y-You should have told us earlier about this...

daily02-cl04-003.Content: It is not highly praised to waste time to have fun, but if you're going to some scenic spots on a field trip for scientific research...

daily02-cl05-001.Content: That is not what I said! It's just a hypothesis! A hypothesis!

daily02-cl05-002.Content: I'm going back to work. If you happen to think of any spot that is worth studying... come to see me.

daily03-cl02-001.Content: Ugh, who knew I've sent it again while I was just being moody...

daily03-cl02-002.Content: It's not exactly an interesting topic. Are you sure you want to listen to me complain?

daily03-cl03-002.Content: Honestly... I think it is very understandable if human beings die out because of the backlash from nature.

daily03-cl03-003.Content: Their survival clearly depends on nature, and yet they keep on causing havoc... This kind of community basically deserves whatever bad ending they'll come to face.

daily03-cl04-001.Content: Something doesn't feel right about your reaction. Is there something you want to say?

daily03-clplayer04-001.Content: Do you hate me as well because I'm a human?

daily03-cl05-002.Content: If I hated you, I wouldn't have registered you as my partner, silly...

daily03-cl06-001.Content: I evaluate the behavior of individuals objectively. I don't hate an individual simply because of something about the group...

daily03-cl06-002.Content: Y-You can thank me for being generous.

daily03-cl07-001.Content: Ahem, I've spent too much time on this meaningless topic. That's it for now.

daily04-cl01-001.Content: I happen to be kind of... free, @player_name. Hmm, is there anything you want to know?

daily04-clplayer01-001.Content: Let's talk about the deep sea, okay?

daily04-cl02-002.Content: Ho-ho. I asked the right person!

daily04-cl02-003.Content: The view deep under the sea... It can't be described in words...

daily04-cl02-004.Content: The colorful shoals, the gorgeous coral reefs, and the warm current that brushes by from afar occasionally... They are incredible views that not even the eyes can take in completely.

daily04-clplayer02B-001.Content: It doesn't sound like deep sea...

daily04-cl02B-001.Content: This is why I said I can't describe it in words.

daily04-cl03-001.Content: H-How about... we explore the underwater sea together later?

daily05-cl01-001.Content: Say, do you have any wishes or... things you want?

daily05-cl02-002.Content: I don't understand it completely, but isn't enhancing the muscles the most preservative way to become powerful for carbon-based creatures?

daily05-cl02-003.Content: Some speak for spirituality, but there aren't any actual data supporting those theories, so I ignored them automatically.

daily05-cl02-004.Content: Say... How come you want to be more powerful all of a sudden?

daily05-clplayer02A-001.Content: I want to help Shiro more.

daily05-clplayer02B-001.Content: I want to offer Shiro better protection.

daily05-cl03-001.Content: D-Don't be so full of yourself. It'll take over a century before you can do things like these!

daily05-cl03-002.Content: However... it's your thought that makes me...

daily05-cl04-001.Content: It's nothing! I... I need to tend to some urgent problems!

daily01-gl01-001.Content: Have you ever run out of inspiration?

daily01-gl02-001.Content: I know @player_name is not a creator, but inspiration is necessary for many fields.

daily01-gl02-002.Content: In my case, there was hardly ever any period when I couldn't find any inspiration.

daily01-gl02-003.Content: So I'd say I'm very experienced at remaining inspired.

daily01-gl02-004.Content: Next time when you feel that you don't have any good ideas...

daily01-gl02-005.Content: Don't submit to your comfort zone. Try looking for more excitement.

daily02-gl02-001.Content: It's time to start today's work, too. I'd like to check if my instinct is ready for it.

daily02-gl02-002.Content: If you happen to have some coins with you, please toss one to let me guess whether it'll be the front or the back.

daily02-gl03-001.Content: Tell me when you're done tossing.

daily02-glplayer04-001.Content: Looks like Cobalt-B's ultra instinct is working as usual!

daily02-gl04-002.Content: Though I don't want to depend on this too much...

daily02-gl04-003.Content: But if it's lost without any signs someday, it'll definitely be very problematic...

daily03-gl01-001.Content: Although I march with this hand cannon, it's just one of my works.

daily03-gl01-002.Content: I'm using it only because it's more suitable for me.

daily03-glplayer01A-001.Content: What kind of weapon is it?

daily03-gl02-002.Content: The power of the new hand cannon... is pretty strong, I suppose.

daily03-gl02-003.Content: Is there anything else that needs to be explained?

daily03-glplayer02-001.Content: You cherish your weapon so much. I thought you would talk nineteen to the dozen about it...

daily03-gl03-001.Content: It's because I don't remember how I made it.

daily03-gl03-002.Content: I wanted to make a weapon I can use. I didn't even draw a plan. I just made it by instinct.

daily03-gl03-003.Content: And this is what I finally got.

daily03-gl03-004.Content: So it's not like I can talk about the secret of making it for a long time. Don't have your hopes high for no reason.

daily04-gl01-001.Content: Let me maintain the machinery you use in your daily life when necessary.

daily04-glplayer01B-002.Content: It's not too much trouble, is it?

daily04-gl02-001.Content: I told you to make use of my ability as much as possible, didn't I?

daily04-gl02-002.Content: I don't know how to teach... And I can't teach you. I'll just have to do it myself.

daily04-glplayer02-001.Content: Will any new plug-in components be added when I take it back?

daily04-gl03-002.Content: I must be in the right mood and have the proper inspiration when I add plug-in components...

daily04-gl03-003.Content: I'll wait for you to get me the things first.

daily04-gl03-004.Content: I'll know when I hold and weigh it in my hands.

daily05-gl01-001.Content: There's more to art than just painting, literature, and music...

daily05-gl01-002.Content: The ultimate machinery that I seek is something of works-of-art level.

daily05-gl02-002.Content: It can be big, like when it's transformed into a fortress. It can also be small, so small that you can hold it in one hand.

daily05-gl02-003.Content: The weight has to be able to change at any time according to the need. What's more, the ductility and shape-shifting ability must be excellent...

daily05-gl02-004.Content: Not only does it need to be able to fight, but it should also be able to fly, be ridden, and do housework...

daily05-gl02-005.Content: Experience the super-power-like aesthetic in it...

daily05-gl03-001.Content: You know how bad I am at explaining this kind of occult concept with words.

daily05-gl03-002.Content: Don't ask me this kind of question again. I can't give you a definite answer.

daily05-gl03-003.Content: It's not going to be produced anytime soon.

Mes01-gl01-002.Content: Umm, our partnership is going to be long-term from now on. I hope we'll get along well.

Mes01-glplayer01A-001.Content: I can't wait to work with you!

Mes01-glplayer01B-002.Content: I hope we'll have a good time collaborating.

Mes01-gl02-001.Content: You're too modest... I'm just a mechanic who's as ordinary as a screw.

Mes01-gl02-002.Content: I won't be modest with you, either. So let us both be more natural and open.

Mes01-gl02-003.Content: Some things should be said up front.

Mes01-gl02B-001.Content: Tut-tut. Like I said, don't be modest with me.

Mes01-gl03-001.Content: Although I can actually fight and am also willing to assist you as an AI Simulacrum in combats...

Mes01-gl03-002.Content: Strictly speaking, the driving force for me to fight is to "collect data on weapons" rather than to "defeat enemies and win."

Mes01-gl03-003.Content: I hope you will use my power with caution and with a full understanding of the risks that this implies.

Mes01-gl03-004.Content: I do feel kind of sorry about that... This way of thinking is deeply rooted. It's hard for me to go against it.

Mes01-gl03A-001.Content: Thank you. Something tells me you're going to be a nice partner.

Mes01-glplayer03B-001.Content: It is indeed risky to be like that on the battlefield...

Mes01-gl03B-001.Content: I've caused you trouble as soon as I came. My gut also told me I would say that.

Mes01-gl04-001.Content: From now on, you make the call for everything. I'll obey you.

Mes02-gl02-001.Content: It's a mini drone I made. That's the nickname for that little buddy.

Mes02-gl02-002.Content: I do regret that I didn't make it bigger. If I had, it would stand out more, and I wouldn't forget where I put it whenever my mind wanders.

Mes02-gl02-003.Content: And had I made a larger one, I would have been able to fit a dazzling disco ball inside...

Mes02-gl03-002.Content: You can see that as my little assistant.

Mes02-gl03-003.Content: When released in battle, it automatically provides a real-time view of the battlefield from above and sends the information to the weapon's receiving device to improve targeting accuracy.

Mes02-gl03-004.Content: It's like having a third eye.

Mes02-glplayer03B-001.Content: Then how come I've never seen or used it before...

Mes02-gl04-001.Content: This kind of feature is currently not accessible yet.

Mes02-gl05-001.Content: I don't think the drone is the problem. I think it's the weapon, which also carries some intelligent technologies that are not mature enough yet.

Mes02-gl05-002.Content: It is not impossible to do, but that equipment takes up too many resources. Firearms are weapons with weight, they shall be as light as possible. So in this regard, reducing the burden is a problem.

Mes02-gl05-003.Content: It's basically been applied in portable turret.

Mes02-gl05-004.Content: I predict that the new firearms in the future will most likely be improved in the direction of conducting joint combats with peripheral support drones.

Mes02-glplayer05B-001.Content: I look forward to using that kind of weapon!

Mes02-gl06-001.Content: Umm. Anyway, drones are very important partners, so let me know if you find Flappy.

Mes02-glplayer06-001.Content: How about adding a location feature so that finding it will be easier in the future?

Mes02-gl07-001.Content: That way the water-spraying system will have to be deleted. I veto.

Mes03-gl01-001.Content: All the other weapons you're carrying look interesting, too.

Mes03-gl01-002.Content: Do you mind if I make some changes to them?

Mes03-gl02-001.Content: Let's add some fun plug-ins to lighten the atmosphere and improve the quality of life.

Mes03-glplayer02B-001.Content: Is it a feature required for weapons?

Mes03-gl03-002.Content: No? Never mind then. I'll need to get the consent of other AI Simulacra anyway...

Mes03-gl03-003.Content: I'll play around with something nice from scratch later.

Mes04-gl01-001.Content: Speaking of it, @player_name, is this gift you're giving me an investment in my machinery creation business?

Mes04-glplayer01B-001.Content: I want to make friends with you.

Mes04-gl01A-001.Content: I'd assist you regardless of you doing that or not.

Mes04-gl02-001.Content: It's nice of you to provide me with the materials I need.

Mes04-gl02-002.Content: But it's not necessary to give me other stuff.

Mes04-gl02-003.Content: I'm not one of those who would feel more fulfilled and satisfied the more things they have.

Mes04-gl02-004.Content: Give it to someone who will find it useful, or save it for yourself.

Mes04-gl03-001.Content: Either way, I appreciate your thought.

Mes04-gl03-002.Content: Your investment will be worth it.

Mes05-gl01-001.Content: The work atmosphere at Banges Tech is actually quite nice.

Mes05-gl01-002.Content: At least our mission as mechanics of the weapon development department is simple. We are to create weapons that can be mass-produced.

Mes05-gl01-003.Content: And all the resources are invested to achieve this goal.

Mes05-glplayer01A-001.Content: Isn't it good to work at Hykros?

Mes05-gl01A-001.Content: I agree more with Hykros's ideas than with those of the Heirs of Aida.

Mes05-gl01A-002.Content: But making the future of mankind my responsibility is too much.

Mes05-glplayer01B-001.Content: But I heard that your wages...

Mes05-gl01B-002.Content: I don't like reading. Nor can I memorize theories. These are my flaws indeed, so I really can't complain about not being able to get promoted.

Mes05-gl02-001.Content: I just want to make the machinery products I want to make, and that's it. I have no other requests.

Mes05-gl02-002.Content: Being with you feels different from being at Banges Tech, but it's equally nice.
