Mes06-gl01-001.Content: How do you usually forge and enhance weapons?

Mes06-gl01-002.Content: Let me watch for a while.

Mes06-glplayer01B-001.Content: Can the master give me some advice?

Mes06-gl01B-001.Content: I told you. I'm a mechanic who's as ordinary as a screw.

Mes06-gl01B-002.Content: I can't give you the advice you hope for.

Mes06-gl02-001.Content: If you insist on me saying something, I'll say... look at your weapons more.

Mes06-gl02-005.Content: You'll vaguely realize how to enhance them in a better way.

Mes06-gl03-001.Content: Oh, my... I already told you.

Mes07-gl01-001.Content: During our journey, I always get to finish the job of collecting weapon test data just by coping with the usual combats.

Mes07-gl01-002.Content: In the past, we had to hire mercenaries as bodyguards to go to battles together or let them try out for free for this.

Mes07-glplayer01B-001.Content: Why didn't you try it yourself?

Mes07-gl02-001.Content: That's because my prototype knows nothing about combat. She has never been trained.

Mes07-gl03-002.Content: I never thought I can fight before my first combat.

Mes07-gl03-003.Content: But it probably takes being there in person for one to naturally get the idea and know that they should do this and then that...

Mes07-gl03-004.Content: I really have to thank myself for being able to fight properly.

Mes07-glplayer03-001.Content: Your instinct can achieve so many things...

Mes07-gl04-001.Content: Even so, I'm not keen on becoming numb and careless because I'm self-assured for having this talent that's invisible and irregular.

Mes07-gl04-002.Content: This is also why my prototype hired mercenaries to keep herself safe and sound.

Mes07-gl04-003.Content: The same goes for me. I only feel secure because I'm traveling with you.

Mes07-glplayer04-001.Content: Can't that instinct of yours make you feel secure?

Mes07-gl05-001.Content: There is no way to prove that it has eternal stability and accuracy.

Mes08-gl01-001.Content: I remember some bits and pieces. My parents...

Mes08-gl01-002.Content: It's quite incredible that @player_name has never thought of using my instinct for profit so far.

Mes08-glplayer01A-001.Content: I respect what you have in mind.

Mes08-gl02-001.Content: I want to think about some issues over a while longer...

Mes09-gl01-001.Content: @player_name, do you see AI Simulacrum as a weapon or as a companion?

Mes09-glplayer01A-001.Content: Haven't you noticed? The way you treat Simulacra is closer to how you treat companions.

Mes09-gl01A-001.Content: Or do you simply choose not to use a certain function of a weapon even though you know it can benefit you?

Mes09-gl01A-002.Content: Is it because you respect the weapon's will?

Mes09-gl01B-001.Content: I thought so. I have noticed that you've always been like this whoever you deal with.

Mes09-gl02-001.Content: To a certain extent, I can understand your view of "believing that tools also have souls" even though your situation is not entirely the same as mine.

Mes09-gl02-003.Content: The definition and the positioning in your heart may have a great influence.

Mes09-gl02-005.Content: Um, I knew I'm not good at explaining...

Mes09-gl02-006.Content: Please allow me to say it again.

Mes10-gl01-001.Content: I'm going to get right to the point, @player_name.

Mes10-gl01-002.Content: Other AI Simulacra may hope to get closer with you, that you could treat them like they have independent personalities.

Mes10-gl01-003.Content: They may want to become your companions and friends as you get closer...

Mes10-gl01-005.Content: I hope to become a pure "weapon" to you.

Mes10-gl02-001.Content: To me, some things are more important than "personal will"... Actually, there are quite a lot of them.

Mes10-gl02-002.Content: So there is no need to take "my will" as the top priority.

Mes10-gl02-003.Content: The art of machinery, a place to live, now there's you, @player_name, among others.

Mes10-gl02-004.Content: I don't want you to attach more importance to my will than to your needs. That's all.

Mes10-gl02-006.Content: Make the best use out of me and my work.

Mes10-gl02-007.Content: What I hope is to be the aide that makes you strongerto be your weapon.

Mes10-glplayer02B-001.Content: It's also my will that decides how to spend time with you, Cobalt-B.

Mes10-gl02B-001.Content: It's fine if that's what you think...

Mes10-glplayer03-001.Content: Based on this, I'll continue to hang out with you like before.

Mes01-kklt01-002.Content: I wanted to say hi to you first, he-he!

Mes01-kklt02-001.Content: Oh, no! Something's come up, I need to go.

Mes02-kklt02-001.Content: Well, recently I've been helping out at a nearby Shelter.

Mes02-kklt02-002.Content: Working in healthcare, I got used to being so busy every day.

Mes02-kklt02-003.Content: Maybe it's just the recent peace. Fewer people are being injured.

Mes02-kklt02-004.Content: You too! Take good care of yourself.

Mes03-kklt02-002.Content: I'm annoyed that you don't look after yourself better.

Mes03-kklt02-003.Content: You have to come find me the second you're hurt!

Mes03-kklt02-004.Content: I can offer more professional care!

Mes03-kklt02-007.Content: It should heal fast enough on its own. But if you'd come a little sooner...

Mes03-kklt02-008.Content: I understand that it's hard to avoid injuries in battle.

Mes03-kklt02-009.Content: But please don't be hard on yourself, and never hesitate to come to find me.

Mes04-kklt02-001.Content: Well, I thought of something that concerns her.

Mes04-kklt02-002.Content: Our prototypes worked together in the same research institute.

Mes04-kklt02-003.Content: Although both in the medical department,

Mes04-kklt02-004.Content: our dreams and ideals were different.

Mes04-kklt02-005.Content: Sometimes I think about her, and how she wished to reverse the aberrations.

Mes04-kkltplayer02-001.Content: Ideals aren't easily divided into noble or mediocre.

Mes04-kklt03-001.Content: Yep, I know! I really ought to thank you!

Mes04-kklt03-002.Content: Just knuckle down and do our jobs well.

Mes04-kklt03-003.Content: It's a great thing we're doing, too.

Mes05-kklt01-002.Content: I saw some earrings I really like!

Mes05-kklt01-004.Content: So soft and fluffy! I want to hold them so much.

Mes05-kklt02-001.Content: Hmm, I suppose I should say.

Mes05-kklt02-003.Content: Do you think I'm a little childish?

Mes05-kklt03-001.Content: Actually, I'm pretty good at making things myself.

Mes05-kklt03-002.Content: Like making finger puppets out of wool!

Mes05-kklt03-003.Content: I'm not bad at making small pieces of jewelry either.

Mes06-kklt02-002.Content: Banges is holding a Harvest Festival.

Mes06-kklt02-003.Content: Several new desserts are on display!

Mes06-kkltplayer02Breply-001.Content: No wonder you really want to go!

Mes06-kklt03-001.Content: Anyway, I don't even know why!

Mes06-kkltplayer03-001.Content: You really do believe other people, don't you.

Mes06-kklt04-001.Content: I always give people the benefit of the doubt.

Mes06-kklt04-002.Content: The world is full of kindness. I'm sure about that.

Mes07-kklt01-002.Content: Look how it shimmers, just like some enchanted object in fairytales.

Mes07-kklt01-003.Content: Could I take a closer look?

Mes07-kklt02-001.Content: Oh, it's a perfect size, too.

Mes07-kklt02-002.Content: Bracelet or earrings, what do you think?

Mes07-kklt02-003.Content: Oh! Am I being a little blunt?

Mes07-kklt02-004.Content: I just want to work on it a little.

Mes07-kkltplayer02A-001.Content: You want to make it into an accessory?

Mes07-kklt03-003.Content: I've never breathed a word of this, so...

Mes08-kklt01-002.Content: Compared with others, I don't really have a "past".

Mes08-kklt01A-001.Content: I know I shouldn't think like this.

Mes08-kklt01B-002.Content: The feeling that nothing very important is happening.

Mes08-kklt02-001.Content: The past I do have is most precious to me in the present.

Mes08-kklt02-005.Content: Saying it like that sounds a little boastful...

Mes08-kklt02-006.Content: But in reality, I don't have much "experience".

Mes08-kklt02-008.Content: What if something happens in the future?

Mes08-kklt02-009.Content: My experience might not be enough to weather whatever it is.

Mes08-kkltplayer02-001-1.Content: Personal growth is a slow process.

Mes09-kklt01-001.Content: Actually, I remembered something that really touched my prototype.

Mes09-kklt02-001.Content: To be exact, that's why I decided to devote my life to medical work.

Mes09-kklt02-002.Content: Once when I was very young, I got lost.

Mes09-kklt02-003.Content: I accidentally get on the surface.

Mes09-kklt02-005.Content: I didn't know how close I was to the aberration creatures' lair.

Mes09-kklt02-006.Content: Soon, enemies rushed out and attacked me...

Mes09-kklt02-007.Content: Of course, I was very lucky...

Mes09-kklt02-008.Content: An Executor who was on a mission nearby came and protected me.

Mes09-kklt02-009.Content: Actually, I can't remember the details of the whole thing.

Mes09-kklt02-010.Content: I just remember her back in the sun.

Mes09-kklt02-011.Content: She was seriously wounded by their claws, and the wound dripped with blood.

Mes09-kklt02-012.Content: She never told me her name.

Mes09-kklt02-013.Content: From then on, I made my decision.

Mes09-kklt02-014.Content: I had to do something for her and for all the people who protect everyone.

Mes09-kklt02-015.Content: It would be great if I could heal their pain.

Mes09-kkltplayer02-001.Content: You are always moving towards your own goals.

Mes09-kklt03-001.Content: Right! Of course, I also have more things to do.

Mes09-kklt03-002.Content: I have been devoted to my ambitions since then.

Mes09-kklt03-003.Content: I wish I could go a little further down the path of medicine.

Mes09-kklt03-005.Content: And make the world a better place...

Mes09-kklt03-006.Content: This is my wish, or rather, my ambition.

Mes09-kklt04-001.Content: With you by my side, I feel more confident!

Mes10-kklt01-001.Content: It suddenly occurred to me that we've known each other for a long time.

Mes10-kklt02-001.Content: Oh, it's just a little thing.

Mes10-kklt02-002.Content: I look back at my experience in the past.

Mes10-kklt02-003.Content: And I find that my relationships are quite simple.

Mes10-kklt02-004.Content: From first meeting you to getting to know you better...

Mes10-kklt02-005.Content: It's been a brand new experience for me.

Mes10-kklt02-006.Content: I'm so happy to meet you. Really.

Mes10-kkltplayer02-001.Content: You do the same for me.

Mes10-kklt03-001.Content: Glad you feel that way, too.

Mes10-kklt03-002.Content: Now we both have someone we can trust.

Mes10-kklt03-003.Content: We both understand and support one another.

Mes10-kklt03-004.Content: Phew! I've always really been lucky.

Mes10-kklt03-005.Content: Thank you. I'm so glad to have met you.

Mes10-kklt03-006.Content: You make every day so beautiful.

daily01-kklt01-001.Content: Do you remember the shell I talked about?

daily01-kklt02-001.Content: I've finally finished it. Wanna guess?

daily01-kklt02-002.Content: Bracelet or earrings? Which one of those did I make?

daily01-kklt02A-001.Content: Hee, you didn't get it right this time.

daily01-kklt02B-002.Content: I think there are two peas in this pod.

daily01-kklt03-001.Content: It's because I wanted you to be able to see it whenever you raise your hand or look down.

daily01-kklt03-002.Content: So I made it while imagining how you will look when you wear it.

daily01-kklt03-004.Content: Take it if you think it suits you.

daily01-kklt03-005.Content: I'm going to pick some other little accessories.

daily01-kklt03-006.Content: Uh, should I make myself one as well...

daily02-kklt01-001.Content: I've added some new accessories to the little fork today.

daily02-kklt02-001.Content: This is my emergency medical kit. More devices have been added.

daily02-kklt02-002.Content: This way, everyone will be able to get treated properly once they get hurt.

daily02-kklt02-003.Content: Of course, it would be best if there never comes a time when it needs to be used.

daily02-kklt02-004.Content: Whether it's you or other people.

daily02-kklt02-005.Content: I hope you all stay healthy.

daily02-kklt02-006.Content: So please be careful when you go on adventures.

daily02-kklt02-007.Content: Don't make me worry about the wounds you may have.

daily03-kklt01-001.Content: Some ores are really very beautiful.

daily03-kkltplayer01-001.Content: Do you like geology and minerals?

daily03-kklt02-001.Content: Uh, it's not that I'm interested in that.

daily03-kklt02-002.Content: Look how beautiful the colors and patterns of these stones are.

daily03-kklt02-003.Content: I was thinking about using them as decorations!

daily03-kklt02A-001.Content: Uh-huh. You also think they'd go together with the ornaments that have been made, don't you?

daily03-kkltplayer02B-001.Content: I-I've never given it much thought.

daily03-kklt02B-001.Content: So you're not good at matching colors and materials, are you?

daily03-kklt03-001.Content: Would you like me to help you out?

daily03-kklt03-002.Content: I have a rough idea about how to dress you.

daily03-kklt03-003.Content: I learned it from fashion magazines of course.

daily04-kklt01A-001.Content: Hey! Are you making fun of me on purpose?

daily04-kklt01A-003.Content: This hat doesn't look new at all!

daily04-kklt02-002.Content: There's a newborn penguin on it.

daily04-kkltplayer02-001.Content: I'll give it to you if I have anything like that.

daily04-kklt03-001.Content: Wow! I got more collections now.

daily04-kklt03-002.Content: Thank you! I'm so looking forward to it.

daily05-kklt01-001.Content: Sweet foods. What I wouldn't give to have some...

daily05-kkltplayer01-001.Content: I don't have any for now.

daily05-kklt02A-003.Content: But I crave so much for those delicate and exquisite little desserts!

daily05-kklt02A-004.Content: Holding them is like holding a small piece of artwork.

daily05-kklt02A-005.Content: And eat it before the butter melts!

daily05-kklt02A-006.Content: Uh... Next time, we go together. It's a date.

daily05-kklt02B-002.Content: I was thinking that we could buy some and have them together some other time.

daily05-kklt02B-003.Content: Looks like we'll have to share something else next time.

daily05-kklt02B-004.Content: About your preference... Looks like there are still a lot of notes to be made...

Mes01-sfyy02-001.Content: As far as I'm concerned, basic introductions have already been made. No point repeating them.

Mes01-sfyy02-002.Content: Can we please just cut to the chase? I was hoping you could also introduce yourself to me.

Mes01-sfyy02-003.Content: No need to be too formal. Best to mention that I don't like talking too seriously. So when we chat, just chill and relax, alright?

Mes01-sfyy02-004.Content: It seems we're gonna be stuck together for a pretty epic journey. I think it's important for us to get to know each other a little better, right?

Mes01-sfyy03-002.Content: Can you be more specific? I want to know more about @player_name.

Mes01-sfyy03-003.Content: Well, for example, do you have any hobbies? What do you like doing? What about food!? What's your favorite? Are you allergic to anything? Stuff like that!

Mes01-sfyy03A-002.Content: Okay, okay, I get the picture!

Mes01-sfyyplayer03B-001.Content: How about finding things out as we go?

Mes01-sfyy04-001.Content: @player_name, I'll do my best to be helpful, however long we're together!

Mes01-sfyy04-002.Content: Who's to say that we won't turn out to be best friends!? So I hope you don't mind if I keep bugging you!

Mes02-sfyy01-001.Content: Is anything interesting on the horizon, @player_name? Or anything you have to do, even if it is supremely tedious?

Mes02-sfyy01-003.Content: If there's anything I can help with, don't forget to call on me, okay?

Mes02-sfyyplayer01-001.Content: I hope it won't be grudgingly!

Mes02-sfyy02-002.Content: I already see @player_name as one of us. Are you saying you still don't?

Mes02-sfyy02-003.Content: If you need help, all you gotta do is ask. A friend in need is a friend indeed, and all that.

Mes02-sfyy02-005.Content: I get it. It's because @player_name still doesn't know just what I'm capable of, right?

Mes02-sfyy03-001.Content: Right, so I admit this may sound like I'm bragging, but I guarantee I've mastered more skills than you could possibly imagine.

Mes02-sfyy03-002.Content: If list them all, it would take... Well, how much time have you got?

Mes02-sfyy03-004.Content: I possess all of the "necessary skills for survival on this planet"!

Mes02-sfyyplayer03B-001.Content: Why don't you break it down for me?

Mes02-sfyy04-001.Content: Well, didn't I say it would take a really long time to list them all?

Mes02-sfyy04-002.Content: Instead of wasting time and energy talking about them, wouldn't it be more efficient for @player_name to see my skills in action?

Mes02-sfyy05-001.Content: So, come find me the next time there's anything that needs doing, no matter what it is!

Mes02-sfyy05-002.Content: Of course, don't forget to bring other Simulacra along for the ride too! The more the merrier!

Mes03-sfyy01-001.Content: Getting together in a group has a much different feeling than doing your own thing.

Mes03-sfyy01-002.Content: I'm perfectly happy in my own company, but it's nice being with people, too!

Mes03-sfyy01-003.Content: Oh, and I love to talk! Wouldn't it be dreary to have no one around to listen, and only be able to talk to yourself?

Mes03-sfyyplayer01A-001.Content: Well, why don't you tell me?

Mes03-sfyy01A-001.Content: Ho-ho! You mean you're ready to be my confidante now?

Mes03-sfyyplayer01B-001.Content: Then get together with everyone more often.

Mes03-sfyy01B-002.Content: But in this team only @player_name, the real human, is the true boss, right?

Mes03-sfyy02-001.Content: Everyone gets their directions from you, you make all the important decisions. Our success work as a team depends on you, like, all of it!

Mes03-sfyyplayer02-001.Content: You really care about the team.

Mes03-sfyy03-001.Content: After all, it's not like I can decide things for the group. It's up to everyone in it.

Mes03-sfyy03-002.Content: As for me? What I'm most concerned with, the most critical thing is that...

Mes03-sfyy03-003.Content: "If our group has a good chance to survive on this continent."

Mes03-sfyy04-001.Content: It's like "going with the wind," or "being able to go wherever we like, even with the winds against us."

Mes03-sfyyplayer04A-001.Content: I would say we have the ability?

Mes03-sfyyplayer04B-001.Content: The more you explain, the more I'm lost...

Mes03-sfyy05-001.Content: ... Don't jump to the conclusion. This will need some time to observe.

Mes03-sfyy05-002.Content: I'm also a part of it, and will make use of all my facets for the good of this group.

Mes04-sfyy01-001.Content: You've had to deal with lots of Hyenas, right? How do you feel about them?

Mes04-sfyy02-002.Content: How to say this politely... They're not the sharpest tools in the box.

Mes04-sfyy02-003.Content: Actually, it can be quite fun messing around with them. For a little while, at least.

Mes04-sfyy02-004.Content: They're simple and direct about what they want, but not very skilled. Making a living by stealthy banditry suits them best.

Mes04-sfyy02-005.Content: It's not a bad group if you just want to hang out with other thugs...

Mes04-sfyy02-006.Content: Thinking about it, maybe one of the reasons they could be considered not all bad, is that they have such exuberance.

Mes04-sfyy02-007.Content: That is indeed a remarkable and admirable aspect!

Mes04-sfyyplayer02-001.Content: But if so, then why choose to leave?

Mes04-sfyy03-001.Content: Exactly! Why would my prototype choose to leave?

Mes04-sfyy03-002.Content: So heartless! She clearly had a good relationship with them once, with a lot of trust on both sides. So why just walk away!?

Mes04-sfyy03-003.Content: ... Those sort of questions are pointless.

Mes04-sfyy04-001.Content: "Leave" is inaccurate. My prototype may have stayed for a while, but never really joined them properly.

Mes04-sfyy04-002.Content: Don't worry too much about definitions. I can't explain it either.

Mes04-sfyy04-003.Content: But I suppose, psychologically speaking, from an observational perspective it was simply keeping an appropriate distance.

Mes05-sfyy01-001.Content: Listen, I think you've kind of noticed, so let me just get this out.

Mes05-sfyy02-001.Content: I don't think you've properly considered this problem.

Mes05-sfyy02-002.Content: You might be able to understand if you look at it from my perspective. As a Simulacrum, packed with the purchased weapon and delivered to your door along, I have no freedom to choose.

Mes05-sfyy02-003.Content: I envy my prototype that she is really, truly free.

Mes05-sfyy02-004.Content: However, while Hykros conveniently left Simulacra data to use, they never once considered "us" who would be created in the future.

Mes05-sfyy03-001.Content: Not at all. I mean it.

Mes05-sfyy03-002.Content: It's like if you're angry or unhappy about something, might you not feel as though life is not going as planned, and so you blame your mother for giving birth to you?

Mes05-sfyy03-003.Content: If my prototype had not left the data behind, neither I nor my current mood would exist.

Mes05-sfyy03-004.Content: So I'm not complaining to her, and since it's "me" anyway, I can probably guess...

Mes05-sfyy03-005.Content: She doesn't care about others, and just does what her mood dictates at the moment.

Mes05-sfyyplayer03-001.Content: So, what are you getting at?

Mes05-sfyy04-001.Content: I mean, you can see from the intel that I'm not the sort of person who's used to staying in one place for very long. Right, @player_name?

Mes05-sfyy04-002.Content: I'm not gonna deny that maybe I lack loyalty. Perhaps going over to the Heirs of Aida was a little stab in Hykros' Backstabbing.

Mes05-sfyy04-003.Content: I must say that I'm a little surprised you still treat me the same as the others.

Mes05-sfyyplayer04-001.Content: Didn't you say you wanted to get on?

Mes05-sfyy05-001.Content: Ha-ha-ha! I say that to everyone. Well, I guess that proves I mean it.

Mes05-sfyy05-002.Content: Well, interpret it as a little test.

Mes05-sfyy05-003.Content: You're free to act however you like.

Mes06-sfyy01-001.Content: Speaking of which, are you from Astra Shelter, @player_name?

Mes06-sfyy01-002.Content: Oh... Right, you are saved by Astra Shelter?

Mes06-sfyy01B-001.Content: You mean my prototype? Saying she's from there is... Not entirely wrong, but the "saved" part isn't quite right.

Mes06-sfyy02-001.Content: I really like what shelters stand for. Helping each other get by under such trying circumstances.

Mes06-sfyy02-002.Content: Organizations which operate on such a principle are simple and stable.

Mes06-sfyy02-003.Content: My prototype didn't stay in Astra Shelter long, however. These days, I doubt if anyone even remembers her name.

Mes06-sfyy03-002.Content: Of course, they may not be happy to see me!

Mes06-sfyy03-003.Content: I didn't even really fit in with the shelter, as it was more on the defensive and vulnerable side. Tedious.

Mes06-sfyy03-004.Content: Once I realized that, I chose to get out of there.

Mes06-sfyy04-001.Content: Would it be more accurate to say that I naturally gravitate towards the side with the upper hand?

Mes06-sfyy04-002.Content: The right of self-determination. The freedom to not just stay put, but to go elsewhere. Isn't that what people desire?

Mes06-sfyy04-003.Content: Of course, another important factor is how engaging the people there were.

Mes06-sfyy04-004.Content: In that regard, Astra Shelter beats the Hyenas hands down.

Mes06-sfyy04-005.Content: Still wasn't enough to keep me there, though.

Mes07-sfyy01-001.Content: My thinking and mental state have a little time difference with my prototype's.

Mes07-sfyy01-002.Content: Because the data was preserved when I was still working for Hykros.

Mes07-sfyy01-003.Content: The prototype eventually picked Tsubasa from the Heirs of Aida, right?

Mes07-sfyy02-001.Content: My guess is that when she agreed to leave the data, she still hadn't decided to join the Heirs.

Mes07-sfyy02-002.Content: So what caused it all? I have no memory of that.

Mes07-sfyy02-003.Content: I guess I can understand it, though, to some extent.

Mes07-sfyy02-004.Content: Even if there's no reason behind it, you should at least have the freedom to do whatever you want.

Mes08-sfyy01-001.Content: I've been wondering... Traveling here and there all over this land, will I ever have the chance to meet my prototype?

Mes08-sfyy01-002.Content: Hypothetically, @player_name, what would happen if I ran into her?

Mes08-sfyy01-003.Content: Since she's an Heirs of Aida...

Mes08-sfyy01B-001.Content: It's so predictable. First, she'll come running up yelling "friendlies," ignoring our faction difference, and try to befriend us.

Mes08-sfyy01B-002.Content: Then, from my perspective, however I look at it, I can't help but feel a fight will break out.

Mes08-sfyy02-001.Content: When the time comes, I'll be by your side as we punish the defectors, in my role as Hykros' Tsubasa!

Mes08-sfyy02-002.Content: Ah! I'm really looking forward to it! Super stoked!

Mes08-sfyy02-003.Content: I really hope I can meet her soon.

Mes09-sfyy01-002.Content: Honestly, according to my investigation, the power you and your companions bring to the table will have a hard time competing with the two largest organizations.

Mes09-sfyy01-003.Content: You don't have that many people...

Mes09-sfyy01-005.Content: I still want to stay here, hmm?

Mes09-sfyy01-006.Content: That means that everyone here, including you, really interests me!

Mes09-sfyyplayer01A-001.Content: I'll take that as a compliment.

Mes09-sfyy02-001.Content: Hey, I just wanted to say this.

Mes09-sfyyplayer02-001.Content: Tsubasa has been coming to me recently and speaking less?

Mes09-sfyy03-001.Content: As the saying goes, a hedge between keeps friendship green.

Mes09-sfyy03-002.Content: You don't need to be particularly long-winded to maintain a friendship, as long as your hearts are close.

Mes09-sfyy03-003.Content: It's all said and done. We can talk next time when we'd like to.

Mes10-sfyy01-001.Content: I found a little detail that was wrong before.

Mes10-sfyy01-002.Content: I came here to correct it!

Mes10-sfyy02-002.Content: Although the data corresponds, allow me to clarify it overall!

Mes10-sfyyplayer02-001.Content: Do you want to join the Heirs of Aida, too?

Mes10-sfyy04-002.Content: That's my self-introduction! The updated version!

daily01-sfyy01-001.Content: If you ask me, who's not an Heirs of Aida, their place is not necessarily more interesting than yours.

daily01-sfyy01-002.Content: I mean it. It's a genuine compliment.

daily01-sfyyplayer01B-001.Content: Whether it's interesting or not is not important.

daily01-sfyy01B-001.Content: Hey, the word "interesting" has multiple implications.

daily01-sfyy01B-002.Content: It may not be what you thought it to be. To a certain extent, it probably indicates... say, whether our wavelengths are matching.

daily01-sfyy02-001.Content: But you do take the organization's credo as the most important criteria when you judge.

daily01-sfyy02-002.Content: I simply think that compared to those insubstantial things...

daily01-sfyy02-003.Content: The environment I'm in and the atmosphere I can truly feel when I'm with other members...

daily01-sfyy02-004.Content: And what the organization's resources and capabilities can bring to individuals.

daily01-sfyy02-005.Content: For members, those are relatively practical and the parts that can affect them the most.

daily01-sfyy02-006.Content: That is to say, I would prioritize these two elements for consideration.

daily01-sfyyplayer02A-001.Content: Is it that the atmosphere here is nice?

daily01-sfyyplayer02B-001.Content: Is it that enough things are being provided here?

daily01-sfyy03-001.Content: A small independent force formed by an interesting handful of people has both the advantages of collectivism and individualism.

daily01-sfyy03-002.Content: The joy and the out-of-the-ordinary experiences it provided are the rewards for me.

daily02-sfyy01-001.Content: The wind direction has been volatile lately.

daily02-sfyy01-002.Content: It's like an oracle! Is it a sign telling us that something historic, which will change the landscape of the continent, is about to happen?

daily02-sfyy02-001.Content: Humph... This is something you do not understand.

daily02-sfyy02-002.Content: A lot of times, things in nature can be certain harbingers of unrest in human society...

daily02-sfyy02-003.Content: Many cases in history cannot be proven to be coincidental...

daily02-sfyy03-002.Content: Let's say it's not a reflection of something specific in human society, couldn't it be a sign that some natural disasters are about to happen in the next few days then?

daily02-sfyy03-003.Content: Come on. What's wrong with being sensitive?

daily02-sfyy03-004.Content: When the storm hits, everyone would realize they're nothing but small boats.

daily02-sfyy03-005.Content: So only experienced veterans who can foresee the disasters would underpin their boats in advance.

daily02-sfyy03-006.Content: However, you don't really need to worry about this, @player_name.

daily02-sfyy03-007.Content: After all, you're with me, who's really good at interpreting the wind.

daily03-sfyy01-001.Content: This bow was a gift from the Hyenas actually.

daily03-sfyy01-002.Content: It's was quite a long time ago...

daily03-sfyy01-003.Content: After my prototype joined, she soon became a cadre second only to the heads. Seemed like everyone had great esteem for her.

daily03-sfyy01-004.Content: And then, after they got drunk, they said that they were going to get her the best weapon they could get with all the Hyenas' manpower and resources.

daily03-sfyy01-005.Content: My prototype chimed in with them and added fuel to the fire of course! As the saying goes, a promise is a promise. Isn't that right?

daily03-sfyy01-006.Content: And then this is what they got. It has accompanied me for quite a long time. It's really handy, and it's cold to the touch, which is quite comfortable.

daily03-sfyy01-007.Content: I really have to thank the Hyenas. Yo-ho!

daily03-sfyy01-008.Content: Thanks to them, my prototype got to meet the one and only good partner who hasn't left or forsaken her up to now.

daily03-sfyy01B-001.Content: Something's not right with what you said, but never mind.

daily03-sfyy02-001.Content: My prototype broke off all relations with the Hyenas a long time ago though.

daily03-sfyy02-002.Content: I can't recall any emotions either. Neither did I feel unwilling to let go... nor did I hesitate about quitting.

daily03-sfyy02-003.Content: Anyway, we shall make the most of this gift, which was to prove their feelings for me.

daily04-sfyy01-001.Content: Listen to me! Listen to me!

daily04-sfyy02-001.Content: I went out alone for a while.

daily04-sfyy02-002.Content: And weird things happened to me. It was so funny.

daily04-sfyy02-003.Content: I'll tell you in detail when we meet in person!

daily04-sfyyplayer02.Content: When did you go out alone?

daily04-sfyy03-003.Content: What a valuable clue it is. Does it covertly prove that if I want to leave, I'm capable of doing so anytime?

daily04-sfyy04-001.Content: I don't want to do that now, but who knows.

daily04-sfyy04-002.Content: You should be mentally and physically prepared for that.

daily05-sfyy01-002.Content: When you gonna get a new Simulacrum AI weapon?

daily05-sfyy01A-001.Content: That's awesome! I'm already looking forward to it!

daily05-sfyy01B-001.Content: Oh, really? Why don't you give it some more thought?

daily05-sfyy02-001.Content: Oh, I can't wait! I really want some new companions!

daily05-sfyy02-002.Content: I want to experience what it's like to meet all sorts of different people, the effect they'll have on me, and whether they'll broaden my horizons!

daily05-sfyy02-003.Content: Bringing in the best people from different fields will only make our forces stronger and more comprehensive.

daily05-sfyy02-004.Content: The whole atmosphere will get a boost from the newcomers. It'll be a lot more lively, more vibrant.

daily05-sfyy02-005.Content: Too many advantages! Don't you think so? I always say, the more new blood the better.

daily05-sfyy02-006.Content: So, don't forget to tell me first whenever someone new joins! I care about this a lot.

daily05-sfyy03-001.Content: Great! Let's raise a glass for all the coming new friendships! Cheers!

Mes01-king02-001.Content: Explain to me what Simulacrum AI is for.

Mes01-king03-001.Content: Oh, so Simulacrum AI... That's me.

Mes01-king03-002.Content: Concepts and general knowledge flood in at activation.

Mes01-king03-003.Content: Well yes, there are instructions. But I detest small print and long paragraphs.

Mes01-king03-004.Content: How about you don't waste time and just tell me who I have to take out?

Mes01-kingplayer03A-001.Content: To be precise, it offers support in all combat scenarios...

Mes01-kingplayer03B-001.Content: Basically, getting rid of all my enemies...

Mes01-king04-003.Content: What does that mean, a "long term contract"?

Mes01-king04-004.Content: Can't you explain it a little better?

Mes01-kingplayer04A-001.Content: It'll be tough to explain it in just a few words.

Mes01-kingplayer04B-001.Content: I suspect you'll fully grasp it in a bit of actual practice.

Mes01-king05-002.Content: Let's talk about the payment once I've wrapped my head around it.

Mes02-king01-001.Content: I think I've worked out what's up with this job.

Mes02-king01-002.Content: Lemme get the unpleasantness out of the way first.

Mes02-king01-003.Content: Don't think you can just use me however you like, even if I am a copied AI.

Mes02-king01-004.Content: You want me to do things, you gotta pay me in return. Fair pay for fair work. You understand that, right?

Mes02-king01-005.Content: I'll be straight with you too. I'm sure you know the prototype whom I was based on.

Mes02-king01-006.Content: Listen, I'll be frank. My time's not cheap, and I want you to be prepared.

Mes02-kingplayer01A-001.Content: So how do you want me to settle?

Mes02-king02-001.Content: I'm not gonna beat around the bush. It's simple  you pay me, I get the job done. That's it.

Mes02-king02-002.Content: However, I'm still not sure just how long and how difficult are the things you need to do around here.

Mes02-king02-003.Content: We can come back to that.

Mes03-king01-001.Content: Might be a little late to say it now.

Mes03-king01-002.Content: I just realized that this job means... I have to follow you around all the time?

Mes03-king02-001.Content: I don't think I can go for too long without some form of entertainment.

Mes03-king02-002.Content: I can't let my hair down properly just anywhere, you get me?

Mes03-king02-003.Content: I get annoyed if I'm not able to spend whatever I want on whatever I want.

Mes03-king03-001.Content: Don't think too much. It's not like you need to do anything, anyway.

Mes03-king03-002.Content: I just wanted to let you know.

Mes03-king03-003.Content: Gimme work that's not so tedious that I regret giving up all this to accompany you.

Mes04-king01-001.Content: You know, those other Simulacra with you...

Mes04-king02-002.Content: I'm just a little irritated. And confused.

Mes04-king02-004.Content: I work alone. Always have done. If I absolutely had to work with others, it was never more than two.

Mes04-king02-005.Content: They weren't colleagues either, but my employer.

Mes04-king02-006.Content: I also rarely even communicate with other mercenaries. Sometimes it's hard for me to understand those in pure companionship.

Mes04-king02-007.Content: Even without any vested interests, they still do things with motivation.

Mes04-king02-008.Content: Is this normal? It doesn't make much sense to me.

Mes04-king02-009.Content: I guess I just didn't understand.

Mes04-kingplayer02A-001.Content: Benefit means different things to different people.

Mes05-king01-001.Content: Have you ever seen the people truly on the bottom rung in Crown?

Mes05-kingplayer01B-001.Content: So what do you mean by bottom rung?

Mes05-king02-001.Content: Miners still have value as laborers, at least.

Mes05-king02-002.Content: Lower still are the people who, for whatever reason, have lost even labor value with only their lives left.

Mes05-king02-003.Content: It's a common sight in such mining areas. Those with broken limbs, strange illnesses... and overall incapacitated ones.

Mes05-king02-004.Content: Look, the next time you pass through Crown. You'll see many poor souls, laboring under the sweltering sun and being squeezed for value.

Mes05-king02-005.Content: But in other places, out of sight, in the dark... Even worse things happen.

Mes05-king03-002.Content: For example, I've seen strong, able-bodied men drag a disabled guy out into the middle of nowhere and snatch his suppressor.

Mes05-king03-003.Content: Then they made it look like the poor guy had been attacked by aberration creatures himself.

Mes05-king03-004.Content: All to scrap the suppressor, sell the parts, and go surfing.

Mes05-king04-002.Content: I'm in a good mood today, so wanted to have a chat with you. It seems I've said too much.

Mes05-king04-003.Content: I hope you may understand better, though, why I have to make sure I always have value.

Mes05-king04-004.Content: Having barely enough to survive is the same as having nothing. For, if you find yourself in that state, whatever is left will soon be taken.

Mes05-king04-006.Content: Still not enough. I need more to be content.

Mes05-king04-007.Content: I gotta have many, things. Lots of things. So many that I can't count them.

Mes05-king04B-001.Content: I'll take that as you're starting to understand.

Mes06-king01-001.Content: Most people don't want to get near me, let alone make friends. But you're quite the character.

Mes06-king01-002.Content: What's more, you don't seem on the verge of asking about... My hobbies?

Mes07-king02-002.Content: The Banges Business Association sometimes paid for other mercs to come to harass me.

Mes07-king02-003.Content: A fellow I drink with one evening might greet me with a knife the very next morning.

Mes07-king02-004.Content: It really was troublesome, unexpected, and utterly pointless. I could take them all down, but for what? There's no profit, but it would be an effort anyway.

Mes07-king02-005.Content: So they can neither beat me nor make any money. Pretty much a lose-lose situation, right?

Mes07-king02-006.Content: But needing to make the same thankless effort over and over again is just... Ridiculous.

Mes07-kingplayer02-001.Content: Though would we even be here, if it wasn't for that debt...?

Mes07-king03-001.Content: Trust me, I wish I could pay off my debts and stop all this hassle, but the interest alone keeps adding up with no end.

Mes07-king03-003.Content: I've suddenly understood the benefit of following you around everywhere.

Mes07-king03-004.Content: It's a much easier life traipsing around after you, compared to the troubled one of my prototype.

Mes08-king01-001.Content: Hey, is it normal to keep remembering bits of the past now and then?

Mes08-king01-002.Content: It's not pleasant to re-experience nearly dying, even in a dream.

Mes08-king02-001.Content: Eh? Oh, it was when the first time I got into a fight with a group of guys...

Mes08-king02-002.Content: Long story, ultimately boring. I almost didn't make it, is the main thing.

Mes08-king02-003.Content: That experience taught me not to fight bare-handed anymore, however, and I've never been so close to death again since.

Mes08-king03-002.Content: Crown's a rotten place, where the weak are inevitably abused.

Mes08-king03-003.Content: If you don't stand up for yourself, you're just waiting for death.

Mes08-king04-001.Content: ... Have I not told you that I don't actually like being called that?

Mes08-king04-002.Content: It's just because I don't have another name to use.

Mes08-king04-003.Content: My prototype, my personality, is the way it is now because I have no desire to regress to what I was. It's not because I wanted to become anything in particular.

Mes08-king04-006.Content: I can't be bothered to explain. Dunno why I'm even talking so much, anyway.

Mes09-king01-001.Content: There are actually a lot of people who wish they could eliminate the real me.

Mes09-king01-002.Content: I don't know what happened... So far, I've been killing it all.

Mes09-king01-003.Content: But I'm only getting into more and more troubles...

Mes09-king01-004.Content: The status quo hasn't changed, so it wouldn't be shocking for me to die at any moment.

Mes09-king01-005.Content: I place so much importance on instant entertainment because I have been in that situation for a long time.

Mes09-king01-006.Content: I always want to get everything out of every single moment, cuz I don't know how long my life will last.

Mes09-king01-007.Content: Jeez... I am milking myself, too.

Mes09-kingplayer09-001.Content: I didn't expect you to say something like that.

Mes09-king02-002.Content: Sometimes, I also want to muse on my life calmly.

Mes10-kingplayer02B-001.Content: The first time you ever call me by my name.

Mes10-king02B-001.Content: Huh? Why can't I call you by your name?

Mes10-king03-001.Content: Although I also really want to cut to the chase.

Mes10-king03-002.Content: I actually haven't thought anything through yet. I just spoke to you on impulse.

Mes10-king03-003.Content: I'm always happy to be your opponent, even if I lose.

Mes10-king03-004.Content: Let's go back and arrange in detail, and when I find a suitable project...

Mes10-king03-005.Content: Let's bet something valuable against each other and give it a go.

Mes10-king04-002.Content: I have a hunch that it would be a thrilling experience I've never had before.

daily01-king01-001.Content: Have you ever watched an arena contest?

daily01-king01-002.Content: Not the kind that's official and on a grand scale, but the... How should I put it...

daily01-king01-003.Content: Feels like something related to the black market. Underground arena.

daily01-king02-001.Content: Oh, I basically worked there before I became a mercenary.

daily01-king02-002.Content: If you're lacking in entertainment, I suggest you check it out.

daily02-king01-001.Content: This scythe is actually also one of the loans my prototype is burdened with.

daily02-king02-002.Content: You can say it's the only thing that didn't cost me a penny to get.

daily02-king02-003.Content: But in exchange for using it freely, I need to support the developer regularly... which is kind of troublesome.

daily02-king03-001.Content: Some bodyguard-like duties and submitting data regularly.

daily02-king03-002.Content: But I'm definitely reaping more benefits than she is. This stuff is of high quality, indeed. It's perfect.

Mes01-HildaReply01-B.Content: Uh, well good to meet you, again.

Mes01-Hilda02-002.Content: Just ask if there's anything I can help with. Don't be shy!

Mes01-Hilda02-003.Content: Oh, by the way, I could be your guide if you ever want to go to Banges.

Mes02-Hilda03-001.Content: Er, I don't know what to say.

Mes02-Hilda03-002.Content: Today's like every other day, and that's just great!

Mes02-Hilda03-003.Content: I don't have as lofty dreams or ambitions as others.

Mes02-Hilda03-004.Content: It's enough just to live each day in peace.

Mes02-Hilda04-001.Content: Right? Being happy is the most important thing.

Mes03-Hilda02-001.Content: To be honest, I haven't thought about what to do.

Mes03-HildaReply02-A1.Content: That's what I was thinking! Let's go surfing!

Mes03-HildaReply02-A2.Content: How about we have a race?

Mes03-HildaReply02-A3.Content: I don't mean to brag, but there wasn't a single person who could beat me in Banges!

Mes03-HildaReply02-B1.Content: Ha-ha! Just what I was thinking!

Mes03-HildaReply02-B2.Content: Let me show you the awesome power of the Banges Bargaining Queen!

Mes03-HildaReply02-B3.Content: Listen, I'm in the prime of life. I've been around the block a few times, I know what I'm doing, and I can still tango with the best of them!

Mes03-HildaReply02-B4.Content: Uh, why do I always feel like I said the wrong thing...?

Mes03-Hilda03-001.Content: Anyway, I'll pack up and go out right now!

Mes03-Hilda03-004.Content: Now, where did I put it...

Mes03-Hilda04-002.Content: Gotta look all over the place first, right!?

Mes04-Hilda01-001.Content: Can you make paper pinwheels? I bought some colorful paper on a whim while out shopping.

Mes04-HildaReply01-A.Content: Ha-ha! Well, we can make them together!

Mes04-HildaReply01-B.Content: That doesn't matter, I can teach you! You'll pick it up in no time.

Mes04-Hilda02-001.Content: You know, looking at pinwheels takes me back...

Mes04-Hilda02-002.Content: I folded countless paper pinwheels before the Graceday celebrations, to decorate the Port.

Mes04-Hilda02-003.Content: Just think about it! All those pretty, colorful pinwheels spinning together in the sea breeze.

Mes04-Hilda02-004.Content: They livened up the place, almost like they were celebrating the festival too.

Mes04-Hilda03-001.Content: I never could have foreseen what happened!

Mes04-Hilda03-002.Content: The wind picked up, as forecast, but it brought a torrential downpour!

Mes04-Hilda03-003.Content: All of those paper pinwheels got soaked and totally disintegrated! That was a horrible sight indeed!

Mes04-Hilda03-004.Content: All that effort! Excitement! Fun! Wasted!

Mes04-Hilda04-001.Content: That's right! I'll give it another go next time!

Mes05-Hilda01-002.Content: Do you really have all that much to do?

Mes05-HildaPlayer01.Content: It really is a little overwhelming...

Mes05-Hilda02-002.Content: The greater the power, the greater the responsibility. Isn't that what they say?

Mes05-Hilda02-003.Content: I know this all too well myself.

Mes05-Hilda02-004.Content: As the Banges Bargaining Queen, Banges Cross-Country Champion, Banges Surfmaster, Banges Drift Artist, Banges Patrol Exemplar, and Banges Celebrated Warrior...

Mes05-Hilda02-005.Content: I truly sympathize with your strenuous, difficult work!

Mes05-HildaPlayer02-B.Content: Aren't you forgetting Banges's Biggest Braggart?

Mes05-HildaReply02-B.Content: Biggest Braggart...? Ha... At least it says "Biggest." Should I add that to my card...?

Mes05-Hilda03-001.Content: ANYWAY! I still insist! That you are always too busy!

Mes05-Hilda03-002.Content: THEREFORE! You need a vacation! I hereby give you approval!

Mes05-Hilda03-003.Content: As for where to go... Please wait while I pick a few of the best spots for fishing.

Mes06-Hilda01-001.Content: After traveling quite extensively with you, I...

Mes06-Hilda01-002.Content: I still think that Banges is the best.

Mes06-Hilda01-003.Content: I don't mean that other places aren't great! Astra's scenery, for example, is stunning!

Mes06-Hilda01-004.Content: It's just... I don't know how to best express myself.

Mes06-Hilda01-005.Content: Every tree and plant in Banges... I just close my eyes, and I know they're here.

Mes06-Hilda01-006.Content: My existence is already inextricably linked with that of Banges.

Mes06-Hilda02-001.Content: Yes. I belong here, belong to this little port town.

Mes06-Hilda02-002.Content: But you're also very important to me.

Mes06-Hilda02-003.Content: I'll be with you, wherever you go.

Mes06-Hilda02-004.Content: But I still wish I could stay in Banges for a while!

Mes06-Hilda02-005.Content: I'll treat you to some fried chicken the next time we go.

Mes07-Hilda02-001.Content: I saw that game consoles are all the rage right now, so I wanted to see what all the fuss was about.

Mes07-Hilda02-002.Content: How could I, Hilda, the renowned Banges Drift Artist, lose to a mere child!?

Mes07-Hilda02-003.Content: It was a fluke! Just watch our rematch!

Mes07-Hilda02-004.Content: I'm really not bragging, you know.

Mes07-Hilda02-005.Content: In Banges, I'm the undisputed queen of bargaining and vehicle racing.

Mes07-Hilda02-006.Content: So it stands to reason that a trivial car racing game should be easy.

Mes07-HildaPlayer02-A.Content: They're not quite the same, you know.

Mes07-HildaReply02-A.Content: I'm just not convinced I've met a real opponent...

Mes07-HildaPlayer02-B.Content: There's always someone better than you.

Mes07-HildaReply02-B.Content: It's eye-opening! So he'll be good at real racing, too...?

Mes07-Hilda03-001.Content: So! Whether racing for real or just in a game, I need more practice!

Mes07-Hilda03-002.Content: I shall select one lucky opponent from the audience at random.

Mes07-Hilda03-005.Content: Accompany me for some special training! Our goal: DOUBLE RACING CHAMP, in life and game!

Mes07-HildaPlayer03.Content: Who knows? Maybe I'll be the champion.

Mes07-Hilda04-001.Content: Are you challenging me? Excellent! I accept it!

Mes08-Hilda01-001.Content: Have you ever sat by the sea in the dead of night?

Mes08-Hilda01-002.Content: Actually... I would often sneak out while everyone slept, and go look out over the water.

Mes08-Hilda01-003.Content: I thought I could almost hear Banges sleeping soundly behind me.

Mes08-Hilda01-004.Content: These moments always made me feel so warm...

Mes08-Hilda01-005.Content: My home. The place I've sworn to protect.

Mes08-Hilda01-006.Content: Sometimes I'd daydream, that maybe my prototype was born just across the water.

Mes08-Hilda01-007.Content: But I'm never going to investigate the truth.

Mes08-Hilda01-008.Content: Can you understand how I feel...?

Mes08-HildaPlayer01.Content: The present is all that matters.

Mes08-Hilda02-002.Content: Anyway, it seems like I'm always talking about Banges.

Mes08-Hilda02-003.Content: Seems like I could never remember what I'd told you! Always going on about Banges this, and Banges that.

Mes08-Hilda02-004.Content: But really... Every time I think of Banges, I want to share my feeling with you.

Mes08-Hilda02-005.Content: I just wish you could feel that sense of belonging, that contentment.

Mes09-Hilda01-001.Content: I! Hilda! Now with a new ambition!

Mes09-Hilda01-003.Content: Whether it's about how I cook or how my dishes taste, I want to be first-class!

Mes09-HildaPlayer01.Content: Where are you going to start?

Mes09-Hilda02-002.Content: She told me when I was working at Collie's store.

Mes09-Hilda02-003.Content: Frying chicken is actually pretty simple. The secret to getting a good flavor lies in marinating the chicken, the breading to meat ratio, and the combination of sauces.

Mes09-Hilda02-004.Content: She also said that making delicious food requires creativity! That way, the happiness of making something yummy can be passed on.

Mes09-Hilda02-005.Content: I'm going to invent a special Hilda fried chicken sauce.

Mes09-Hilda02-006.Content: The ingredients used are caviar, blueberries, black truffles...

Mes09-HildaPlayer02-B.Content: You wanna be a cook serving wicked cuisine?

Mes09-Hilda03-001.Content: Sure enough, the road to becoming a successful foodie is bumpy and arduous...

Mes10-Hilda01-002.Content: I seem to be getting to know you better.

Mes10-Hilda01-003.Content: How should I describe it? Mutual understanding or a natural bond?

Mes10-Hilda01-004.Content: I've never had a playmate who is so in tune with me before.

Mes10-Hilda01-005.Content: No, no, no, "playmate" is too superficial...

Mes10-Hilda01-007.Content: Can I define our relationship like these?

Mes10-Hilda02-002.Content: You're always by my side to support me.

Mes10-Hilda02-003.Content: I'd be happy to help you more in the future, too.

Mes10-Hilda02-004.Content: Let's keep moving towards a brighter future! Let's go!

Daily01-Hilda01-001.Content: I see! I understand completely now!

Daily01-Hilda02-001.Content: The so-called "entropy increase" is the law that objects always proceed from order to chaos. Simply put, the journey into chaos.

Daily01-Hilda02-002.Content: I heard it from someone... probably someone from Hykros!

Daily01-Hilda02-004.Content: It's normal for your shoelaces to get tangled up in knots.

Daily01-Hilda02-005.Content: And furthermore, my belongings will be scattered everywhere eventually.

Daily01-Hilda02-006.Content: Therefore, the room will become a chaotic mess on its own... No wonder I could never find anything!

Daily01-Hilda02-007.Content: Sigh, even me, the great Hilda, can't escape the laws of the universe.

Daily01-HildaPlayer02-A.Content: Couldn't you just clean up your room?

Daily01-Hilda03-001.Content: The power of human are limited!

Daily01-Hilda03-002.Content: Remembering where things are, organizing them neat and tidy...

Daily01-Hilda03-004.Content: By the way, I do know where are the things you gave me!

Daily02-Hilda01-001.Content: Uh, if the pot blew up after I tossed in the ingredients, it's the cooker's fault, right?

Daily02-Hilda02-001.Content: I'm fine, but I can't say the same about the food!

Daily02-Hilda03-001.Content: Tossed freshly picked ingredients into the pot as usual.

Daily02-Hilda03-002.Content: Let me think... There was silver bass, onion, potato, milk, salad dressing...

Daily02-Hilda03-003.Content: The plan was to make a nutritious, yummy milk bass soup!

Daily02-Hilda03-004.Content: You'll be the first to get the fresh, steaming masterpiece, of course!

Daily02-HildaPlayer03-A.Content: Are you using me as a test subject?

Daily02-HildaReply03-A1.Content: Uh, yeah, I'll taste it myself!

Daily02-HildaReply03-A2.Content: But if I must rate it, I'd say how can anything be this delicious!

Daily02-HildaReply03-A3.Content: That's why I want you to try it first, so I can get your opinion.

Daily02-HildaReply03-A4.Content: After all, you can always compliment me in many different ways.

Daily02-HildaPlayer03-B2.Content: You'll be the first to taste it next time!

Daily02-Hilda04-001.Content: If only the pot didn't blow up...

Daily03-Hilda01-001.Content: I don't think I'm organized, but I think my life is going just fine.

Daily03-Hilda01-002.Content: When I look at others, sometimes I'd think...

Daily03-Hilda01-003.Content: Whoa, you could live like that?

Daily03-Hilda02-001.Content: Jealous? No, I'm very satisfied with my own life right now.

Daily03-Hilda02-002.Content: How to put this... I feel it's fine as long as everyone is happy with their lives.

Daily03-Hilda02-003.Content: Some people are busy every day.

Daily03-Hilda02-004.Content: Some don't do anything at all.

Daily03-Hilda02-005.Content: You, me, or maybe just some random person would judge their lifestyle.

Daily03-Hilda02-006.Content: Maybe behind the glitz is sorrow that only they feel.

Daily03-Hilda02-007.Content: Or maybe no one approved their choices, but they didn't care.

Daily03-Hilda02-008.Content: So I just go on living my own life and don't mind what others might say!

Daily03-Hilda02-009.Content: But you should listen to me and don't be so hard on yourself.

Daily03-Hilda02-010.Content: Why don't we take some time off for leisure?

Daily04-Hilda01-001.Content: I plan to set up a celebration.

Daily04-Hilda01-002.Content: Next month... No, next week, or even tomorrow!

Daily04-Hilda02-001.Content: Uh, I haven't come up with a reason for it yet...

Daily04-Hilda02-002.Content: If new buddies showed up, I could make it a welcome party!

Daily04-Hilda03-001.Content: Sigh, I just want to start a celebration or a party for the sake of it!

Daily04-Hilda03-003.Content: If you ask me, for new people joining, eating a good meal today, or not working the next day.

Daily04-Hilda03-004.Content: Any of these is worth celebrating!

Daily04-Hilda03-005.Content: Anyway, I'll put hosting a celebration on the schedule!

Daily05-Hilda01-001.Content: Oh, chess is hard. I don't want to play anymore.

Daily05-Hilda02-001.Content: I'm not going to concede! Darn, give me a minute to think...

Daily05-Hilda02-004.Content: It's another thing on the List of Things Hilda's Not Good At.

Daily05-Hilda02-005.Content: I want to know how could you always know my next move?

Daily05-HildaPlayer02-B.Content: You have to consider all the possibilities during the game.

Daily05-HildaReply02-B1.Content: No, that's impossible for me to do!

Daily05-HildaReply02-B2.Content: I'd use up all my brainpower just to figure out where I am!

Daily05-Hilda03-002.Content: Though I can already see myself losing terribly again!

Mes01-bl01-001.Content: Greetings! Sorry for interrupting your busy schedule.

Mes01-bl01-002.Content: My name is Bai Ling... From the HT201 Shelter.

Mes01-bl02-001.Content: I think we'll have to work together in the future. I hope we get on!

Mes01-bl02-002.Content: Ah, no... I meant that I'll have to bother you here and there for missions and other tasks.

Mes01-blplayer02A-001.Content: Ha-ha! I might have to annoy you, too.

Mes01-blplayer02B-001.Content: Sure! Looking forward to working with you.

Mes01-bl03-002.Content: Please let me know if there's anything I can do for you, too.

Mes01-bl03-003.Content: I'd be happy to help with anything I can!

Mes01-blplayer03A-001.Content: I understand. Thank you, Bai Ling.

Mes02-bl01-001.Content: I'm so sorry to disturb you! Do you have a minute?

Mes02-blplayer01A-001.Content: Sure, I'm not busy. What's up?

Mes02-blplayer01B-001.Content: It's okay, there's no need to beat around the bush.

Mes02-bl02-001.Content: It's about the mission you gave me...

Mes02-bl02-002.Content: I'm still tying up loose ends and might need a little more time.

Mes02-bl02-003.Content: So, basically, er... Could I get a little extension...

Mes02-blplayer02B-001.Content: Okay. Thanks for your hard work, Bai Ling.

Mes02-bl03-002.Content: You're not asking for a specific time?

Mes02-blplayer03A-001.Content: No need, I'm sure you'll do just fine.

Mes02-blplayer03B-001.Content: You're always well prepared. I don't have any worries.

Mes02-bl04-001.Content: You just trust me? Like that...?

Mes02-bl04-002.Content: I mean, I've only been doing this a little while...

Mes02-bl04-003.Content: I wasn't even sure if I could complete it or not.

Mes02-blplayer04A-001.Content: Have some more self-confidence, Bai Ling. You always do well!

Mes02-blplayer04B-001.Content: You're organized and meticulous. Have more confidence in yourself. You'll be fine.

Mes02-bl05-002.Content: I'll do my best to complete the mission.

Mes03-bl01-001.Content: I've, er, got something to report.

Mes03-bl02-001.Content: Intelligence from Hykros claims that the Heirs of Aida have been up to some strange stuff recently.

Mes03-bl02-002.Content: They warn us to be extra observant, and get in touch immediately if we find anything out of the ordinary.

Mes03-blplayer02A-001.Content: The Heirs of Aida...? Alright. Thanks for informing me.

Mes03-blplayer03A-001.Content: Listen, Bai Ling... There's something I need to speak with you about...

Mes03-blplayer03B-001.Content: It's just that... Well, Bai Ling, I feel a little uncomfortable...

Mes03-blplayer04A-001.Content: You always seem to be so formal, even deferential...

Mes03-blplayer04B-001.Content: Why do you have such a solemn attitude all the time?

Mes03-bl05-001.Content: ... Could it be... My formality that's making you uncomfortable?

Mes03-bl05-002.Content: It's my fault! I'm so sorry... I didn't notice how it made you feel.

Mes03-blplayer05A-001.Content: No, no! I'm not blaming you for anything, I'm just asking.

Mes03-blplayer05B-001.Content: You misunderstand me, Bai Ling. I'm only curious.

Mes03-bl06-002.Content: Considering that you are the one who is utilizing me at present, that is the same as being my master.

Mes03-bl06-003.Content: So... I thought that a formal attitude would be required.

Mes03-blplayer06A-001.Content: Oh! So that's what you were thinking...

Mes03-blplayer06B-001.Content: No wonder you were that formal...

Mes03-blplayer07A-001.Content: Wrong! I'm angry! Don't wanna talk!

Mes04-bl01-003.Content: Are you still angry with me...?

Mes04-blplayer01A-001.Content: I won't be angry if you didn't act so formal.

Mes04-blplayer01B-001.Content: Just change how you address me...

Mes04-bl02-001.Content: So... What should I call you?

Mes04-blplayer02A-001.Content: Stop it! No! Just my name is fine...

Mes04-blplayer02B-001.Content: Bai Ling... I mean just my name.

Mes04-bl04-002.Content: Isn't that a little too informal...?

Mes04-blplayer04A-001.Content: You have to understand, Bai Ling, that we are companions. There is no hierarchy.

Mes04-blplayer04B-001.Content: We're friends, right? Why insist on being so stiff and formal?

Mes04-blplayer05A-001.Content: Of course, Bai Ling. Listen, since we're friends, let's just drop the formality, okay?

Mes04-blplayer05B-001.Content: You've just got to call people by their names, alright? Come on.

Mes05-bl01-002.Content: Recently, there's been more Hyenas activity than usual, almost as if something's being planned...

Mes05-blplayer02A-001.Content: I thought I asked you not to be so formal.

Mes05-blplayer02B-001.Content: You're not disturbing! Please, there's no need to be so reserved.

Mes05-bl04-002.Content: I seem to recall... When I was still at the HT201 Shelter, we were constantly fighting with them...

Mes05-bl04-003.Content: They robbed, ruined, and wrecked everything in the shelter...

Mes05-bl04-004.Content: It's horrible... Nothing but memories of cruelty...

Mes05-bl04-005.Content: It's enough to keep people scared that something terrible will happen.

Mes05-blplayer04A-001.Content: Don't be scared. That's all in the past.

Mes05-blplayer04B-001.Content: There's no need to worry, Bai Ling. What's past is past.

Mes05-bl05-001.Content: Yes, it's all in the past.

Mes05-bl05-002.Content: I'm not the same as I was then, either.

Mes05-blplayer05A-001.Content: Those Hyenas, ha! They're a bunch of nobodies.

Mes05-blplayer05B-001.Content: The Hyenas are simple opponents, nothing more.

Mes05-bl06-002.Content: I need to pull myself together.

Mes05-bl06-003.Content: I should go prepare the next mission.

Mes06-bl01-001.Content: We've received a thank you message from the HT201 Shelter.

Mes06-bl02-001.Content: Yep, they say they're grateful for your help that time.

Mes06-bl02-002.Content: They also sent a token of their gratitude.

Mes06-blplayer02A-001.Content: Ha-ha! Thanks! I get the feeling you're happy too, Bai Ling.

Mes06-blplayer02B-001.Content: Of course I like it! And you seem happy, too.

Mes06-bl03-002.Content: I never thought I'd interact with the shelter like this.

Mes06-bl03-003.Content: I thought that, as I'm in this form and no longer a part of the shelter, I wouldn't have anything more to do with them.

Mes06-bl03-004.Content: So it is my honor to be the link connecting you with the shelter.

Mes06-blplayer03A-001.Content: No need for that! You're the only one who could do it, Bai Ling, seeing as you're so familiar with the shelter.

Mes06-blplayer03B-001.Content: It's important to you and you know it best. It's like your home, your family, right?

Mes06-bl04-002.Content: Anyway, please look forward to my future performance. I won't let you down.

Mes07-bl01-001.Content: ... Are you sleeping better these days?

Mes07-bl02-002.Content: But your physical condition... I have to say, you look at least moderately fatigued.

Mes07-blplayer02A-001.Content: Ha-ha... Only "moderately"? Then I'm still okay!

Mes07-bl03-001.Content: It's not okay! Not okay at all! Too much fatigue is an immense burden on your body!

Mes07-bl03-002.Content: Reduced cognitive capabilities, impaired alertness and judgment, depressed immune system, loss of balance, loss of hair... Should I go on?

Mes07-bl03-003.Content: It can cause mental illness as well as physical!

Mes07-bl03-004.Content: Do you have any idea how terrible this can be...?

Mes07-bl04-001.Content: You have to care more about your health.

Mes07-bl04-002.Content: I can't bear to see you work so hard anymore...

Mes07-bl04-003.Content: Let me take over one of your tasks. You need to have a good rest.

Mes07-blplayer04A-001.Content: I'm kidding, Bai Ling... What you say makes sense.

Mes07-blplayer04B-001.Content: I'm sorry, I was just joking. I get what you're saying.

Mes07-bl05-001.Content: So you're agreeing to get a good rest?

Mes07-bl05-002.Content: So you'll go rest right away?

Mes08-bl01-001.Content: A good while ago, I happened to pass by the shelter while on a mission.

Mes08-bl01-002.Content: The current leader is terribly busy, and the people in the shelter...

Mes08-bl01-003.Content: Everyone seems to be in really good spirits, which is great.

Mes08-blplayer01A-001.Content: Leader? Uh... You mean the Bai Ling at the shelter?

Mes08-blplayer01B-001.Content: Her? You mean Bai Ling, the leader of the shelter?

Mes08-bl02-002.Content: She seems to be in the middle of dealing with something important, running around all over the place.

Mes08-bl02-003.Content: She seems a lot more energized overall, though. Much sharper, more focused.

Mes08-bl02-004.Content: She has clearly grown a lot...

Mes08-bl02-005.Content: I can't just give up, either. I've got to keep going!

Mes08-blplayer02A-001.Content: You always work so hard. But I think you also need to rest.

Mes08-blplayer02B-001.Content: Don't overdo it. Be sure to rest.

Mes08-blplayer03A-001.Content: Speaking of the Bai Ling at the shelter... I heard that something happened when she became the leader?

Mes08-blplayer03B-001.Content: That reminds me, didn't they say that there was a problem when Bai Ling became the leader?

Mes08-bl04-001.Content: Oh, that... It's no big deal...

Mes08-bl04-002.Content: She was in a panic when she became the leader after the death of her predecessor.

Mes08-bl04-003.Content: She was originally rather timid and weak, not to mention in shock due to the old leader's death.

Mes08-bl04-004.Content: It was inevitable that there would be some hiccups at the beginning. Everything turned out alright in the end, though, thanks to the support of everyone in the shelter.

Mes08-blplayer04A-001.Content: The old leader... I'm sorry, I shouldn't have brought it up.

Mes08-blplayer04B-001.Content: The old leader... I'm sorry, I didn't mean to reopen old wounds.

Mes08-bl05-001.Content: It's ok. It's all in the past now, anyway.

Mes08-bl05-002.Content: The person I am now just wants to look forward, positively acknowledging everything about myself, the good and the bad.

Mes08-bl05-003.Content: Think back to her in the shelter...

Mes08-bl05-004.Content: She must have felt the same as me.

Mes08-blplayer05A-001.Content: How about we take a trip to the shelter together some time?

Mes08-blplayer05B-001.Content: If you're willing to... When you've got some time, why don't we head over to the shelter together?

Mes08-bl07-001.Content: I wanna go! I wanna go!

Mes09-bl01-001.Content: Something rather serious has come up...

Mes09-bl01-002.Content: I think we need to talk.

Mes09-bl02-001.Content: Recently, I've completed a full audit of your finances.

Mes09-bl02-002.Content: It's very clear that your current situation...

Mes09-blplayer02B-001.Content: I always thought I was quite good at managing my finances...

Mes09-bl03-002.Content: Of course, maybe I shouldn't be meddling in how you use your personal assets.

Mes09-bl03-003.Content: But take your future living expenses and mission plans into consideration.

Mes09-bl03-004.Content: I think you should make and stick to a reasonable budget...

Mes09-bl04-001.Content: First off, reduce unnecessary expenditure and buy only what you need.

Mes09-bl04-002.Content: Second, get into the habit of daily bookkeeping. Become more attuned to market fluctuations, and confirm a daily financial plan.

Mes09-bl04-003.Content: Third, set reasonable, achievable goals. Learn to save regularly to put something aside for a rainy day.

Mes09-bl04-004.Content: Fourth, read up on financial management and planning.

Mes09-blplayer04A-001.Content: You're awesome, Bai Ling... But it sounds really hard to do.

Mes09-blplayer04B-001.Content: I understand the principles, but I'm not sure I can stick to them...

Mes09-bl05-002.Content: From today, I'm happy to be your financial assistant.

Mes09-blplayer05A-001.Content: You're like a different person when dealing with financial matters!

Mes09-blplayer05B-001.Content: You get super confident and decisive about these things.

Mes09-blplayer06A-001.Content: Ha-ha, I'm kidding! I'll try my best to do as you suggest.

Mes09-blplayer06B-001.Content: I'm kidding! I'll try to do as you say.

Mes09-bl07-001.Content: Thank you for understanding where I'm coming from.

Mes09-bl07-002.Content: I'm going to go take another look at the books.

Mes09-bl07-003.Content: Let me optimize your financial planning.

Mes10-bl01-001.Content: I feel really happy today. Thank you.

Mes10-bl01-002.Content: It's really nice to be at the shelter and see everyone...

Mes10-blplayer01A-001.Content: After all, it's a promise. How are things going in the shelter?

Mes10-blplayer01B-001.Content: It's a promise between you and me. How have things been going in the shelter recently?

Mes10-bl02-001.Content: Well, it's basically the same as usual.

Mes10-bl02-002.Content: Everyone is doing well! And I also met the current leader...

Mes10-blplayer02B-001.Content: Oh, what did you talk about?

Mes10-bl03-001.Content: We talked about the shelter, about me, and about the future...

Mes10-bl03-002.Content: She told me that everything has gone smoothly at the shelter recently. Even though the Hyenas come by to harass them now and then, things are much better than before.

Mes10-bl03-003.Content: She said that she still thinks too much and is always worried that she is not doing well enough, but now she knows how to communicate with everyone in the shelter. She's learning to be a good leader.

Mes10-bl03-004.Content: It feels too unreal to meet another version of myself in this way.

Mes10-bl03-005.Content: It also makes me understand that I am really different from her...

Mes10-bl03-006.Content: A-ha, it turns out that's what having a body feels like. I really am virtual...

Mes10-blplayer03B-001.Content: Um... But I hope you understand...

Mes10-bl04-001.Content: I know, you've never considered me simply as some weapon data.

Mes10-bl04-002.Content: You don't have to comfort me. I'm not sad, on the contrary, I'm more determined now.

Mes10-bl04-003.Content: I have made up my mind to forge my own path in my own way.

Mes10-bl04-004.Content: Although I am not strong enough, I may bring you a lot of trouble, and I am just a set of dummy data...

Mes10-bl04-005.Content: But there are many meaningful things that only I can accomplish. You have given my existence this meaning. So...

Mes10-bl04-006.Content: I am me, not anything else.

Mes10-blplayer04A-001.Content: Yes, you're you, and you're my best friend.

Mes10-blplayer04B-001.Content: You, Bai Ling, are my friend.

daily01-bl01-003.Content: It's been so long and I still can't talk it out with Reiggy...

daily01-blplayer02A-001.Content: That's not a name you hear every day!

daily01-bl03-001.Content: He looks so much younger than me. He's like a younger brother to me.

daily01-bl03-002.Content: But it seems that he doesn't want to have anything to do with me...

daily01-bl03-003.Content: Sometimes he even calls me "the masked lady."

daily01-blplayer03A-001.Content: Ugh, that guy... Ignore him. He's harsh and proud.

daily01-blplayer03B-001.Content: Bah, he just likes to talk like that. Don't mind him.

daily01-bl04-001.Content: I'm not communicating right. That must be it.

daily01-blplayer04A-001.Content: Don't let it get to you, Bai Ling. Give it time.

daily01-blplayer04B-001.Content: Don't hurt yourself. Just take it slowly.

daily02-bl01-001.Content: I've received the gift you gave me.

daily02-blplayer01A-001.Content: How is it? Do you like it?

daily02-blplayer01B-001.Content: Did you get it? You like it?

daily02-bl02-001.Content: Yes, I like it a lot.

daily02-blplayer02A-001.Content: Glad you like it. I was worried you wouldn't.

daily02-blplayer02B-001.Content: Awesome! I'm glad it's to your liking.

daily02-bl03-001.Content: Actually, as long as they're gifts from you,

daily02-bl03-002.Content: I'd cherish and love them so much.

daily02-blplayer03B-001.Content: Thank you for caring so much about me.

daily02-bl04-003.Content: I'd keep and cherish them of course.

daily03-bl01-002.Content: It's a tough enemy judging by the data.

daily03-bl02-002.Content: I saw some data about modified beasts.

daily03-bl02-003.Content: This kind of creature... must have been cyberized...

daily03-blplayer02A-001.Content: Yeah. More than half of their body is machine.

daily03-blplayer02B-001.Content: Uh-huh, that's what the documentation says.

daily03-bl03-001.Content: I wonder if they underwent it voluntarily...

daily03-bl03-003.Content: I must have read too much into it.

daily03-blplayer03A-001.Content: I've thought about it actually, but... it feels a little too complicated.

daily03-blplayer03B-001.Content: I can't look too deep into this, or I'll complicate the matter even more.

daily03-bl04-002.Content: I'll just deal with what's in front of me right now.

daily04-bl01-001.Content: Do you prefer savory or sweet food?

daily04-blplayer01A-001.Content: Savory, if I have to choose.

daily04-blplayer02B-001.Content: Are you going to make something?

daily04-bl03-001.Content: Yes, I got many ingredients lately.

daily04-bl03-002.Content: I want to try to cook them in a different way.

daily04-bl03-003.Content: I'd like to ask you to be my sampler, if it's possible.

daily04-bl03-004.Content: That's why I need to get to know your preference first.

daily04-blplayer03B-001.Content: Ha-ha, I'm honored by your invitation.

daily04-bl04-001.Content: I didn't expect you to say yes so soon.

daily04-blplayer04A-001.Content: I never say no to cuisines.

daily04-blplayer04B-001.Content: It's you asking. Of course I'm not going to say no.

Mes01-ww01-001.Content: Crow, reporting in. Just ask if you need any help in the future!

Mes01-wwplayer01B-001.Content: Ha-ha! I hope to work with you soon.

Mes01-ww02-001.Content: By the way, you can just call me Crowy, if you like.

Mes01-ww03-001.Content: Well now, what's the best way to say... I guess so!

Mes01-ww03-002.Content: I think that the noise of "Crowy, Crowy" sounds like applause and cheering!

Mes01-wwplayer03A-001.Content: Crowy! Crowy! Crowy! Ha-ha! That is fun to say!

Mes01-wwplayer03B-001.Content: Sounds good. I'll call you Crowy from now on.

Mes01-ww04-002.Content: Oh, I just remembered. I gotta go get things ready for the next mission...

Mes01-ww04-003.Content: Talk more later. Bye for now!

Mes02-ww01-001.Content: Phew, am I pleased the mission's finally over. Even my bones ache!

Mes02-ww01-002.Content: Work's been nothing but trouble lately. With deadlines chasing after.

Mes02-ww01-003.Content: Hmm... I'm still not used to this Hykros model. Same old, I guess.

Mes02-ww01-004.Content: It feels so much better just to move freely.

Mes02-wwplayer01A-001.Content: I know, right? So much hassle.

Mes02-wwplayer01B-001.Content: A lot of problems recently, that's for sure. I feel you.

Mes02-ww02-001.Content: Well, I guess it is what it is!

Mes02-ww02-002.Content: Ha-ha! Well, you gotta be positive, right?

Mes02-ww02-003.Content: Judging by their previous approach, it looks like Hykros will have new orders for us any day now. Might as well rest up while we can.

Mes02-wwplayer02A-001.Content: We need to readjust and compose ourselves. Have you got any ideas?

Mes02-wwplayer02B-001.Content: I'm so tired that I can't think straight. I need to get some sleep. What are your plans, Crowy?

Mes02-ww03-001.Content: I haven't given it much thought yet.

Mes02-ww03-002.Content: I think I'm gonna check over the equipment first, then go find Celine.

Mes02-wwplayer03A-001.Content: The quartermaster Celine? You know her too?

Mes02-wwplayer03B-001.Content: You mean Celine, right? From Astra?

Mes02-ww04-002.Content: I asked Celine to help me find something. She's the one to go to if you want the best.

Mes02-ww04-003.Content: Apparently, there'll be news within a couple of days, and I'll go check it out when there's time.

Mes02-wwplayer04A-001.Content: Well, let's take care of our own business, before the next mission.

Mes02-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Alright. I'm gonna go for a health checkup first, before anything else. Keep in touch!

Mes03-ww01-001.Content: I can see you're a pretty curious person.

Mes03-ww03-002.Content: Oh, it just hit me the other day.

Mes03-wwplayer03B-001.Content: A-ha, that's a pretty bad joke.

Mes03-ww04-001.Content: He-he... Actually, I was worried my message would disturb you...

Mes03-ww04-002.Content: As long as you're happy, I'm good.

Mes03-wwplayer04A-001.Content: No way! It's really funny! Do you also like bad jokes?

Mes03-wwplayer04B-001.Content: No bother! By the way, Crowy, do you also like bad jokes?

Mes03-ww06-001.Content: Oh, I'm so happy! Could it be that I've found someone the same as me!?

Mes03-ww06-002.Content: Well, I must say I am somewhat of a connoisseur of bad jokes.

Mes03-wwplayer06B-001.Content: Wow! That's great! I never thought to collect them.

Mes03-ww07-001.Content: If you're interested, I could share some of the ones I've collected.

Mes03-wwplayer07A-001.Content: If you want to! Though I don't have anything to give you...

Mes03-wwplayer07B-001.Content: Thanks, Crowy. Let me think about what I can give you...

Mes03-ww08-001.Content: Oh no, I don't need anything in return. We're fellow enthusiasts, right?

Mes03-ww08-002.Content: Hmm... Compiling the "Aidan Compendium of Bad Jokes" is not a bad idea...

Mes03-ww08-003.Content: Wait for my good news! He-he!

Mes04-ww01-002.Content: We work quite well together. You're very skilled with daggers.

Mes04-wwplayer01A-001.Content: A little bit, but I think it's only because you've got good data about it!

Mes04-wwplayer01B-001.Content: Not really. Maybe it's like you said, we just make a good team.

Mes04-ww02-002.Content: You've got a talent for daggers.

Mes04-ww02-003.Content: Did you know that every dagger has a different spirit? That each bears different memories, presents a different character, and has its unique way of wielding.

Mes04-ww02-004.Content: It's said that only a few are chosen to be gifted with such natural ability, able to employ daggers so easily.

Mes04-ww02-005.Content: So, rather than us choosing them, it's more accurate to say that they choose us.

Mes04-wwplayer02A-001.Content: Well, if that's the case, then surely you've been chosen too.

Mes04-wwplayer02B-001.Content: Ha-ha, is that really a thing?... I was chosen by a dagger?

Mes04-ww03-001.Content: ... Ah-ha-ha! You know what? I just made that all up! Ha-ha-ha!

Mes04-ww03-002.Content: You should have seen the look on your face! But what I said about your talent was the honest truth.

Mes04-ww03-003.Content: Compared with modern weapons, daggers are less intelligent but more difficult to get started. It's almost impossible to use them well, without being extremely talented.

Mes04-wwplayer03A-001.Content: You're the talented one, Crowy. Daggers in your hands are even more lethal.

Mes04-wwplayer03B-001.Content: Actually, I think you've got the deadly moves, and look good doing it too, Crowy.

Mes04-ww04-001.Content: After all, I've been using them for a long time now. Daggers and I...
