Mes04-ww04-002.Content: I suppose you could call us good friends by now.

Mes04-ww04-003.Content: I used to travel a lot by myself, right? Only the daggers kept me company.

Mes04-ww04-004.Content: Shows, battles, daily existence... He-he, they were there for all aspects of my life.

Mes04-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Seeing how you look after your daggers, I know you treasure them.

Mes04-ww05-001.Content: Of course! Whether as a weapon or a prop, daggers are always No. 1 in my heart!

Mes04-ww05-002.Content: I have a collection of 107 rare daggers! And that's not all!!

Mes04-ww05-003.Content: I already have clues to the rare dagger that Celine promised to helped me find  the Banges "Blackwing Clown"!

Mes04-wwplayer05B-001.Content: That sounds remarkably unusual. You've managed to pique my curiosity...

Mes04-ww06-001.Content: Ha-ha, I promise I'll show you... As soon as I get my hands on it.

Mes04-wwplayer06B-001.Content: Wow, really? That's great! Thanks, Crowy.

Mes04-ww07-001.Content: It's nothing! Good things ought to be shared among friends, right?

Mes05-wwplayer01A-001.Content: Yes, in return for the "Aidan Compendium of Bad Jokes".

Mes05-wwplayer01B-001.Content: Of course! In return for all the bad jokes.

Mes05-ww02-002.Content: You are deadly serious about this.

Mes05-ww03-001.Content: It's a little embarrassing to say this, but there are just so many gifts...

Mes05-ww03-002.Content: I mean, it's unnecessary. Won't people think it's a little strange, like we're already the best besties in the world...?

Mes05-ww03-003.Content: Hey, no! That's not what I meant!

Mes05-ww03-004.Content: For sure, having many gifts is totally awesome!

Mes05-ww03-005.Content: But really, I'm gonna accept all these amazing gifts, so forget I said anything! Ha-ha-ha!

Mes05-wwplayer03A-001.Content: Not considering your feelings was thoughtless of me...

Mes05-wwplayer03B-001.Content: ... I could have done this better...

Mes05-ww04-003.Content: What's one of my outstanding skills?

Mes05-wwplayer04A-001.Content: Oh, well... I wasn't expecting this. Outstanding, you say?

Mes05-wwplayer04B-001.Content: I've got it! Guard duty! Because you're standing outside!

Mes05-ww05-002.Content: Oh, I'm sorry for upsetting you... It's not like me to be so cantankerous...

Mes05-wwplayer05A-001.Content: Believe me, Crowy, you became my closest companion and partner ages ago.

Mes06-ww01-003.Content: The whole look is great! Just adorable...

Mes06-ww01-004.Content: I should stop... I'm being a little strange, she'll think I'm a weirdo...

Mes06-wwplayer01A-001.Content: Hang on a minute, Crowy. What are you talking about?

Mes06-wwplayer01B-001.Content: What? What's going on? What's the "weirdo" thing about?

Mes06-ww02-001.Content: It's just... I met the cutest girl the other day!

Mes06-ww02-002.Content: She's got the cutest little cat ears!

Mes06-ww02-003.Content: And the most adorable cat tail!

Mes06-ww02-004.Content: Holding onto a ring all the time, just like a cat playing with its toy!

Mes06-ww02-005.Content: She even moves like a kitty cat!

Mes06-wwplayer02A-001.Content: Ah, I've got it. You mean Shiro!

Mes06-wwplayer02B-001.Content: A girl... Like a kitty cat... You mean Shiro?

Mes06-ww03-002.Content: I had no idea that girls could be just as cute as cats.

Mes06-wwplayer03A-001.Content: Um, maybe? I mean, just look at her.

Mes06-wwplayer03B-001.Content: Well, she looks like one. What do you think?

Mes06-ww04-002.Content: I want to be her friend.

Mes06-wwplayer04A-001.Content: I'm all for that, but she does strike me as a bit of a loner.

Mes06-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Ha, sure! But I think I should remind you that Shiro doesn't like being around other people.

Mes06-ww05-001.Content: At least I'll make an effort.

Mes06-ww05-002.Content: I'm working up to... Saying hello.

Mes06-ww05-003.Content: You've got my back, right? Partner!

Mes06-wwplayer05A-001.Content: I got you! Sending you all the good vibes!

Mes06-wwplayer05B-001.Content: You've got this, Crowy. You can do it!

Mes07-ww01-001.Content: Astra Shelter Alert: High levels of radiation today. Avoid outdoor activities, and try to remain within the safe areas of the shelter.

Mes07-ww01-002.Content: Radiation levels are high today... I wonder what's up with Astra these days...

Mes07-wwplayer01A-001.Content: Hey, that reminds me that you're from Astra.

Mes07-wwplayer01B-002.Content: Astra... Oh, weren't you born there, Crowy?

Mes07-ww02-001.Content: Ha-ha, yep, but I haven't been back in a long time.

Mes07-ww02-003.Content: When I'd only just left Astra, I'd go back at least once a year.

Mes07-ww03-002.Content: And then I started traveling and performing all over the place. It was too far to go back, so I didn't. Guess I saved myself some hassle, right?

Mes07-ww03-003.Content: Speaking of performing, I met some true masters of the theatrical arts. Many of my acting talents are all thanks to their tuition.

Mes07-ww03-004.Content: If there's a chance, I'd love to perform them all for you.

Mes07-wwplayer03A-001.Content: Great! I enjoy your performances. It's just that, I feel like you are acting a little... Strange...

Mes07-wwplayer03B-001.Content: Well, I'm looking forward to it! You are acting a little strange though...

Mes07-ww04-004.Content: Seems like I just remembered something. Gotta run.

Mes08-wwplayer01A-001.Content: I was thinking of going to Astra.

Mes08-wwplayer02A-001.Content: What? Shouldn't you come with me?

Mes08-wwplayer02B-001.Content: Hold on, isn't this the point where you say "Okay, I'll go with you"?

Mes08-wwplayer03A-001.Content: Huh? You want me to tackle a mission alone?

Mes08-ww04-001.Content: It seems like a pretty easy mission!

Mes08-ww04-002.Content: I'm sure you could handle it by yourself...

Mes08-wwplayer04A-001.Content: Since last time, I've noticed you get weird about Astra. What's that all about!?

Mes08-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Eh? That's not something you usually say! Why can't you go to Astra?

Mes08-ww05-002.Content: It's not like I have to go!

Mes08-wwplayer05B-001.Content: Did something happen to you in Astra?

Mes09-ww01-001.Content: Did you come back from Astra?

Mes09-wwplayer01A-001.Content: Well, this mission must be completed.

Mes09-ww02-001.Content: Well, I thought about it calmly.

Mes09-ww02-002.Content: Instead of letting you hear it from someone else, I'd better tell you, myself.

Mes09-wwplayer02A-001.Content: What an old-fashioned way to start...

Mes09-ww03-002.Content: Once I went back to Astra Shelter, it just so happened that Fennie developed a new drink...

Mes09-ww03-003.Content: Just in time to get together with you all...

Mes09-ww04-001.Content: I drank a lot of it...

Mes09-ww04-002.Content: I didn't expect that the drink was actually very strong...

Mes09-wwplayer04B-001.Content: I have a bad feeling about this. What did you do?

Mes09-ww05-002.Content: After I got drunk, I... I asked everyone in the shelter for a kiss...

Mes09-ww05-003.Content: And then I started undressing in front of everyone to prepare for the show...

Mes09-ww05-004.Content: I didn't stop until she knocked me out.

Mes09-wwplayer05B-001.Content: Ha-ha-ha-ha, I didn't expect you to lose it like this.

Mes09-ww06-001.Content: Laugh, laugh! What a comedy show.

Mes09-ww06-002.Content: It's a shame... That's why I don't want to go back to Astra.

Mes09-wwplayer06A-001.Content: No wonder you hate alcohol so much!

Mes09-wwplayer06B-001.Content: And this is why you're not really into wine, right?

Mes09-wwplayer07A-001.Content: Yeah... If it were me, I'd probably hate the stuff, too.

Mes09-wwplayer07B-001.Content: It's really annoying in every sense.

Mes09-ww08-001.Content: Anyway, that's all there is to it.

Mes09-wwplayer08A-001.Content: However, it's impossible to never go to Astra.

Mes09-wwplayer08B-001.Content: But it's impossible to always avoid Astra.

Mes09-ww09-002.Content: In fact, it's all psychological factors to blame, and I'm not in the state I used to be in now.

Mes09-ww09-003.Content: I just feel so embarrassed... It's mortifying...

Mes09-wwplayer09A-001.Content: Hmm... I gotta say, it's actually pretty funny.

Mes09-ww010-001.Content: I clearly made a huge joke out of myself...

Mes09-wwplayer10A-001.Content: Why not change the angle? We could think of it as a performance?

Mes09-wwplayer10B-001.Content: Well, what if it was a "performance"?

Mes09-ww011-003.Content: It isn't wrong to think of it that way.

Mes09-wwplayer11A-001.Content: Right, we always have to stay on the positive side! That's what you told me.

Mes09-wwplayer11B-001.Content: Crowy's always saying to keep a positive attitude.

Mes10-ww01-001.Content: Next time, if you go to Astra...

Mes10-ww02-001.Content: Let's face it with a positive attitude.

Mes10-wwplayer02B-001.Content: For sure, that's the Crowy I know.

Mes10-ww03-002.Content: I should bring back some souvenirs. I still have quite a few friends in Astra.

Mes10-wwplayer03A-001.Content: What would you like to bring?

Mes10-wwplayer03B-001.Content: Have you thought of a souvenir?

Mes10-ww04-002.Content: So I came to discuss it with you.

Mes10-wwplayer04A-001.Content: Why don't we go check it out next time?

Mes10-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Have time to check out the store?

daily01-ww01-001.Content: Oh, have you heard of Red Scorpion and Yellow Widow?

daily01-ww01-002.Content: I didn't mean anything by it. I need to remind you of this...

daily01-wwplayer01A-001.Content: I didn't say anything. So what is it you wanted to say?

daily01-wwplayer01B-001.Content: I know. So what happened to them?

daily01-ww02-001.Content: I'm quite interested in their clown makeup.

daily01-ww02-002.Content: And the sleeveless jacket they wear...

daily01-ww02-003.Content: There's a clown printed on the back.

daily01-wwplayer02A-001.Content: You're not telling me you want to wear it...

daily01-ww03-002.Content: I'm designing a new outfit for a performance. I just want to use something as a reference.

daily01-ww04-001.Content: Hey! Why did you reply me as if you don't believe it at all...

daily01-ww05-002.Content: It doesn't look like you believe me...

daily02-ww01-002.Content: "Oh, my job is to kill aberrants."

daily02-ww01-003.Content: "But there aren't any aberrants in this world."

daily02-ww01-004.Content: "So why do you think that's the case?"

daily02-ww02-002.Content: I just came up with that.

daily02-ww03-001.Content: Ha-ha. I think it's lame, too. But it works.

daily02-ww04-001.Content: I'll try it during my next performance.

daily03-ww01-002.Content: I've found a very interesting comic book titled, Journey to Aida.

daily03-ww01-003.Content: It's so funny and so interesting!

daily03-ww02-001.Content: It's about all the amazing stories that happened to a chubby otter exploring Aida.

daily03-ww03-001.Content: I got it by chance. I heard it's huge lately.

daily03-ww03-002.Content: It's really hard to come by!

daily03-ww04-001.Content: I'll lend it to you after I'm finished reading it.

daily03-wwplayer04A-001.Content: Tee-hee, I knew you get me.

daily03-wwplayer04B-001.Content: Ha-ha, I knew you get me.

daily04-wwplayer02A-001.Content: That... doesn't seem to... count as talking...

daily04-ww03-003.Content: I shouldn't have shown up like that, probably.

daily04-ww03-004.Content: I shouldn't have introduced myself like that, either.

daily04-ww03-006.Content: I'll say hello to her properly next time.

Mes01-pp01-02.Content: You are now in communication with the Hykros Medical Department's assistant Simulacrum AI, Perimanda Prescott.

Mes01-pp01-03.Content: In the future, please let me know if there is anything with which a nurse like myself can help.

Mes01-pp02-03.Content: Like I said, just call me Pepper.

Mes01-pp03-01.Content: It's so much easier than my full name, after all.

Mes01-pp03-02.Content: I would appreciate it if you would call me by this name, without any further modifications.

Mes01-ppplayer03-A.Content: Well, I suppose so. If you're sure!

Mes01-pp04-02.Content: I can't wait to work with you!

Mes02-pp01-02.Content: You are now in communication with the Hykros Medical Department's assistant Simulacrum AI, Perimanda Prescott.

Mes02-pp01-03.Content: In the future, please let me know if there is anything with which a nurse like myself can help.

Mes02-ppplayer01-A.Content: Did I travel back in time?

Mes02-pp02-01.Content: Huh? Is that some kind of chronic illness?

Mes02-pp02-04.Content: Ugh, how come? Have I already introduced myself? I'm sorry for making a fool of myself...

Mes02-pp03-02.Content: I must have fallen asleep so suddenly that I forgot to tick off "register @player_name's contact details and introduce myself" from my to-do list...

Mes02-pp03-03.Content: I rely on this list and usually follow it to the letter to get everything done. I didn't expect it to turn me into such a joke this time...

Mes02-ppplayer03-A.Content: You really have no recollection of having already spoken to me?

Mes02-pp04-01.Content: Maybe I got a bit lost in everything I have to do...

Mes02-pp04-02.Content: Anyway, I promise that I won't embarrass myself like this again!

Mes02-pp04-03.Content: I won't take up any more of your time.

Mes03-pp01-01.Content: Do you always mindful of your health, @player_name?

Mes03-pp01-02.Content: A balanced diet and sufficient sleep are both important.

Mes03-pp01-03.Content: Each individual has a different sleep requirement, but is generally in the range of 7 to 9 hours.

Mes03-pp01-04.Content: Remember that even 8 hours of sleep may not be enough. Always pay attention not to become too fatigued.

Mes03-pp01-05.Content: While I can heal you if you collapse from exhaustion, this will still harm your body. It's recommended to avoid such a situation in the first place.

Mes03-ppplayer01-A.Content: So do you always get enough sleep?

Mes03-ppplayer01-B.Content: So what happens if you collapse?

Mes03-pp02-02.Content: Well, actually... I don't need all that much sleep.

Mes03-pp02-03.Content: Different from "the Pepper with flesh and blood," a Simulacrum AI like me only needs to restart even if I'm temporarily overloaded and collapse.

Mes03-pp02-04.Content: And if, for some reason, I am unable to work anymore, you can just replace me.

Mes03-ppplayer02-A.Content: I don't care if you are an AI, I hope you take care of yourself too.

Mes03-ppplayer02-B.Content: Don't just look after others. Look after yourself across the board, too.

Mes03-pp03-03.Content: But do not worry, I know my limit. There is no problem just yet.

Mes04-pp01-01.Content: When I was working in the Hykros medical department, my main role was to look after and treat patients in the wards.

Mes04-pp01-02.Content: Now, though, it feels more like I'm needed on the battlefield for support and emergency field treatment, right?

Mes04-pp01-03.Content: It feels a lot more exhausting...

Mes04-pp01-04.Content: Apart from daily monitoring of your health, I will also try to pay more attention to the stresses of actual combat...

Mes04-ppplayer01-A.Content: Well, let me hereby announce that from today I shall also monitor your rest!

Mes04-pp02-02.Content: I didn't expect to be monitored myself...

Mes04-pp02-04.Content: I, uh, don't know what to say, er...

Mes04-ppplayer02-A.Content: Now, now. You're not getting enough sleep, are you?

Mes04-ppplayer03-A.Content: Do you need me to make it an order?

Mes04-pp04-01.Content: I'm so sorry, I'll go rest right now!

Mes05-pp01-01.Content: Sorry, I'm a little off today.

Mes05-pp01-02.Content: In certain situations, my productivity may be affected. In order not to cause too much trouble, I prefer to warn you in advance...

Mes05-pp02-01.Content: While I was combing through the data and recalling my prototype's memories, some recollections gradually surfaced...

Mes05-pp03-01.Content: Of watching people die because they could not be cured... Or becoming aberrations because they were not helped in time.

Mes05-pp03-02.Content: I get depressed every time I recall scenes like these.

Mes05-pp03-03.Content: It doesn't matter how many times it happens...

Mes05-ppplayer03-A.Content: It's normal to be affected, you know.

Mes05-pp04-A.Content: Yes, I suppose I should be pleased that I'm not numb to it all. At least that is a normal reaction.

Mes05-ppplayer03-B.Content: Have a good rest. You'll be fine.

Mes06-pp01-01.Content: Do you ever get an inexplicable tug of nihilism?

Mes06-pp01-02.Content: Though have habitually worked so hard, every now and then the thought "Well, what's it all for?" pops into my head.

Mes06-pp01-03.Content: And then I blame myself for having such negative thoughts.

Mes06-pp01-04.Content: Could be that there isn't enough work to do? Not enough to keep me fulfilled, my time occupied? So there's no way of distracting myself or avoiding this feeling?

Mes06-ppplayer01-A.Content: Well, I can tell you immediately that it's not because you don't have enough work to do.

Mes06-ppplayer01-B.Content: Well, let me start by saying I don't think that's the underlying cause.

Mes06-pp02-03.Content: This is peculiar. I couldn't help to tell you everything, @player_name, when I'm supposed to be the caretaker.

Mes06-pp02-04.Content: Why do I get the feeling that my position is a little off? Hmm...

Mes06-pp02-05.Content: I even want to ask you what I can do to lighten my mood...

Mes06-ppplayer02-A.Content: But I think it's normal and healthy to have these sorts of thoughts now and then.

Mes06-ppplayer03-A.Content: Surely it would be equally abnormal to feel nothing but fulfillment?

Mes06-ppplayer04-A.Content: Everyone gets a little down or exhausted sometimes, right? That's part of being human. You're not just a work machine, after all.

Mes06-pp05-02.Content: He-he. The fact that I started to become more human-like, and treated by you like a human...

Mes06-pp05-03.Content: I don't even know if this is a good thing or not.

Mes06-pp06-A.Content: I also think that I'm usually pretty happy, so it's a good thing!

Mes06-ppplayer05-B.Content: It can't be a bad thing, right?

Mes06-pp06-B.Content: No, I'm pretty happy, so I think it's a good thing!

Mes06-pp06-01.Content: I'm not sure but I think I'm starting to understand a little bit...

Mes06-pp06-02.Content: Could this sense of nihilism be a physical warning sign that your health is being affected?

Mes06-ppplayer06-A.Content: Think of it as a signal that means "I need to take a break!"

Mes06-pp07-01.Content: That's a great idea! I'm feeling a lot better now.

Mes06-pp07-02.Content: I knew that talking to you was a good idea!

Mes07-pp01-02.Content: A dream of that thunderstorm... As vivid as if it was only yesterday.

Mes07-ppplayer02-A.Content: It's ok to ask for leave whenever you need to, alright?

Mes07-pp03-01.Content: Ask for leave? I've never considered that an option...

Mes07-pp03-02.Content: In that case, well... Ok. I'll do it.

Mes08-pp01-01.Content: It's been very tough on you, @player_name.

Mes08-pp01-02.Content: My adjustments are basically complete! I'll be returning to work refreshed and recharged!

Mes08-ppplayer01-B.Content: Can't wait to have you back.

Mes08-pp02-02.Content: However, there is one mindset to which I'm not sure I can "fully adjust".

Mes08-pp03-01.Content: That is, as a nurse, there is no way I will ever get used to or stop caring about "incurable" conditions...

Mes08-pp03-02.Content: Just because you've seen it so many times, still can't dismiss it as "There's nothing you can do."

Mes08-pp03-03.Content: It simply wouldn't be appropriate for medical personnel to give up before patients...

Mes08-pp03-04.Content: I have to watch myself all the time, careful not to ignore or downplay all the physical discomfort that people suffer.

Mes08-pp03-05.Content: That's the essence of my job, after all.

Mes08-ppplayer03-A.Content: I don't think that's a bad thing.

Mes08-ppplayer03-B.Content: I think that's the right thinking.

Mes08-pp04-01.Content: So, there might still be some times when things get me a little down.

Mes08-pp04-02.Content: I need to learn how to be upfront with you when that happens, and hope you understand.

Mes08-ppplayer04-B.Content: Not only will I understand, I appreciate you sharing your feelings with me.

Mes09-pp01-02.Content: Can we really ever bring about a day when aberration reversal is possible?

Mes09-pp01-03.Content: Can I hear your honest, no-holds-barred opinion, @player_name?

Mes09-ppplayer01-B.Content: It may be difficult to accomplish that in our time...

Mes09-pp02-02.Content: I will chew on this issue for a while.

Mes09-pp02-03.Content: This question is important to me... But at the same time, it is unparalleled in how much it bothers me.

Mes09-pp02-04.Content: If I believe in it, I'll probably end up facing disappointment after disappointment.

Mes09-pp02-05.Content: But if I give up, I will lose the motivation to move forward, and I can't even stand here now.

Mes10-pp01-01.Content: From a rational point of view, no matter what you think...

Mes10-pp01-02.Content: Everyone feels that there is no way to see the aberrant completely restored before the life of my prototype is exhausted.

Mes10-pp02-01.Content: Of course, as an AI I can keep it longer, I know.

Mes10-pp02-02.Content: But as you said, I have a human mind and way of thinking.

Mes10-pp02-03.Content: Because of these two "focuses of infection," waiting will turn into an ordeal, and I may suddenly break down one day.

Mes10-pp02-04.Content: I have always felt uneasy about the possibility of this future.

Mes10-pp03-01.Content: Yeah! I mean, now I don't.

Mes10-pp03-02.Content: Because I feel more courageous with you somehow, @player_name...

Mes10-pp03-03.Content: Whether it's "countless disappointments" or "an unreachable future"...

Mes10-pp03-04.Content: Any kind of future doesn't seem quite so scary.

Mes10-ppplayer03-B.Content: Let's go together no matter what.

Mes10-pp04-02.Content: That's all I have to say. That's enough chitchat. I don't want to take up any more of your time to rest.

Mes10-pp04-03.Content: Rest well while you have some time! I'll wake you up when time's almost up. See you later!

Mes09-zero-011_01.Content: System response: Hello. Something abnormal occurred in the chat channel, and there may be a problem with message transmission.

Mes01-ag-001.Content: Ah! Hi, @player_name, I'm Echo! I'm from the Warren Snowfield originally but later lived in the Banges Clinic.

Mes01-ag-002.Content: Nowadays, my dream is to be a force for good, traveling around and punishing evil.

Mes01-ag-003.Content: Let's see... I love eating fish, and my favorite person in the whole world is Granny Eileen!

Mes01-ag-004.Content: I like good people, and hate baddies.

Mes01-agplay-003.Content: Why do I feel like I'm reading a biography...

Mes01-agplay-004.Content: It's nice to meet you, but you don't need to tell me your life story all at once...

Mes01-ag-006.Content: I don't try to change myself or put on airs! It's only right to introduce yourself when meeting someone important!

Mes01-ag-007.Content: Anyway, if you give me some pointers in the future, I'll be a great help in smashing all the bad guys!

Mes01-agplay-008.Content: Looking forward to working with you.

Mes02-ag-002.Content: Isn't that what feet are for? You can walk all the way around the world, why would people need to invent vehicles?

Mes02-agplayer-001.Content: Vehicles can save a lot of effort.

Mes02-agplayer-002.Content: Vehicles can save a lot of time.

Mes02-ag-003.Content: I just rode in a vehicle, and now the whole world is spinning! I feel really dizzy... Guess I'm not used to riding in vehicles!

Mes02-ag-004.Content: But I'm good at walking! No matter how far, I'm happy to walk there!

Mes02-agplayer-003.Content: Your rambling reputation is well deserved.

Mes02-agplayer-004.Content: There's an old saying: you'll learn more from traveling than you will from books.

Mes02-ag-005.Content: Yep! I love taking it all in on a nice, long walk.

Mes03-ag-001.Content: Let me teach you how to make the best grilled fish!

Mes03-ag-002.Content: Grilling fish is an indispensable skill for hikers.

Mes03-ag-003.Content: It's not just armies that march on their stomachs, you know.

Mes03-agplayer-002.Content: This is making me a little nervous...

Mes03-ag-004.Content: For example, take this silver bass.

Mes03-ag-006.Content: Then, slice out the meaty belly section.

Mes03-ag-007.Content: Next, prepare some lava meat, swamp seaweed, grass worm, and a bird's nest.

Mes03-ag-008.Content: Of course, don't forget the thousand-year-old Aidan ginseng, as well as the special sauce made from Aidan garlic, marinated for a thousand days!

Mes03-ag-009.Content: However, this is a unique, secret recipe discovered on my adventures!

Mes03-ag-010.Content: I've never actually made it myself, though I hear that this way of cooking makes the most delicious grilled fish dish on Aida.

Mes03-agplayer-005.Content: I have literally no idea what any of these things are.

Mes03-agplayer-006.Content: I'm really not sure about this...

Mes03-ag-011.Content: I just spear the whole fish.

Mes03-ag-012.Content: And then grill it over a fire! Although it's pretty darn salty, it still retains the tasty flavor of the fish! As a great source of protein, it also has all the nutrients you might need!

Mes03-agplayer-007.Content: Wait for Aida to thrive once more, then we can go find these ingredients together and rustle up this dish!

Mes04-ag-001.Content: Have you ever seen an avalanche?

Mes04-ag-002.Content: I've seen one... And I wish every day that I hadn't...

Mes04-ag-003.Content: The torrents of snow that hurtled down that day swallowed everything. It engulfed everyone in the village, including my parents. I was the only survivor.

Mes04-ag-004.Content: I still have nightmares about it.

Mes04-ag-005.Content: That day, passing the Warren Snowfield, it all came flooding back...

Mes04-agplayer-005.Content: Remember the past, but face the future.

Mes05-ag-001.Content: You know why spears are my preferred weapon?

Mes05-ag-002.Content: One advantage is that they are long enough!

Mes05-ag-004.Content: or other emergencies, you can wave the spear as a marker.

Mes05-ag-005.Content: This'll help any rescue teams find you.

Mes05-ag-006.Content: You can even use one to spearfish!

Mes05-ag-007.Content: A long spear can catch loads.

Mes06-agplayer-002.Content: Do you know what you did wrong?

Mes06-ag-002.Content: I thought that something bad was going on.

Mes06-ag-003.Content: So I just rushed in without thinking...

Mes06-ag-005.Content: I was trying to do something good.

Mes06-ag-006.Content: But I brought more trouble instead... I am so sorry...

Mes06-agplayer-005.Content: Doing good is all about helping those in need.

Mes06-agplayer-006.Content: Doing good is not just about how it makes you feel.

Mes06-ag-007.Content: I've learned my lesson and will be more careful...

Mes06-agplayer-007.Content: Try not to be so impulsive in the future.

Mes06-agplayer-008.Content: Be sure to take a moment and center yourself.

Mes07-ag-001.Content: I wanna be the villain today!

Mes07-agplayer-002.Content: What? Why do you suddenly wanna be the villain?

Mes07-ag-002.Content: I'm annoyed, and don't wanna be the good guy!

Mes07-ag-003.Content: Seeing how doing good deeds seems to just make trouble,

Mes07-ag-004.Content: I might as well just be the bad guy!

Mes07-agplayer-006.Content: Well, Ms. Echo go with her heart as usual.

Mes07-ag-005.Content: I'm gonna join the Hyenas. I'll see myself out. Later!

Mes07-ag-006.Content: Really, don't bother seeing me out.

Mes07-ag-007.Content: I mean, it would be polite...

Mes07-ag-008.Content: Wow, I can't believe you're like that!

Mes08-ag-002.Content: Turns out I still prefer chivalry to be a baddie.

Mes08-ag-004.Content: I couldn't resist the urge to teach them a lesson.

Mes08-ag-005.Content: So I ransacked their stronghold and then came back.

Mes08-ag-006.Content: Just thinking of the people they've harassed and the homes they've razed makes my blood boil.

Mes08-ag-007.Content: I guess I just like to help the weak, standing on the side of good to eliminate evil.

Mes08-ag-008.Content: Oh, @player_name, there was something I wanted to ask you.

Mes08-ag-009.Content: What makes a deed good or evil? And what makes a person just or wicked?

Mes08-agplayer-010.Content: There are some in the Hyenas who seek peace.

Mes08-agplayer-011.Content: As there are also human bad apples.

Mes08-agplayer-012.Content: Trust your intuition, and stay true to yourself.

Mes08-ag-013.Content: Even if I don't fully understand, I'll be sure to note it down.

Mes09-ag-002.Content: If there are good Hyenas, and bad people...

Mes09-ag-003.Content: Then what's the reason to keep fighting the Hyenas?

Mes09-ag-004.Content: What's the point of protecting humans?

Mes09-ag-007.Content: As a child, I lost my family in an avalanche.

Mes09-ag-008.Content: I met many people, like Granny Eileen, who helped me.

Mes09-ag-009.Content: They helped me find my own path forward.

Mes09-agplayer-005.Content: So if people are good because they looked after you, then why are Hyenas bad?

Mes09-ag-010.Content: Because they do bad things, like rob and plunder...

Mes09-ag-012.Content: The whole point of punishing evil and promoting good.

Mes09-ag-013.Content: Is to prevent bad guys like the Hyenas from causing more misery.

Mes09-ag-015.Content: The most important thing is to ensure people are happy.

Mes09-ag-018.Content: For everyone's happiness, I'll continue on my own path!

Mes10-ag-001.Content: I like walking, because it allows you to enjoy the scenery along the way.

Mes10-ag-002.Content: You may also meet all kinds of people and experience lots of interesting things.

Mes10-ag-003.Content: And most importantly, you can help those in need and punish any bad guys who want to do bad things!

Mes10-agplayer-002.Content: Seems like it'll be a fun experience.

Mes10-ag-004.Content: @player_name, why don't you just leave the vehicle behind and walk with me during exploration?

Mes10-ag-005.Content: I'm suddenly remembering a fairy tale.

Mes10-ag-006.Content: It's the story of a master, his three disciples, and a white horse walking to their destination to get what they wanted!

Mes10-ag-007.Content: The disciple who walked was the eldestthat's definitely me, which means you're the second eldest!

Mes10-ag-010.Content: The second eldest is very handsome...

daily01-ag-002.Content: I just found that we're out of salt. The grilled fish is going to be tasteless.

daily01-agplayer-002.Content: Let me see if I've run out of it or not.

daily01-agplayer-004.Content: I'll bring you the salt in a little bit.

daily01-ag-006.Content: The grilled fish would smell even better if there were other seasonings or toppings.

daily01-ag-007.Content: But I'd be satisfied with simply a pinch of salt!

daily01-ag-008.Content: All done. I've also brought you some!

daily02-agplayer-001.Content: It's the first time I've seen someone getting motion sickness from driving a vehicle...

daily02-ag-002.Content: I don't know why... As soon as I drove at such a high speed that I moved away from the ground,

daily02-ag-003.Content: I started feeling that everything was spinning.

daily02-ag-004.Content: Good thing you didn't get into any accidents...

daily02-agplayer-006.Content: Nothing is more important than staying safe.

daily02-ag-005.Content: Looks like making my boots on the ground is more suitable for me.

daily02-agplayer-007.Content: I don't think it's called boots on the ground...

daily02-agplayer-008.Content: That's not what boots on the ground imply...

daily03-ag-001.Content: I've decided I'm going to travel the world.

daily03-ag-002.Content: Aida is vast and the scenery is beautiful.

daily03-ag-003.Content: I always get new and different experiences every time I travel to a new location.

daily03-agplayer-001.Content: Did you record everything with a photographic device?

daily03-ag-004.Content: Huh? I've always used pen and paper.

daily03-ag-005.Content: I never thought about recording it with photographic devices.

daily03-agplayer-003.Content: It's a shame I can't see what happened during your journey.

daily03-ag-006.Content: When Aida recovers, I'll travel around there again.

daily03-ag-007.Content: I'll use the photographic device you mentioned to record everything that happens throughout the journey, @player_name.

daily03-ag-008.Content: Then I'll be able to show it to everyone and let everyone see it!

daily04-ag-001.Content: Have you seen my long spear, @player_name?

daily04-ag-002.Content: Yeah... I've been looking for my long spear all day, and I haven't found it.

daily04-ag-004.Content: My long spear wasn't stolen by those wretched Hyenas, was it?

daily04-ag-005.Content: Bloody Hyenas. I'm gonna get them.

daily04-ag-006.Content: They're in for some fun once I get my long spear back.

daily04-ag-008.Content: I still can't find it. It must have been stolen by the Hyenas.

daily04-ag-009.Content: I'm right about this. It's definitely them!

daily04-ag-012.Content: It was too dark in the house. I didn't see the long spear.

daily04-agplayer-007.Content: Looks like the Hyenas didn't do that...

daily04-agplayer-008.Content: The Hyenas got a bad rap for that...

daily04-ag-013.Content: Even so, Hyenas are still villains. They still need to be beaten up!

daily04-ag-014.Content: Can't believe they got me suspecting them.

daily04-ag-015.Content: That's enough to prove that they still want to steal my long spear!

daily04-ag-016.Content: It's just that I, being courageous and mighty, have found my long spear and uncovered their fiendish plot eventually!

daily04-ag-017.Content: I'll go to the Hyenas' camp and beat them up!

daily04-agplayer-012.Content: I'll give the Hyenas a moment of silence...

Mes01-xi-001.Content: Hello! I'm Ene, an archetype battle droid of Victoria.

Mes01-xi-002.Content: We're gonna fight together, so please assign me more missions!

Mes01-xi-003.Content: Sounds so exciting! I can't wait.

Mes01-xi-004.Content: If there's no mission at present, I'll go practice my technique and gather more data!

Mes02-xi-001.Content: I once again defeated many enemies today!

Mes02-xi-003.Content: There I was, deep in the midst of the enemy.

Mes02-xi-004.Content: So, when I popped up right in front of them, guess what!

Mes02-xi-005.Content: They had no idea just how serious the situation was.

Mes02-xi-006.Content: Honestly, they thought I was just some sort of civilian housework droid!

Mes02-xi-007.Content: They all started laughing at me, and said "How come they sent some little housekeeping droid? Are they looking down on us?"

Mes02-xi-008.Content: I'm sure you can guess the outcome. I mean, it's obvious! BANG! In one fell swoop, down they all go! All of them!

Mes02-xiplayer-008.Content: That must have been a spectacular battle!

Mes02-xi-009.Content: I can't believe they dared to look down on me!

Mes02-xi-010.Content: People will pay a hefty price for underestimating me!

Mes02-xiplayer-010.Content: Your cute exterior hides a truly incredible power.

Mes02-xiplayer-011.Content: You're a warrior I can rely on, Ene.

Mes02-xi-011.Content: Keep giving me more battle missions, please! I'll always give it my all!

Mes03-xi-002.Content: I'm okay. I was just wondering... If I've been a good daughter...

Mes03-xiplayer-003.Content: Do you miss your father, Ene?

Mes03-xi-003.Content: I keep remembering when I used to live with Father.

Mes03-xi-004.Content: Father died from working too hard in the disaster.

Mes03-xi-005.Content: At that time, I was so busy fighting aberrant creatures and defending the Hykros Suppressor Institute.

Mes03-xi-006.Content: Ultimately, I was unable to see Father one last time before he died.

Mes03-xi-007.Content: Is it not regrettable that a Father cannot see his daughter by his deathbed?

Mes03-xiplayer-010.Content: What sort of person do you want to be?

Mes03-xi-008.Content: I only wanted to protect my Father, and everyone else.

Mes03-xi-009.Content: I want to become a person who can protect my Father, and everyone!

Mes03-xiplayer-011.Content: Ene's father would feel bad about it, but I don't think he'll have any regrets.

Mes03-xiplayer-013.Content: You're doing what your father wanted to do, but couldn't. He would be so proud of you.

Mes03-xi-011.Content: Thank you, @player_name. I feel much better now.

Mes03-xi-012.Content: Father, please bear witness to my vow! I will continue to fulfill my responsibility now and in the future.

Mes04-xiplayer-002.Content: You'll run into problems if you keep this up.

Mes04-xi-002.Content: I don't want to leave the dangerous missions to others...

Mes04-xi-003.Content: I am a powerful battle droid. I should handle these types of missions.

Mes04-xi-005.Content: My responsibility, as a machine developed by Victoria Security, is to protect you from injury in battle.

Mes04-xiplayer-004.Content: But I worry about you too. Everyone does.

Mes04-xiplayer-005.Content: My responsibility, as your Simulacrum bearer, is to protect you from injury in battle, too.

Mes04-xiplayer-006.Content: If you get hurt and can't fight, how can you expect to protect everyone?

Mes04-xiplayer-007.Content: Protecting yourself also protects everyone else.

Mes05-xi-001.Content: I want to spar with Meryl!

Mes05-xiplayer-002.Content: Why do you want to spar with Meryl?

Mes05-xi-002.Content: Meryl gives me the impression of a volcano, just waiting to erupt.

Mes05-xi-003.Content: Not a lot of activity on the outside, but a huge amount of power bubbling away inside.

Mes05-xi-004.Content: She's so enigmatic! I'm fascinated by her!

Mes05-xiplayer-004.Content: You've got a unique way of looking at things.

Mes05-xi-005.Content: I think that sparring with her will yield a lot of data that can be applied in combat. That'll help me fight even better!

Mes05-xiplayer-005.Content: Why don't you go ask her?

Mes05-xiplayer-006.Content: Just go find Meryl and say hello.

Mes05-xi-007.Content: But what if she doesn't accept my challenge...?

Mes06-xi-002.Content: While I have some relevant memories, I still don't understand.

Mes06-xi-003.Content: With my mechanical body, I can never really know what it's like to be human. The last "me" was plagued with a debilitating illness, before eventually passing away full of regret.

Mes06-xi-004.Content: I've seen too many people get sick lately. It makes me worry about you.

Mes06-xi-005.Content: My machine body will never get sick. There is no need to worry about me. But it's not the same for you, @player_name.

Mes07-xi-001.Content: How will droids develop in the future?

Mes07-xi-002.Content: Eras past had AI for playing all sorts of games.

Mes07-xi-003.Content: And these days there are AI battle droids such as myself.

Mes07-xiplay-003.Content: They represent different stages of AI development.

Mes07-xiplay-004.Content: Technological progress is a truly marvelous thing.

Mes07-xi-004.Content: But regardless of whether it's playing games or fighting, everything is ultimately in service of survival. No matter humans or any other species.

Mes07-xi-005.Content: This world is chaos, and it's chaotic surviving in it. The humans born into such madness are just as mad, too.

Mes07-xi-007.Content: Humans are just like more advanced droids. More adapted for survival.

Mes07-xi-008.Content: Countless millennia of evolution led humans to this form, Made emergent civilizations well-adapted to this universe.

Mes07-xi-009.Content: It is not like this for droids.

Mes07-xi-010.Content: Is it odd that I can ponder these things, as a droid myself?

Mes07-xi-011.Content: A strange person once said all this to me.

Mes07-xi-012.Content: I cannot fully understand it's meaning,

Mes07-xi-014.Content: She told me that droids should always be learning from humans, and respecting their needs.

Mes08-xi-001.Content: My memory can chart the course of human civilization, from prosperity to decline.

Mes08-xi-002.Content: In fact, the world we inhabit today bears quite a lot of resemblance to the "wasteland" described in historical works of art.

Mes08-xi-004.Content: "Wasteland" is a creative theme that usually depicts a post-apocalyptic world, and the survivors living therein.

Mes08-xi-005.Content: Law and order are long since gone, with self-restraint the only thing limiting the worst of human behavior.

Mes08-xi-006.Content: There is also a grave lack of resources.

Mes08-xi-007.Content: It's at times like this that human nature can really shine.

Mes08-xiplayer-003.Content: That's really something to chew on.

Mes08-xi-008.Content: What would happen if, in the future, droids and humans somehow needed the same resources to survive?

Mes08-xi-009.Content: I wonder how you, as a human, would view droids then.

Mes08-xiplayer-005.Content: I believe droids will be friends of humans.

Mes08-xiplayer-006.Content: Humans and droids can find a way to coexist.

Mes09-xiplayer-001.Content: You are such a strange droid.

Mes09-xi-003.Content: Droids are becoming closer and closer to humans, yearning for the beauty within them.

Mes09-xi-004.Content: But what about humans? They're losing their inner beauty and becoming more like droidsruthless and indifferent.

Mes09-xi-005.Content: Over time, it's becoming more unclear who is a machine and who is a human.

Mes09-xi-006.Content: @player_name, what do you think of me?

Mes09-xiplayer-003.Content: Give me some time to think it over.

Mes09-xiplayer-004.Content: Although you're a droid, you have always fought by our side.

Mes09-xiplayer-005.Content: Humans are human because we are constantly reflecting on and changing ourselves.

Mes09-xi-009.Content: I approve of what you said, @player_name!

Mes10-xi-001.Content: Can you go somewhere with me?

Mes10-xi-002.Content: I want to go to Victoria, the company.

Mes10-xi-003.Content: I want to go to the place I was born so I can feel bits and pieces of my prototype.

Mes10-xi-005.Content: Whether as a "droid" or a "person," Ene will go on.

Mes10-xi-006.Content: So @player_name, please stay by my side in the days to come.

Mes10-xiplayer-004.Content: Sure, we'll always be together, Ene.

daily01-xi-001.Content: I saw a happy and harmonious family go on an excursion today.

daily01-xi-002.Content: The feelings between human beings are really wonderful.

daily01-xi-003.Content: There are affection, friendship, romantic relationship, and many other emotions that I can't depict.

daily01-xiplayer-003.Content: The love between human beings is the most wonderful thing in this world.

daily01-xiplayer-004.Content: Love is the best treasure in the world.

daily01-xi-006.Content: In order to protect such happiness, I'll fight on with you, @player_name.

daily02-xi-002.Content: Hey, hey, hey! What's wrong? What's wrong?

daily02-xiplayer-002.Content: You took French leave again today!

daily02-xiplayer-003.Content: You went challenging enemies several times more powerful than you are. I really don't know what to say to you.

daily02-xiplayer-005.Content: You must learn to take care of yourself.

daily02-xiplayer-007.Content: I'm grounding you as your punishment. You're not allowed to take on missions for now.

daily02-xi-007.Content: Oh, come on... No! Forgive me, @player_name.

daily02-xiplayer-008.Content: No! You must learn your lesson.

daily02-xiplayer-009.Content: I won't let you do anything so dangerous again.

daily03-xi-001.Content: You've been fighting for a long time, @player_name. Get some rest.

daily03-xi-002.Content: I'm not like you. I'm a droid. Droids don't need to rest.

daily03-xi-003.Content: I'm born to fight. I must keep on fighting for everyone.

daily03-xiplayer-003.Content: Droids need to rest and be maintained, too.

daily03-xiplayer-004.Content: You can rely on your companions more.

daily03-xiplayer-005.Content: You'll fight better after you're maintained.

daily04-xi-001.Content: Did you get the snacks I gave you?

daily04-xi-002.Content: Those are foods I lovingly selected.

daily04-xiplayer-004.Content: These are all my favorite foods.

daily04-xiplayer-005.Content: But there's something I don't get and want to ask you. Why are you always giving me snacks?

daily04-xi-004.Content: I'm a droid, so I can't eat human foods.

daily04-xi-005.Content: But seeing those foods gave me cravings.

daily04-xi-006.Content: So I bought some for you, @player_name. You're the most important person to me now.

daily04-xi-007.Content: It's like I'm eating them when you are. Whenever I think of this, my emotion module gets sincerely happy.

daily01-king03-003.Content: The participants' level in the competition nowadays puts me to sleep...

daily01-king02-004.Content: It's a good choice as a condiment for your meal.

daily03-king01-001.Content: Although I don't understand or look good with earrings, necklaces, and rings, I do wear a lot of them.

daily03-kingplayer01-001.Content: Are you trying to pump yourself up because of what you said?

daily03-king02-002.Content: On the other hand, you could say it's for other people.

daily03-king03-001.Content: I don't know where will be my resting place, but if someone would bury me, they can take them for the work.

daily03-kingplayer03B-001.Content: But what if it falls to the hand of someone who killed you?

daily03-king04A-001.Content: What would you like to say?

daily03-king04B-002.Content: Thanks for putting an end to my endless greed.

daily03-king05-001.Content: You do know how to say the right thing.

daily03-king05-002.Content: But worry not, I have no plans to do that.

daily03-king05-003.Content: It's my nature to be a straight shooter. It's very rare for "that guy" to consider the future.

daily03-king05-004.Content: I don't know how I could technically die as an AI, but that's not important.

daily03-king05-005.Content: The fact is, I'm still alive...

daily03-king06-001.Content: You just have to summarize it better, don't you?

daily04-king01-001.Content: The Ravagers are despicable for robbing shelters to survive.

daily04-kingplayer01B-001.Content: I didn't expect you to disapprove of them.

daily04-king02-001.Content: If I hopped on that bandwagon, I'd be no different from those exploiting others for a living.

daily04-kingplayer02A-001.Content: So make money with your own abilities?

daily04-kingplayer02B-001.Content: Would you loot someone you beat?

daily04-king03B-002.Content: If someone came for me and wasted my time, I'd take some stuff.

daily04-king03B-003.Content: I don't think there's anything wrong with being compensated in that case.

daily05-king01-001.Content: I feel you overthink things sometimes.

daily05-king01-002.Content: Keep missing the chance to maximize the time.

daily05-kingplayer01A-001.Content: You're the one who's overthinking it.

daily05-kingplayer01B-001.Content: Isn't the whole thinking process is a waste of time?

daily05-king02-003.Content: Probably because you don't have much time left.

daily05-king02-004.Content: I think you've steered me wrong in some ways.

daily05-king02-005.Content: Otherwise, I believe I wouldn't even consider "You're overthinking it."

daily01-pp01-02.Content: I always read their log with unease.

daily01-pp01-03.Content: So I could be happily surprised occasionally, like I am now!

daily01-pp02-B.Content: Not just me, many others are looking forward to the study!

daily01-pp02-01.Content: Actually, when I read reports of rough or failed experiments in the log...

daily01-pp02-03.Content: Maybe I'm more mature now, so I don't feel rock bottom anymore.

daily01-ppplayer02-A.Content: Got to take it one step at a time.

daily01-ppplayer02-B.Content: Failure is the mother of success.

daily02-pp01-01.Content: Did you stay up all night?

daily02-pp01-02.Content: Burning the midnight oil will make you stupid. Don't do that!

daily02-pp02-A1.Content: Yeah, I see dark circles already!

daily02-pp02-A2.Content: Stop working and take a nap immediately!

daily02-ppplayer01-B.Content: No, I didn't stay up late.

daily02-pp02-B2.Content: Or is that an error on the record for the physical exam...?

daily02-pp02-B3.Content: Oh no, is it actually me who lost my mind because I stayed up late?

daily02-pp02-B4.Content: I'm very sorry. I'll take a nap right now!

daily03-pp01-01.Content: At first, I couldn't understand why I was equipped with lethal weapons when I was supposed to heal...

daily03-pp01-02.Content: But slowly, I started to figure it out.

daily03-pp02-01.Content: A big part of the medical profession is to reduce the impact of pain and agony on patients.

daily03-pp02-02.Content: But if one had the power to fight and protect...

daily03-pp02-03.Content: Very often, even quite possibly, one could prevent pain and agony in the first place.

daily03-ppplayer02-A.Content: I think that is a very good perspective.

daily03-ppplayer02-B.Content: But aren't there Executor too? You have different responsibilities.

daily03-pp03-B1.Content: Don't put a limitation on my job, and that's the rule I make for myself.

daily03-pp03-01.Content: If it's something within my abilities to do and help...

daily03-pp03-03.Content: I won't avoid it because "It's not my job." I'll take the responsibility...

daily04-pp01-02.Content: I can't be a part of them, but whenever I see it, I'd think I must keep working hard...

daily04-ppplayer01-A.Content: But I see you as a family!

daily04-pp02-02.Content: Please don't put it so lightly...

daily04-pp02-03.Content: Wow, that's very shady of you.

daily04-pp02-04.Content: Yeah. Regardless of whether you're serious...

daily04-pp02-05.Content: I really don't feel lonely at all, so don't worry.

daily05-pp01-01.Content: Would you be interested in afternoon tea?

daily05-pp01-02.Content: I'm pretty confident making tea. Like Cocoritter, I used to prepare snacks for the doctors and patients too.

daily05-pp01-03.Content: I also cared for a kid who refused to take medicine. I just put it in the snack and served it to him.

daily05-ppplayer01-A.Content: I refused to take medicine too.

daily05-pp02-02.Content: However, you didn't need medicine before that, either.

daily05-pp02-03.Content: And way before that, I'd get you snacks even without you hinting. Please wait.

mes01-marc-001.Content: Marc, Commander of the Hunters. Pleasure to meet you.

mes01-marc-002.Content: Call me Marc. That's what everyone calls me.

mes01-marc-003.Content: That's what a lot of people call me.

mes01-marc-004.Content: From now on, we are comrades.

mes01-marc-005.Content: I look forward to fighting battles side by side with you.

mes02-marc-001.Content: You want to know about the Hunters?

mes02-marc-002.Content: The Hunters were founded with the purpose of bringing back the necessary survival supplies for Lighthouse.

mes02-marc-003.Content: As the last refuge of mankind, Lighthouse is home to a large population, but the supplies that Lighthouse can produce are far from enough to sustain everyone.

mes02-marc-004.Content: That's why there is a need to regularly send Hunters to the ground.

mes02-marc-005.Content: We search for and collect precious survival supplies from the ground where the gorgers roam.

mes02-marc-r-003.Content: Sounds like a drudge to me.

mes02-marc-r-004.Content: This job doesn't sound easy at all.

mes02-marc-007.Content: But the people at Lighthouse need us.

mes02-marc-r-005.Content: You must be tired, Commander Marc.

mes03-marc-001.Content: "I" am giving this badge to you as a gift.

mes03-marc-003.Content: Yes, this badge has a very special meaning.

mes03-marc-004.Content: The data recorded in the badge represents the status and class of the wearer.

mes03-marc-005.Content: Our Lighthouse has a special rule of survival.

mes03-marc-006.Content: People are divided into two different classes from birth: the upper class and the lower class.

mes03-marc-007.Content: People of the upper class wear a badge with a blue logo, while those of the lower class wear a green one.

mes03-marc-008.Content: We're all human but are labeled differently from birth.

mes03-marc-009.Content: Are we... actually doing the right thing?

mes04-marc-001.Content: On Aida... do you divide people into the upper class and the lower class?

mes04-marc-r-001.Content: I wanted to ask before. What exactly is that?

mes04-marc-003.Content: Lighthouse is the only sanctuary for humanity in apocalyptic times.

mes04-marc-005.Content: So our Governor developed a rule of survival based on genetic optimization.

mes04-marc-007.Content: At Lighthouse, your value is determined by your genetics.

mes04-marc-008.Content: are divided into the upper and lower classes.

mes04-marc-009.Content: The genetically superior upper class is responsible for breeding.

mes04-marc-010.Content: They are engaged in technical work.

mes04-marc-011.Content: The lower class is responsible for physical labor.

mes04-marc-012.Content: They have no rights to breed.

mes04-marc-014.Content: They are numbered so as to distinguish one from another.

mes04-marc-015.Content: I am trying to give the people of the lower class the rights to be human.

mes04-marc-016.Content: We have been working hard for this cause.

mes04-marc-017.Content: It shouldn't matter whether you are a person of the upper or lower class.

mes04-marc-r-010.Content: You must be tired, Commander Marc.

mes04-marc-020.Content: I hope that one day, people of the lower class of Lighthouse will also have names of their own.

mes05-marc-002.Content: I'm suddenly missing the taste of milk.

mes05-marc-003.Content: Milk is a scarce resource on Lighthouse.

mes05-marc-004.Content: But as a child, I resisted drinking milk.

mes05-marc-005.Content: When that happened, my sister would always try every possible way to persuade me to drink it.

mes05-marc-006.Content: Whenever I finished drinking, she would smile brightly.

mes05-marc-007.Content: Yes, her name was Hongkou and she was whom I was closest to.

mes05-marc-r-006.Content: I'm sure your sister must be very proud of you now, Marc.

mes05-marc-r-007.Content: After all, you've become a hero to everyone, Marc.

mes05-marc-r-008.Content: After all, you've become the Commander of the Hunters, Marc.

mes05-marc-010.Content: I guess. She would be so delighted if she... I know she would...

mes05-marc-r-010.Content: (Things seem to have gotten a little awkward.)

mes06-marc-001.Content: Feels like cooking is really amazing.

mes06-marc-002.Content: Collect the ingredients you need on the ground.

mes06-marc-004.Content: You can create as many dishes and flavors as you want.

mes06-marc-005.Content: At Lighthouse, food is distributed in a standardized way.

mes06-marc-006.Content: Many townspeople don't even know that they can prepare food in this way.

mes06-marc-r-003.Content: I believe they'll survive the Cataclysm.

mes07-marc-001.Content: Actually, when I lived on Lighthouse,

mes07-marc-002.Content: I did think about the future of mankind sometimes.

mes07-marc-003.Content: Is there a more appropriate way to survive than staying on Lighthouse?

mes07-marc-r-002.Content: A more appropriate way to survive?

mes07-marc-004.Content: In order to stay away from the ground where gorgers roam.

mes07-marc-005.Content: Lighthouse is an airborne city that became the last refuge of humanity.

mes07-marc-006.Content: To be able to live on Lighthouse and preserve the last of the human species.

mes07-marc-007.Content: Lighthouse set up strict rules for survival.

mes07-marc-008.Content: It's advocated to abandon the old-world emotions.

mes07-marc-010.Content: After all, Lighthouse is the carrier of people's hopes.

mes07-marc-011.Content: Or just a refuge for people to drag out an ignoble existence.

mes07-marc-013.Content: But I'm only discussing this with you because I'm on Aida, far away from Lighthouse.

mes08-marc-001.Content: Wanna know how the Hunters bring back supplies from the ground?

mes08-marc-002.Content: In order for them to bring back the supplies.

mes08-marc-003.Content: Lighthouse has made cutting-edge technology its backbone.

mes08-marc-005.Content: Ordinary soldiers as auxiliaries. This is the battle mode it has developed.

mes08-marc-006.Content: The code of conduct for us Hunters is

mes08-marc-007.Content: to make sure that the primary goal of all missions is to recover supplies and refrain from confrontation with gorgers.

mes08-marc-008.Content: This code of conduct has also served as a guideline for Lighthouse's development and improvement of vehicles.

mes09-marc-001.Content: Last time... you said you want to know about Dawn, the Heavy System.

mes09-marc-002.Content: The fundamental carrier of the Heavy System is based on rare powered armor from the old world.

mes09-marc-003.Content: And it's upgraded with energy and defense modules.

mes09-marc-004.Content: They are rare combat resources on Lighthouse.

mes09-marc-r-004.Content: Lighthouse is equipped with state-of-the-art scientific technology.

mes09-marc-006.Content: is a sophisticated modification based on the White Shark model.

mes09-marc-r-005.Content: Modified based on the White Shark model?

mes09-marc-008.Content: The modification focuses on start-up speed and weapon enhancement.

mes09-marc-r-006.Content: Why this paint job? And how did the name come about?

mes09-marc-009.Content: Ha-ha, the black paint is the symbol of the Hunters Commander.

mes09-marc-011.Content: Its name comes from an idol of mine when I was a kid. Let's not talk about this for the time being...

mes10-marc-003.Content: You're the Executor of Hykros. Don't you work out?

mes10-marc-005.Content: How are you suppose to keep Aida peaceful?

mes10-marc-007.Content: Let's set you a small goal of doing 500 pull-ups and 1000 push-ups today.

mes10-marc-009.Content: I'll be there in a moment.

mes10-marc-010.Content: It's just working out. Think of it as... a game.

mes10-marc-012.Content: Don't get the wrong idea. I'm a decent person.

mes10-marc-r-010.Content: Why do you need to mention this specifically...

mes10-marc-r-011.Content: A day full of torture is about to begin...

daily01-marc-002.Content: Looks like it'll last for a while.

daily01-marc-r-003.Content: You always care so much about the gathering of supplies.

daily01-marc-003.Content: Hunters are hardwired to gather supplies.

daily01-marc-004.Content: I hope we'll be very fruitful every time.

daily02-marc-r-001.Content: Hykros is the fruition of our world's technologies.

daily02-marc-006.Content: Things will be different on "my" side of the world like they were here.

daily02-marc-007.Content: But right now, I still have to focus on fighting the apocalypse first.

daily02-marc-r-004.Content: I believe he will be able to do it.

daily03-marc-002.Content: make more use of my Heavy System.

daily03-marc-003.Content: It is a reliable helper for me.

daily03-marc-r-001.Content: Dawn is a very powerful piece of equipment.

daily03-marc-004.Content: It sure is. I couldn't have survived in a dangerous apocalyptic world

daily03-marc-008.Content: The members in Hunters who risked their lives so many times for me.

daily03-marc-009.Content: I wonder how they are doing now.

daily03-marc-r-003.Content: I hope they are all doing well.

daily03-marc-010.Content: I believe they will... They will.

mes01-byk-002.Content: From now on, we'll be partners fighting the apocalyptic war together.

mes01-byk-003.Content: It is not an easy task to survive in the apocalyptic world.

mes02-byk-001.Content: How did Aida come to be in such a condition?

mes02-byk-r-001.Content: It was caused by the great catastrophe.

mes02-byk-r-002.Content: It was caused by the leakage of Omnium.

mes02-byk-002.Content: After that, the ecology of Aida was permanently changed and eventually came to be like this?

mes02-byk-003.Content: I could tell that this used to be a beautiful planet.

mes02-byk-004.Content: Just like the place where I was born.

mes02-byk-005.Content: If there were no disasters, people would have been able to live happily.

mes02-byk-r-005.Content: Everything is going to be all right.

mes03-byk-r-001.Content: Some avant-garde scientists want to make Omnium better serve mankind.

mes03-byk-002.Content: So you decided to gather together and make good use of everyone's talents?

mes03-byk-r-004.Content: They believe that the direction of human development is to accept and master Omnium.

mes03-byk-r-005.Content: And it is Hykros' responsibility to lead mankind towards evolution.

mes03-byk-005.Content: Hah! You're a group of very special people.

mes04-byk-001.Content: It reminds me of the time when the disaster had just happened.

mes04-byk-002.Content: I watched disasters happen in the world I lived in.

mes04-byk-003.Content: The whole world became inferno, and people lost everything in a matter of minutes.

mes04-byk-004.Content: They fought with each other and stopped at nothing just to survive.

mes04-byk-005.Content: Friends and relatives would kill each other for a place of refuge.

mes04-byk-006.Content: We were betrayed by the people we trusted the most and everyone was worried.

mes04-byk-007.Content: For a time, we abandoned our humanity in order to survive.

mes04-byk-008.Content: We looked like men walking on the ground but lived like beasts.

mes04-byk-r-007.Content: Everything is going to be all right... The world's going to get better.

mes05-byk-001.Content: Do you think it's necessary for people in an apocalyptic world

mes05-byk-004.Content: One would have escaped being hunted.

mes05-byk-005.Content: Instead, one may put oneself back in harm's way because one's loved one is stranded.

mes05-byk-006.Content: In a situation where the supplies should have been sufficient,

mes05-byk-007.Content: an individual's momentary greed may lead to the entire group being brought to bay.

mes05-byk-008.Content: But emotions can also be a source of strength for people.

mes05-byk-010.Content: People may be able to generate limitless amounts of power because of their emotions.

mes05-byk-011.Content: Harsh environments force living organisms to evolve.

mes05-byk-012.Content: Our spiritual capability will also make such a leap.

mes05-byk-r-005.Content: What strange way of putting it.

mes05-byk-013.Content: Only with courage do we dare to face creatures far stronger than ourselves.

mes05-byk-014.Content: Only with perseverance can we overcome difficulties.

mes05-byk-015.Content: It is because of emotions that human beings have infinite potential.

mes05-byk-r-007.Content: I agree with what you said.

mes06-byk-001.Content: Got rid of the enemy easily.

mes06-byk-002.Content: Is writing a battle report necessary?

mes06-byk-r-002.Content: To think you were a brain scientist before.

mes06-byk-r-003.Content: It's really hard to associate you with the image of brain scientists.

mes06-byk-004.Content: It's a necessary skill for those who want to survive in the apocalyptic world.

mes06-byk-005.Content: It's been a long blooming time.

mes06-byk-006.Content: My research in the field of the brain has led to revolutionary results that have given humans a whole new understanding of the brain.

mes06-byk-009.Content: What happened later was that... Heh, forget it.

mes07-byk-001.Content: Playing the final level of the new game now.

mes07-byk-002.Content: Done avoiding mines. Feels pretty good.

mes07-byk-003.Content: A new round is about to start. You coming?

mes07-byk-r-003.Content: What type of game is it?

mes07-byk-r-004.Content: What kind of game is it?

mes07-byk-005.Content: Up, up, down, down, left, left, right, right, B, A, B, A.

mes07-byk-007.Content: Quit changing the subject. Are you coming or what?

mes08-byk-001.Content: I heard some call me Auntie Bai or Grandma Bai.

mes08-byk-r-003.Content: I also want to know the secret of why your appearance hasn't changed much over the years.

mes08-byk-004.Content: When you learn the truth one day.

mes09-byk-001.Content: How does it feel to ride in my car?

mes09-byk-r-001.Content: You're great at driving, but don't drive again.

mes09-byk-003.Content: I quite enjoy the sound of the wind whistling in my ears.

mes09-byk-004.Content: The feeling of riding around with my friends among a horde of gorgers. Heh, I'm starting to miss it.

mes09-byk-r-003.Content: What kind of people is willing to get into your car?

mes09-byk-005.Content: They call me boss. They're a group of fellows who follow me willingly.

mes09-byk-006.Content: It's a shame it'll never be the same again.

mes09-byk-011.Content: It just hit me that you're all right.

mes09-byk-012.Content: You're allowed to ride with me next time. (smiles)

mes10-byk-001.Content: Do you know what photography is?

mes10-byk-002.Content: A way to record the reality in a 2-dimensional form.

mes10-byk-r-001.Content: Taking photos? Of course, I know what it is.

mes10-byk-003.Content: I thought that as Aida is technologically advanced.

mes10-byk-007.Content: Taking photos is a popular way of life among people.

mes10-byk-008.Content: People record their lives and share their emotions by taking photos.

mes10-byk-010.Content: How would you like to get together sometime to take a photo of us?

mes10-byk-012.Content: Perhaps it'll become one of my most precious photos.

daily01-byk-001.Content: Wanna know how we live on the ground over there?

daily01-byk-002.Content: We have a special method of "recuperation."

daily01-byk-003.Content: This allows us to escape from the gorgers.

daily01-byk-r-002.Content: It's amazing how miraculous it is.

daily01-byk-004.Content: To be able to live on the ground.

daily01-byk-005.Content: We have figured out a whole new way to survive.

daily01-byk-006.Content: This is different from those at Lighthouse.

daily01-byk-r-003.Content: What a novel way to survive!

daily02-byk-002.Content: It reminds me of my old self.

daily02-byk-003.Content: When the research results were first published.

daily02-byk-004.Content: There I was in the hologram.

daily02-byk-005.Content: How I made a fool of myself in front of everyone.

daily02-byk-r-002.Content: There seems to be a lot of stories about it.

daily02-byk-006.Content: That was a long time ago.

daily02-byk-007.Content: So long that many of the things in my memory has become vague.

daily03-byk-001.Content: We are always looking for ways to put an end to mana bio.

daily03-byk-r-001.Content: The way to end mana bio?

daily03-byk-003.Content: Mana bio is the culprit that brought about the apocalypse.

daily03-byk-004.Content: The key areas of mana bio are inaccessible to humans.

daily03-byk-005.Content: There is no way to get more secrets about mana bio.

daily03-byk-006.Content: Perhaps we need a bridge that allows humans to communicate with mana bio.

daily03-byk-007.Content: To be precise, it should be a suitable "person."

daily03-byk-r-004.Content: The way you are asking make it seems like you already have an answer.

daily03-byk-011.Content: The "me" on the other side is probably waiting for some opportunity.

mes01-sl-001.Content: Let me see the log in... The log in of the communication device...

mes01-sl-005.Content: Unlike the radiofrequency transceiver function of the Angel of Clemency, you need to manually type everything with this one.

mes01-sl-006.Content: I forgot how to do some of the operations, but I guess it's okay as long as I can log in...

mes01-sl-007.Content: The log in name is... Nemesis.

mes01-sl-r-003.Content: Can it be changed to Shirli?

mes01-sl-009.Content: It seems that the basic setting is based on the name registered in Hykros, and it can't be modified without permission.

mes01-sl-010.Content: I have actually come to terms with that code name now.

mes01-sl-011.Content: But it's also true that my heart feels warm inside when I get called "Shirli"...

mes01-sl-012.Content: This reminds me over and over again of something I can't forget. Some of it is about you, @player_name.

mes01-sl-r-006.Content: Then I will continue to call you Shirli!

mes01-sl-014.Content: We'll be spending a lot of time together from now on, so let's chat often when we're free.

mes02-sl-001.Content: @player_name, although I'm really happy that you come and care about me from time to time.

mes02-sl-002.Content: But I'm getting a lot better now.

mes02-sl-003.Content: I don't think you need to worry too much about me.

mes02-sl-r-002.Content: You seem suffering to me sometimes...

mes02-sl-005.Content: Please believe me. I'll report to you if anything strange happens to me.

mes02-sl-006.Content: I won't push myself too hard...

mes02-sl-007.Content: It would also increase the burden on my companions, so it is something that should be avoided.

mes02-sl-r-003.Content: Okay, let's follow your plan, Shirli.

mes02-sl-009.Content: But, on the contrary, I hope you can relax a little in front of me.

mes03-sl-001.Content: Did my condition really look that bad just then?

mes03-sl-r-002.Content: How can I not worry about you when you're like this.

mes03-sl-002.Content: Well... I'm just wondering whether my face betrays too much of my troubles...

mes03-sl-003.Content: Whether everyone who sees me like this will be drawn into a negative state...

mes03-sl-004.Content: I don't know how to describe this. I'm sorry.

mes03-sl-005.Content: Oh right, at the very least, I wanted to tell you that...

mes03-sl-006.Content: Although I look like I'm not doing well every now and then, it isn't always because of my body.

mes03-sl-007.Content: I could just be sorting though my emotions.

mes03-sl-r-004.Content: That's not a trivial matter, is it?

mes03-sl-008.Content: Do you think it would be better for me to discuss all kinds of ideas with you?

mes04-sl-001.Content: I'm also still trying to find out what I can do with this body.

mes04-sl-002.Content: There aren't any instruction manuals I can read.

mes04-sl-003.Content: Right now, I feel like I'm moving this body based on instinct, but I don't know how it works...

mes04-sl-004.Content: I was wondering if there are any untapped features that could be exploited.

mes04-sl-005.Content: Then I can be of more use...

mes04-sl-006.Content: Once I understand myself better, I'll also tell @player_name everything I learn.

mes05-sl-003.Content: And I can't say where's hurting either.

mes05-sl-004.Content: It feels like pain has been forced into my head to warn me of things, rather than me experiencing pain at certain parts of the body...

mes05-sl-006.Content: Much worse has happened before. At least I haven't gotten to the point where I can't move yet.

mes05-sl-r-003.Content: I'll stay with you until you get better, Shirli.

mes06-sl-001.Content: The pain is almost all gone.

mes06-sl-002.Content: How did the organic metal used to build my new body connect to my pain nerves...

mes06-sl-003.Content: I really can't imagine how this technology works.

mes06-sl-004.Content: If this technology can be widely used in the future...

mes06-sl-005.Content: Would other people gradually be willing to replace their body with this high-performance, radiation-resistant body?

mes06-sl-r-004.Content: I think such a future is possible.

mes06-sl-r-005.Content: I think many will oppose it.

mes06-sl-007.Content: I seem to have heard of an experiment before.

mes06-sl-008.Content: Although I can't remember the details, I think the discussion was about how much of something had to be replaced before the thing is no longer the same thing.

mes06-sl-r-006.Content: I think I know about this one.

mes06-sl-010.Content: No matter how I think about it, this is who I am now. This is my real appearance.

mes06-sl-011.Content: I can only choose to accept and adapt...

mes07-sl-001.Content: @player_name, there's something I want to thank you for...

mes07-sl-003.Content: Thank you for always calling me Shirli.

mes07-sl-004.Content: To you, it might just be a habit.

mes07-sl-005.Content: But it is very important to me.

mes07-sl-006.Content: I'm often struggling with many things that I can't process properly...

mes07-sl-007.Content: The only thing I'm sure of is that there's something I absolutely have to hold on to.

mes07-sl-008.Content: If so, please don't let go.

mes08-sl-001.Content: The Heirs of Aida tried to replace my original personality with an implanted one.

mes08-sl-002.Content: It is probably possible to deduce what they want to use me for, based on the nature of the implanted personality.

mes08-sl-003.Content: Their technology indeed had extended my life...

mes08-sl-004.Content: I must admit that I'm quite torn about this.

mes08-sl-005.Content: But that isn't a reason to let them do whatever they want with me.

mes08-sl-006.Content: I won't let myself disappear... They can't make me disappear either.

mes08-sl-r-002.Content: I won't let them get their way.

mes08-sl-007.Content: What I'm concerned with is that...

mes08-sl-008.Content: Although the data of the implanted personality seems to be suppressed right now.

mes08-sl-009.Content: It might be waiting for an opportunity to seize control... or something like that.

mes08-sl-r-004.Content: In the end, even I started worrying...

mes08-sl-r-005.Content: No, this is indeed a hidden danger.

mes08-sl-011.Content: There is currently no good way to prevent this.

mes08-sl-012.Content: After all, my body is made of metal, and the control technology linked to my brain is from the research of the Heirs of Aida.

mes08-sl-013.Content: ... I will train myself to become stronger...

mes08-sl-014.Content: That's all I can think of right now...

mes08-sl-015.Content: Other than that, I'll try not to think about this, so that I won't always look distressed every day.

mes08-sl-r-007.Content: You won't be worrying about this alone.

mes08-sl-017.Content: I'm only telling you because you're a trustworthy person.

mes09-sl-001.Content: Sometimes, I have a thought that is a little scary.

mes09-sl-002.Content: What's left of me, if strictly speaking, is only the head...

mes09-sl-003.Content: Well, then, has organic metal filled up my missing parts...

mes09-sl-004.Content: Or have my remnants been forced to live on them?

mes09-sl-005.Content: There are too many things I don't understand, so I always feel confused.

mes09-sl-r-004.Content: Is this the way you must go through to accept yourself?

mes09-sl-007.Content: Even reconciliation attempts come with struggles.

mes09-sl-r-005.Content: The situation will keep getting better.

mes10-sl-001.Content: What will we find at the end of our journey?

mes10-sl-002.Content: I wonder if it'll include the answer I seek.

mes10-sl-r-003.Content: It is because we don't know that we must continue.

daily01-sl-004.Content: When I... was opening the package...

daily01-sl-007.Content: I... I am really afraid of bugs...

daily01-sl-009.Content: What if they got to my body through my fingers...

daily01-sl-r-007.Content: The sense of touch can be turned off, right?

daily01-sl-010.Content: No, I don't want that even so...!

daily01-sl-011.Content: Let's get some tools to get rid of them.

daily01-sl-r-008.Content: When talking about this, Shirli seems...

daily01-sl-013.Content: Ah... Hope I'll never talk about this again...

daily02-sl-001.Content: I haven't recovered all my memories, and they are still fuzzy in some parts.

daily02-sl-002.Content: And I feel that, maybe I can't recover all of them after all...

daily02-sl-003.Content: But the things you have done, and the sacrifice you have made.

daily02-sl-005.Content: Do you mean bringing you to Astra Shelter for treatment?

daily02-sl-r-004.Content: And this is what I should do, too.

daily02-sl-007.Content: I was about to say that, you don't have to be bounded by that...

daily02-sl-008.Content: But now I've accepted your help.

daily02-sl-009.Content: So I hope we can help each other.

daily02-sl-011.Content: Keep trying to be a more reliable ally.

daily03-sl-001.Content: I knew it... People would see me as a robot...

daily03-sl-002.Content: That happened... When we went to the living area together.

daily03-sl-003.Content: And the time we were in Hykros.

daily03-sl-004.Content: I would be concerned about others' gazes, worrying that I would be seen as a robot again...

daily03-sl-r-002.Content: I don't see any difference against humans.

daily03-sl-006.Content: I am very happy to hear that.

daily04-sl-001.Content: I once thought seriously about the nurse I hope to be.

daily04-sl-002.Content: But the plans seem to have been disturbed by now...

daily04-sl-r-001.Content: Isn't there anything left for you to do?

daily04-sl-006.Content: Something like, those not limited to career plans.

daily04-sl-007.Content: Trying one's best to help others, and things like that.

daily04-sl-009.Content: Seems that there is actually something.

daily04-sl-r-003.Content: See? There are so many to be achieved without being a nurse.

daily05-sl-001.Content: Mi-a would come to check me out whenever she had time.

daily05-sl-002.Content: "Are you feeling sick?" "Are you alright?" She asks those things every day.

daily05-sl-003.Content: After a battle, she would run over here immediately with her tiny feet, and check on me for wounds...

daily05-sl-004.Content: She is so tiny, but feels so much like my caregiver...

daily05-sl-007.Content: We shouldn't rely too much on her, I guess.

daily05-sl-008.Content: She is such a tiny little smart servant...

daily05-sl-r-006.Content: Perhaps Mi-a won't disagree with it.

daily05-sl-010.Content: Don't tell Mi-a about it, okay? She will get confused.

Mes005-flj-027.Content: I managed to stand back up in this world.

Mes005-flj-032.Content: none of those events would have happened.

Mes005-flj-033.Content: Everything the Sage has done has not been for his own benefit.

Mes005-flj-034.Content: It has been to prevent tragedies like mine from happening again.

Mes005-flj-036.Content: If so, our sins and the sins of Hykros

Mes005-flj-040.Content: It's pointless to say all this.

Mes006-flj-r-011.Content: Having the ability to retrace time allows you to hurt others at your whim.

Mes006-flj-r-012.Content: Having the ability to retrace time means you can do anything without consequences.

Mes006-flj-r-014.Content: You are just spinning your evil deeds into false justice.

Mes006-flj-r-015.Content: You have made it a poison that numbs your conscience.

Mes006-flj-r-021.Content: Whether what you're doing is correct or not,

Mes006-flj-r-024.Content: No matter how many times you keep trying.

Mes006-flj-022.Content: We'll settle this when you meet "me" on the battlefield.

Mes006-flj-024.Content: It'll show you who is right between the Heirs of Aida and Hykros.

Mes007-flj-001.Content: What do you think about "my" strength?

Mes007-flj-007.Content: And so the so-called top Executors of Hykros

Mes007-flj-009.Content: Hykros couldn't do anything to me.

Mes007-flj-013.Content: make me more interested in keeping you alive

Mes007-flj-015.Content: You should be glad that I'm interested in you.

Mes009-flj-010.Content: Everything was caused by an operator's mistake when executing the time retracement.

Mes009-flj-012.Content: The Omnium leakage caused by this led to a global ecological disaster.

Mes009-flj-013.Content: And the operator responsible for the Cataclysm.
