daily16-sfyy-01.Content: It's hard to be an Executor, right?

daily16-sfyy-02.Content: As far as I know, few get to choose their missions.

daily16-sfyy-03.Content: So, everyone is just always on call, waiting for orders and obeying whatever they've heard, isn't it?

daily16-sfyy-ra-01.Content: I still think those are my own choices.

daily16-sfyy-rb-01.Content: I think I decide what I do.

daily16-sfyy-05.Content: I don't think you've figured it all out, and you should really distinguish between things.

daily16-sfyy-06.Content: Are you really choosing your missions with your own rights, or...

daily16-sfyy-07.Content: Are you just pleasing everyone by taking anything you're given, and considering it as your free will?

daily16-sfyy-08.Content: How's that? Which one do you think you are?

daily16-sfyy-10.Content: Alright, you don't need to come up with an answer. I'm not that interested, actually.

daily16-sfyy-r-05.Content: Then why are you asking me?

daily16-sfyy-11.Content: Let's leave some room for "free explanation" for your character. No fixed impressions! Ha-ha-ha!

daily17-sfyy-01.Content: So, why don't Hykros ask some of the Hyenas for Simulacrum recording?

daily17-sfyy-03.Content: Compared to the Hykros Executors, the Hyenas surely can't match the standard... for some of the abilities.

daily17-sfyy-04.Content: Nothing more than combat skills, reaction, adaptability, teamwork, brain, and education...

daily17-sfyy-r-02.Content: Sounds like losers in basically everything...

daily17-sfyy-05.Content: Okay, that's basically everything... But they're outstanding in some aspects.

daily17-sfyy-06.Content: Everyone holds their special skills, which no one else could imitate!

daily17-sfyy-07.Content: Things like opening a bottle with one hand, playing music with tummy, and sleeping with eyes open!

daily17-sfyy-08.Content: How's that? If anyone interests you, or needs to be known to Hykros, I can introduce you!

daily18-sfyy-02.Content: It's said that "an apple once a day keeps the doctors away"! That's an investment for your health in the long run. Come and have one!

daily18-sfyy-03.Content: I'm eating apples every day! Speaking of which, I haven't got fed up with them.

daily18-sfyy-04.Content: It's just that we've stored too many, and they won't be fresh in a while.

daily18-sfyy-05.Content: If you refuse, I'll be giving them to others! Take them now, and I'll provide Tsubasa exclusive service of peeling them for you!

daily18-sfyy-r-02.Content: Okay, okay, I'll have some. Thank you.

daily18-sfyy-06.Content: Done. Another additional service? I might even slice it for you.

daily18-sfyy-08.Content: Then, I'll pack the apple slices and, swoosh, send them to you as fast as the arrow letter travels in the wind.

daily18-sfyy-09.Content: Please sit still, or I can't ensure your safety!

daily18-sfyy-r-04.Content: Stop the shoot! I'm getting them myself!

daily19-sfyy-02.Content: Boring, boring... these days have been so boring...

daily19-sfyy-r-01.Content: What should we do in boring times?

daily19-sfyy-03.Content: When it's too boring, and even the wind doesn't seem to change its direction in quite a while...

daily19-sfyy-04.Content: According to the ideas of my prototype, frozen dormancy is probably the solution.

daily19-sfyy-rb-02.Content: I might be able to understand.

daily19-sfyy-05.Content: Sure, the body made with flesh is mortal, and it would be such a waste to live without being able to make a difference.

daily19-sfyy-06.Content: Better go to sleep and skip that period!

daily19-sfyy-07.Content: And then, according to the situation, snap! I'm awake again!

daily19-sfyy-08.Content: Even if it's the same continent, the places will be different, and the people too.

daily19-sfyy-r-03.Content: But there might be riots ahead...

daily19-sfyy-09.Content: @player_name, have you learned how to predict the wind?

daily19-sfyy-10.Content: Tsk, tsk, the young are truly promising.

daily19-sfyy-11.Content: Let's see if you're right, I'm looking forward to it!

daily20-sfyy-06.Content: It's just that I usually talk a lot, so I wanted to see @player_name do the talking this time.

daily20-sfyy-07.Content: I apologize if I made you wait for a while.

daily20-sfyy-08.Content: Oh? Are you worried about me? You must care about your companions a lot.

daily20-sfyy-09.Content: I'm quite moved. I sincerely promise that this will never happen again!

daily20-sfyy-10.Content: I'll stop teasing you now. From now on, I'll be available whenever you need me again. Beep!

daily16-king-01.Content: @player_name, are you there? Lend me some money.

daily16-king-02.Content: I don't need much, and I'll repay you double.

daily16-king-r-03.Content: Alright, I'll transfer some to you later.

daily17-king-r-01.Content: So what're the funds used for?

daily17-king-02.Content: Someone I've met several times during my work at the arena set up this Betting Investment Fund.

daily17-king-03.Content: Basically, they manage the funds with more knowledge about the matches, and make profits by keeping and betting for others.

daily17-king-04.Content: They share a tiny part of the profits.

daily17-king-rb-02.Content: So business like this actually exists...

daily18-king-01.Content: Seems that he packed up and ran away on the same day.

daily18-king-03.Content: I'll definitely beat him till he spits out every coin he got from me when I see that face again.

daily18-king-04.Content: I will return the money you lend me, and I'll pay double.

daily18-king-05.Content: But I'll pay with my salary, so you have to wait.

daily18-king-06.Content: I'm not in the mood, so our conversation should stop here.

daily19-king-01.Content: Generally speaking, once someone from certain annoying people has left a deep impression on me...

daily19-king-02.Content: I'll tell myself to do exactly the opposite.

daily19-king-05.Content: Out of instinct, I become who I am now.

daily19-king-r-02.Content: That's what you look like originally, right?

daily19-king-08.Content: Let me put it this way. It's not because I got mad about something first and then decided to become who I am today.

daily19-king-09.Content: Instead, it's because of the kind of person I am that I get fired up about something... Is that so?

daily19-king-10.Content: I'm really fond of your thought.

daily19-king-11.Content: And, don't you think my ability to express myself has increased recently?

daily20-king-03.Content: Fundamentally, I'm afraid those might be the only things I have.

daily20-king-04.Content: If you have reached a certain level of genius, as long as you are willing to put in the effort... for the money or high achievements...

daily20-king-05.Content: It would all be feasible, but they simply don't care about any of that.

daily20-king-r-02.Content: I might have figured it out...

daily20-king-06.Content: I can't stop getting angry at the thought of it.

daily20-king-07.Content: Though the emotion comes from the original form, I still can't sever it from me.

daily16-gl-01.Content: So, what do you think of President Kolador?

daily16-gl-ra-01.Content: He could have enjoyed a warm family...

daily16-gl-02.Content: However, no one has the right to blame him, except those who are no longer here.

daily16-gl-03.Content: At least he holds a deep love for his child.

daily16-gl-04.Content: After leaving Crown, I was once amazed, when seeing family bonds like that.

daily16-gl-05.Content: You know, some parents never love their children.

daily16-gl-06.Content: That's somehow hard to imagine, both common sense and logic.

daily16-gl-07.Content: Before giving birth to me, my parents had no idea how I could be of service.

daily16-gl-08.Content: But they chose to have me, even under such difficult circumstances.

daily16-gl-10.Content: Alright, now it has nothing much to do with me.

daily16-gl-11.Content: We've been off-topic, so I'll stop there.

daily17-gl-01.Content: I'm really craving some fast food. Can we order some here?

daily17-gl-02.Content: I wonder if the shop at the Banges Port does takeout here.

daily17-gl-rb-01.Content: What about you give it a try?

daily17-gl-03.Content: The girl delivering fried chicken on a motorbike has a good taste for music.

daily17-gl-04.Content: She seemed like a quick driver, so I guess the delivery won't take long.

daily17-gl-r-03.Content: Um, there's nothing I can do about that.

daily17-gl-06.Content: Alright, guess we'll only get some when passing by the port next time.

daily17-gl-07.Content: I somehow got the strong feeling that I couldn't get the next inspiration until having some fast food from the port.

daily18-gl-01.Content: @player_name, lend me other weapons of yours for a while.

daily18-gl-03.Content: Hitting one thing with another... and other tests like that.

daily18-gl-r-03.Content: What if my other weapons get broken?

daily18-gl-04.Content: For the sake of technology advancement, prices have to be paid...

daily18-gl-05.Content: Just joking. I'll repair them before giving them back.

daily18-gl-06.Content: You're not questioning my repairing skills, are you?

daily19-gl-01.Content: I've been worrying that you might forget...

daily19-gl-02.Content: I'm not specialized in using violence. My job is to provide services that improve the efficiency of violence.

daily19-gl-03.Content: I hope you can put me in a position where I can bring you the most advantages.

daily19-gl-ra-01.Content: The difference between front line and logistics?

daily19-gl-rb-01.Content: The difference between mercenary and weaponeer?

daily19-gl-06.Content: I wanted to say that I'm not here for discussion.

daily19-gl-07.Content: Guess I'll just put it more directly.

daily19-gl-08.Content: "I've run out of materials, and I want more."

daily19-gl-09.Content: Umm, let me help you in those areas where I shine the most.

daily20-gl-01.Content: My prototype did say something like, "anything with machines is fine"...

daily20-gl-02.Content: But why did Banges Tech even invite me to island development projects?

daily20-gl-03.Content: I don't really wanna join. That's not interesting as research and development for weapons or vehicles.

daily20-gl-04.Content: I'm not an architect, after all, and there's definitely someone else for the development of merely system devices.

daily20-gl-ra-02.Content: Maybe they believe in you too much...

daily20-gl-05.Content: Even with multiple duplicates of me, work is never finished.

daily20-gl-06.Content: Because more duplicates means more ideas would pop out.

daily20-gl-07.Content: And every one of them would prioritize their own thoughts.

daily20-gl-08.Content: As for the original project, and the progress of it...

daily20-gl-09.Content: I don't think any of the duplicates would care.

daily15-ww-01.Content: I asked Hilda, if there was anything lacking in my show.

daily15-ww-02.Content: She said that, my tricks were clever and stunning enough... but she just felt that...

daily15-ww-03.Content: She felt that I, as a performer, needed more "vigor" on the stage.

daily15-ww-04.Content: So I've been scratching my head...

daily15-ww-05.Content: What on earth is "vigor"! How can I advance that!

daily15-ww-06.Content: What do you think? What should I do to improve my "vigor"?

daily15-ww-08.Content: That's nothing, I'm fine... Because... you're actually right!

daily15-ww-09.Content: But the figure for my Simulacrum is fixed already! That's a shame!

daily16-ww-01.Content: Well, as an Executor, I was assigned to the Secret Operation Group.

daily16-ww-02.Content: My tiny figure makes it easier to move in actions, so it was actually an advantage.

daily16-ww-03.Content: But now that I'm not among the Executors anymore, I would reconsider my height, which is far from competent...

daily16-ww-04.Content: Though I'm not ashamed about it, my height does contribute more to trouble than joy in my life.

daily16-ww-05.Content: At my first dagger performance in a shelter...

daily16-ww-06.Content: I was mistaken for an abandoned child making a living performing tricks on the street...

daily16-ww-07.Content: Come on, this is making you laugh louder than my usual jokes? That's basically calling me a loser!

daily16-ww-08.Content: Don't worry. You didn't actually think that I would be angry, right?

daily16-ww-09.Content: Well, I'd rather say that, it is indeed troublesome to me, but talking about it brings joy, which is actually satisfying!

daily16-ww-10.Content: Alright, let's register this in the joke database now!

daily17-ww-01.Content: Hmm... Maybe I should visit Hykros again when I have time.

daily17-ww-r-01.Content: Why does Hykros just come into your mind?

daily17-ww-02.Content: I've been missing my former partners, just a little bit. They're a cute bunch of people.

daily17-ww-03.Content: But if I just appear out of nowhere as a free person, that feels a bit weird.

daily17-ww-05.Content: Well, the main reason is that the atmosphere in Hykros is kinda serious.

daily17-ww-06.Content: Even if I want to enliven it a little bit with my tricks, I just can't do that, ha-ha.

daily18-ww-02.Content: When I was passing through Banges, I saw someone buying fried chicken in great joy.

daily18-ww-03.Content: That's one of my former partners!

daily18-ww-04.Content: Seems that he has also left Hykros to be a free man, that's unexpected.

daily18-ww-06.Content: I'm just convinced that no one must carry on till the end.

daily18-ww-07.Content: When I left my job, a girl in Hykros tried to persuade me otherwise.

daily18-ww-08.Content: She reasoned that I had already accumulated so many benefits at work. If I left, that would all be wasted.

daily18-ww-09.Content: However, my idea is that if you are deeply entangled in the calculations of "loss and benefit" and dare not make any rash decisions, you would be exhausted!

daily18-ww-10.Content: Some people may think that when they have already started something, all the invested time and effort would be wasted if they don't do it till the end.

daily18-ww-11.Content: I respect it if someone is determined to persevere even if they feel pain doing that.

daily18-ww-12.Content: But, if you make a rational retreat, take a break, re-examine your self-position, and discover more new things...

daily18-ww-13.Content: That's not a cop-out, is it? At least that's what I think.

daily18-ww-14.Content: Yeah, I'm happier every day now than I was before!

daily18-ww-15.Content: Well, I also think that's the best for me!

daily19-ww-01.Content: Listen, if I become the shiniest star here in Aesperia...

daily19-ww-02.Content: I'll reserve a premium seat for you in my show!!

daily19-ww-r-04.Content: Crowy, did you have some alcohol by mistake?

daily19-ww-r-05.Content: I'm coming for you now, stay there!

daily16-pp-02.Content: Did you just stress yourself out again?

daily16-pp-03.Content: I'll be inspecting you right away.

daily17-pp-01.Content: Which one do you like, strawberry or blueberry?

daily17-pp-02.Content: What's your choice between dark chocolate and white chocolate?

daily17-pp-05.Content: I'm shopping for some baking materials.

daily17-pp-06.Content: I'll be making some cupcakes with Cocoritter. Please look forward to that.

daily18-pp-04.Content: I took a nap at noon, and it just disappeared when I woke up.

daily18-pp-05.Content: Well... I work on that for a part-time job in medical technology research.

daily18-pp-06.Content: I won't be able to work if I can't find it, so that's tricky...

daily18-pp-07.Content: I didn't learn much about medicine, and I'm not really smart...

daily18-pp-08.Content: So rather than helping out, I'd say I'm just working on some routine documents.

daily18-pp-09.Content: Filtering data, configuring spreadsheets, organizing records, and things like that...

daily18-pp-10.Content: That's not some important work, but I would be upset if I couldn't help the researchers even on that...

daily18-pp-r-04.Content: But it's lost, and we can't do anything, right?

daily18-pp-12.Content: There are permissions granted to that tablet, so I can't just replace it with a random computer.

daily18-pp-13.Content: If I apply for the permissions again, the approval process might take ages...

daily18-pp-r-05.Content: Why not take a rest for a while?

daily18-pp-r-06.Content: That's not your contracted job, and no one will blame you.

daily18-pp-r-07.Content: Besides, relaxing is part of the preparation for better work.

daily18-pp-17.Content: I will... tell them about it.

daily18-pp-18.Content: Just consider it as a break for myself...

daily19-pp-r-02.Content: It's okay, all is forgiven, and sleep as you wish.

daily19-pp-04.Content: Restoring energy is nice, but overdoing it is not! Our following plans will get ruined, isn't it?

daily19-pp-05.Content: I should have reminded you, but I was too busy and just forgot... How could that happen...

daily19-pp-06.Content: I only came to urge you to wake up after confirming that your sleep time is way more than sufficient.

daily20-pp-01.Content: You may encounter a girl who resembles Cocoritter and is about the same age as her on your journey.

daily20-pp-02.Content: If you do, I hope you can tell me.

daily20-pp-03.Content: She should be her twin older sister, Ms. Cocolia.

daily20-pp-04.Content: Although I've never met her before, I've heard that her personality is quite different from Ms. Cocoritter's.

daily20-pp-05.Content: She left on an adventure with a weapon on her back when she was little and hadn't returned home in a long time. There hasn't been any news about her either.

daily20-pp-06.Content: Ms. Cocoritter looks like she isn't worried about her at all, but I've always been wondering...

daily20-pp-07.Content: Why wouldn't she go home? She has such a beautiful home.

daily20-pp-08.Content: She has the time, so why won't she spend more time with her family...?

daily20-pp-09.Content: I just want to pass her a message. Tell her that her teachers miss her once in a while and that she can come back to visit.

daily20-pp-ra-03.Content: I'll tell you if I see her.

daily20-pp-rb-03.Content: I'll convey your message to her if I see her.

daily15-bl-01.Content: So the bookkeeping we've talked about... have you started yet?

daily15-bl-rb-02.Content: I failed to develop the habit...

daily15-bl-03.Content: Don't worry, I understand. It is the first step that is troublesome.

daily15-bl-04.Content: I've got an idea. I'll produce a template for you.

daily15-bl-05.Content: With the help of a well-structured and clear template, regular bookkeeping might be easier for you.

daily16-bl-01.Content: With my accounting experiences, I tried producing a template of account books suitable for you.

daily16-bl-03.Content: Also, please show me the records after a week.

daily16-bl-04.Content: All good habits start with some suffering.

daily16-bl-05.Content: So I be your supervisor for now.

daily16-bl-06.Content: When you're self-disciplined enough, I'll quit the weekly inspection.

daily16-bl-07.Content: W-What's with the title? That's quite embarrassing...

daily17-bl-01.Content: If you find bookkeeping really hard, what about trying some rewarding system?

daily17-bl-02.Content: Something like, if you keep recording the expenses for a whole month...

daily17-bl-03.Content: Or, if you successfully limit monthly spending to the ideal range.

daily17-bl-04.Content: You'll be rewarded with a cute sticker from me, which could be used to decorate the accounting book.

daily17-bl-05.Content: Seeing a cute accounting book would make you feel better, I guess.

daily17-bl-r-02.Content: Does Bai Ling use the same rewarding system?

daily17-bl-06.Content: That's not the case for me, though.

daily17-bl-07.Content: Because, purchasing the stickers means another expense...

daily17-bl-08.Content: However, if these tiny rewards could motivate you in bookkeeping...

daily17-bl-09.Content: Then it is well spent, very well spent.

daily18-bl-02.Content: Stickers in various geometry shapes. What do you think?

daily18-bl-04.Content: Ah, I should have asked about it. That's oversight of me.

daily18-bl-05.Content: The expense wasted on the wrong supplies is on me.

daily18-bl-06.Content: I won't forget about beforehand research again. That's a lesson learned!

daily18-bl-rb-03.Content: Well, it's not that I don't like them...

daily18-bl-07.Content: So, please allow the repeated question. What stickers do you like?

daily18-bl-rb-04.Content: Something with beautiful shiny effects or colors?

daily18-bl-08.Content: I see! Please wait for a sec!

daily19-bl-03.Content: Please note that what's important is not the bookkeeping itself.

daily19-bl-04.Content: Rather, it's about keeping track of, reflecting on, and quickly grasping the information of how you spend your money.

daily19-bl-05.Content: Thus being more reasonable and effective in property distribution.

daily19-bl-06.Content: And a shrewd, powerful decision-maker who does nothing in vain.

daily19-bl-07.Content: I will keep helping as your accounting assistant.

daily16-nmxs-02.Content: If the Spacerift works by decomposing and reassembling... Is the person still themselves after stepping into a Spacerift, or something like that?

daily16-nmxs-05.Content: Maybe I was too carefree back then. I didn't feel anything special about Spacerift...

daily16-nmxs-06.Content: And now I'm always wondering, "am I still myself" and things like that. I have changed much indeed...

daily16-nmxs-r-02.Content: There might not be a perfect answer for this.

daily16-nmxs-09.Content: The worries will pass, and we must carry on our responsibilities.

daily17-nmxs-01.Content: I can still remember the cupcake I love...

daily17-nmxs-02.Content: And, the flavor of orange soda.

daily17-nmxs-03.Content: Will I forget all of these in the later future?

daily17-nmxs-05.Content: Sure we lose something, but we keep meeting unforgettable things.

daily17-nmxs-06.Content: Guess that's how ideas get refreshed...

daily18-nmxs-01.Content: I wonder if Uncle Palu has been holding back on his drinks...

daily18-nmxs-02.Content: Now that both Mi-a and I have left the Astra Shelter, I don't know if anyone is caring for him.

daily18-nmxs-03.Content: Hmm... As you said that, I'm not that worried.

daily18-nmxs-04.Content: Getting drunk... is actually really bad for health.

daily18-nmxs-05.Content: Does that free someone of the suffering somehow? I don't know...

daily18-nmxs-ra-02.Content: I believe he'll take care of himself.

daily19-nmxs-01.Content: If I could be a human again...

daily19-nmxs-02.Content: Ah, of course I know there's no going back. I'm just saying if...

daily19-nmxs-03.Content: I will think about this if.

daily19-nmxs-04.Content: I will think about the feelings taken for granted and never cherished...

daily19-nmxs-05.Content: If I could be human again, I would like to feel those sensations with my own skin.

daily19-nmxs-06.Content: Cozy wind, cool water, warm sunshine, fluffy puppies, and kittens...

daily19-nmxs-08.Content: Even if it may only happen in my dreams if I could turn back into a human for just a short while...

daily19-nmxs-09.Content: Although there are so many things I would like to do, even if only for a little while...

daily20-nmxs-01.Content: In the end, I didn't dream of the thing I was hoping for.

daily20-nmxs-02.Content: Is it because I've already compromised subconsciously?

daily20-nmxs-05.Content: It doesn't matter even if I can't regain my original appearance no matter what I do...

daily20-nmxs-06.Content: It doesn't matter even if I can't get to the bottom of my questions...

daily20-nmxs-07.Content: There are many things that I can do because of who I am now.

daily20-nmxs-08.Content: I won't let my excessive confusion become a burden on our travels.

daily20-nmxs-09.Content: I can't keep walking around in circles. Let's do what we can do right now.

daily06-samir-001.Content: Um, I have... seen Huma recently.

daily06-samir-002.Content: Ha, that's amazing. A delicate sensation started growing in me once I saw her.

daily06-samir-003.Content: Yes, I guess you would understand.

daily06-samir-004.Content: However, please believe me. I have already let go of that.

daily06-samir-005.Content: As your friend, how should Simulacrum Samir get along with Simulacrum Huma...

daily06-samir-006.Content: As for that question, I have already found my answer.

daily06-samir-007.Content: It's magical. Supposing she "lost all the memories," somehow, she still behaves subconsciously in a way that I was very used to.

daily06-samir-008.Content: So that's how sisters, friends, and family get along? Sure, fate might deprive her of many, but her fundamental self will never change.

daily06-samir-009.Content: She might never recall the past things, but if she accepts everything after knowing the whole story, maybe... we would become the one that we used to know.

daily06-samir-010.Content: I'm not sure. Precisely, I didn't plan to do that.

daily06-samir-011.Content: But my prototype would probably do that... I guess?

daily06-samir-012.Content: Allow me to keep it like this for now. She seems to be getting familiar with herself, too.

daily06-samir-013.Content: For example, her talents... Did she notice that?

daily06-playersamir-003.Content: Seems that something has happened between you.

daily06-playersamir-004.Content: Can it be you're talented at playing tricks?

daily07-samir-01.Content: The guy with a one-handed sword...

daily07-playersamir-001.Content: Do you mean Claudia or me?

daily07-samir-02.Content: Oh, so the name is Claudia.

daily07-samir-03.Content: Well, what can I say? Without clear orders, she still goes on regular patrol in Hykros.

daily07-samir-04.Content: Besides carrying out all the orders with loyalty, she shoulders more than she needs to.

daily07-samir-05.Content: That is noble and respectable, I have to admit. But according to my further observation...

daily07-samir-06.Content: I don't agree that all the orders should be strictly carried out once they're given.

daily07-samir-07.Content: We need someone who takes other ways, so that other perspectives are provided, and other solutions are enabled.

daily07-samir-08.Content: Well, that does sound, more or less, like... an excuse for my rebellion.

daily07-samir-09.Content: I hate being limited by boundaries and rules, after all.

daily07-samir-10.Content: In a word, if I obey someone's instructions willingly...

daily07-samir-11.Content: Then the person, without doubt, is interesting enough for me or worthy of the effort. That's the only occasion where I'll take action.

daily07-samir-12.Content: Ha, seems that you're indeed impressed.

daily07-samir-13.Content: Well, in the same way, I should know more about you.

daily08-samir-01.Content: That girl named Shirli... No, Nemesis should be more appropriate.

daily08-samir-02.Content: Okay, guess she chose that for herself.

daily08-samir-03.Content: Seems to be a close friend of yours... from Heirs of Aida.

daily08-samir-04.Content: In other words, another person who was forced to travel a path completely different from what they used to.

daily08-samir-05.Content: Someone who summoned up outstanding courage to face, fight, and struggle against the mocking fate...

daily08-samir-07.Content: So, take good care of her.

daily08-samir-08.Content: Ah, maybe you should tell her those words in person.

daily08-samir-09.Content: No, better prove with your actions.

daily09-samir-01.Content: I'm so bored... Let's do something big and surprising.

daily09-playersamir-001.Content: What are you trying to do?

daily09-samir-02.Content: For example, breaking into the territory of Heirs of Aida, having a good fight with Angels of Clemency, and getting some stretches.

daily09-samir-03.Content: I heard about someone good with firearms there... What about fighting her with Dual EM Stars, so that we can see which is better?

daily09-samir-04.Content: The mere thought of it leads to more details of the fighting.

daily09-samir-05.Content: By the way, there seem to be a few extremely rebellious ones among the Angels of Clemency... Anyway, I'm really curious about their identities.

daily09-samir-06.Content: Weapons don't pick their sides, but they're also my enemies because of you.

daily09-samir-07.Content: Let's challenge them one by one... In other words, if we really can defeat them without breaking a sweat...

daily09-samir-08.Content: Guess that would prove the insignificance of these Cyberized guys.

daily09-samir-10.Content: I'm not so arrogant as to underestimate the enemies.

daily10-samir-01.Content: How should I put this... Looking at the Hyenas everywhere...

daily10-samir-03.Content: Someone must have thought that... Life is just so tough, why not join the Hyenas?

daily10-samir-04.Content: Look at them, what a comfortable life they're leading!

daily10-samir-05.Content: They would even dance in groups when free and fumble some jerky when hungry.

daily10-samir-06.Content: Hmph, if anyone chooses to reduce themself to that... then such life might actually seem nice.

daily10-samir-07.Content: Robbing the weak of their suppressors, and taking the hard-earned food from the shelters.

daily10-samir-08.Content: They never let go of anything, even the resources and medication urgently needed by the wounded.

daily10-samir-09.Content: Everything they own, no, everything they robbed is based on those sufferings.

daily10-samir-10.Content: But yes, when the supply for tomorrow can't be ensured, abandoning every sense of morality to do something like that... is just part of human nature.

daily10-samir-11.Content: As a result, the Hyenas, the organization that always recovers despite any attacks.

daily10-samir-12.Content: The existence and the everlasting vitality of the organization demonstrate its effectiveness as a way of living in the time of doom.

daily10-samir-13.Content: And that's exactly the reason why the sight of their singing and dancing always provokes anger in me somehow.

daily10-samir-14.Content: So it might be a mixture of refusing to accept... while not being able to deny.

daily06-huma-001.Content: I think Ms. Samir might not be as unfriendly as everyone said.

daily06-huma-002.Content: Some time ago, she invited me to a self-made puzzle game.

daily06-huma-003.Content: That was so amazing to me... I mean designing puzzles by oneself, turning the logical maze in her mind into a reality with words, accompanied by gadgets, and presenting it to others.

daily06-playerhuma-002.Content: That wasn't too much of a problem, right?

daily06-huma-006.Content: But I was new to it, right? So it's probably a normal puzzle, and I might be the only one finding it difficult...

daily06-huma-007.Content: Phew, I finally solved it by using every ounce of my brain.

daily06-huma-008.Content: And I was kinda stressed out when I turned to Ms. Samir for the right answer.

daily06-huma-009.Content: However, I unexpectedly got outright compliments, and she behaved like she saw it coming.

daily06-huma-010.Content: The result was actually very much unexpected...

daily06-playerhuma-005.Content: Getting compliments from Samir isn't easy, right?

daily06-huma-012.Content: It's indeed embarrassing to say this.

daily06-huma-013.Content: But I've been thinking that... maybe I am actually talented?

daily06-huma-014.Content: ... Th-that was a joke. Please forget about it.

daily07-huma-001.Content: A Wastewalker... Mapping the land we live in with our own steps, is indeed an adventure filled with uncertainty.

daily07-huma-002.Content: That is always in my mind when I see Echo.

daily07-huma-003.Content: If I were healthy as Echo, I might not join Hykros, and would probably be a Wastewalker as she does.

daily07-huma-004.Content: Don't get it wrong, of course I love Hykros. It's just that Wastewalkers enjoy more freedom.

daily07-huma-005.Content: She must have seen various scenery during her travels all over the place.

daily07-huma-006.Content: So in terms of experience and socializing skills, she must be so much better than me.

daily07-playerhuma-001.Content: It's not too late to catch up.

daily08-huma-001.Content: Um, I've noticed that you're still working on missions late at night.

daily08-huma-002.Content: Is there... so much work for you?

daily08-huma-005.Content: As I remember, my prototype always keeps a healthy schedule.

daily08-huma-006.Content: Also, the doctors in Hykros have been emphasizing that.

daily08-huma-007.Content: So, if possible, would you please sleep as early as you can?

daily08-huma-008.Content: Sure, I will guard your night.

daily08-huma-009.Content: After the sunrise, let's set off again, with refreshed spirits.

daily09-huma-001.Content: Well... After all the travels with you, it seems clearer to me.

daily09-huma-002.Content: I did actual observations on the scenery and items in books...

daily09-huma-003.Content: And there will always be some differences, just as expected.

daily09-huma-004.Content: There might be errors in the records.

daily09-huma-005.Content: Or the objects themselves might have changed with time.

daily09-huma-006.Content: So I'm hoping to do some supplementation and correction.

daily09-huma-007.Content: If needed, it should be able to serve as a guiding reference.

daily09-huma-008.Content: It would be great if it could help you in some ways.

daily10-huma-001.Content: I might have heard about some... comments about me.

daily10-huma-002.Content: Well, I don't know how to put it.

daily10-huma-003.Content: Saying something like... I look very serious and hard to be friends with...

daily10-huma-004.Content: And that I sit like... the head of an underground gang... and things like that.

daily10-playerhuma-002.Content: Could it be that you act like a leader?

daily10-huma-005-002.Content: Ah, you get the same feeling, too?

daily10-huma-006-003.Content: Compliments from you would... get me totally overwhelmed...

daily10-huma-007.Content: I didn't notice anything like that.

daily10-huma-008.Content: I mean, I just sit like that before even noticing it.

daily10-huma-009.Content: Could it be that, I got that habit even before losing my memories?

daily10-huma-010.Content: So, do you think I need to change the way I sit...?

daily10-playerhuma-005.Content: Being who you are now is good enough.

daily10-huma-011.Content: Hmm, yes. You have a point there.

daily06-coco-001.Content: Actually, I've thought it would be nice if no medical workers were ever needed.

daily06-coco-002.Content: That means... nobody will ever suffer from wounds or illness.

daily06-coco-003.Content: So, even losing my job would be fine for me!

daily06-playercoco-001.Content: So what will Cocoritter be doing, then?

daily06-coco-004.Content: Let me think. Hmm... What about opening a dessert store?

daily06-coco-005.Content: In summer, we'll sell shaved ice to repel the heat!

daily06-coco-006.Content: As for winter, doesn't a bowl of red bean rice balls sound nice?

daily06-coco-007.Content: Ah, if only that could come true.

daily06-coco-008.Content: Alright! For that goal! I'll work harder in medical learning!

daily06-coco-009.Content: Thinking that, it's for the sake of you and everyone else, I'll certainly do my best!

daily07-coco-001.Content: Random inspection! Did you behave and sleep well last night!?

daily07-coco-003-002.Content: H-Huh? That's bad! Not having a good rest is bad for you!

daily07-coco-004.Content: Um, because I just thought of Pepper.

daily07-coco-005.Content: I wonder if she's been taking care of herself and sleeping well.

daily07-coco-006.Content: After all, there was a time when she had been exhausted for too long and went collapsing in the Lab.

daily07-coco-007.Content: So, you should keep a healthy schedule.

daily07-coco-008.Content: Or you might wear yourself out, and that's big trouble.

daily07-coco-009.Content: No matter what happened yesterday, please sleep early from now on.

daily07-coco-010.Content: Develop healthy habits from now! I'll be your supervisor!

daily08-coco-001.Content: If you have time, what about some handcrafting together? Can you make origami cranes?

daily08-coco-002-001.Content: Oh! Wanna give it a try then? I find it very interesting!

daily08-coco-003-002.Content: If you're interested, I can be your tutor!

daily08-coco-004.Content: It helps while away the idle time.

daily08-coco-005.Content: Also, origami cranes can make beautiful decorations!

daily08-coco-006.Content: Well, legend has that "making a thousand origami cranes grants you a wish."

daily08-coco-007.Content: Um... Will you... still believe that?

daily08-playercoco-004.Content: No, I'm not a kid anymore.

daily08-coco-008-003.Content: Oh... Really? If that's the case, I'll make them with the expectation in mind.

daily08-coco-009-004.Content: Well, you're right. But I'm still holding a tiny little bit of hope that something good will happen.

daily08-coco-010.Content: Speaking of which, traveling with you is already a good thing that happens to me every day, isn't it?

daily09-coco-001.Content: Oh! I saw Pepper! I didn't even imagine being able to work with her again!

daily09-coco-002.Content: Hmm! I'm feeling even more vigorous!

daily09-coco-003.Content: Well, I wonder if she still can't take good care of herself.

daily09-coco-004.Content: Does she think that, the Simulacrum self could work forever...

daily09-coco-005.Content: And even being worn out can be solved by "a little bit restart"?

daily09-coco-006.Content: Hmm, I just got a strong feeling about this! She might actually do that!

daily09-coco-007.Content: @player_name, please don't let her overwork herself!

daily09-coco-008.Content: Ugh, I've been talking about rest so much lately...

daily09-coco-009.Content: Do you think I'm nagging, or even awfully sensitive...?

daily09-coco-010.Content: But when I think about all the latest news covering Wanderers worn out by hard work...

daily09-coco-011.Content: I just can't help getting nervous!

daily09-coco-012.Content: Everyone should get enough rest... and you must stay healthy.

daily10-coco-001.Content: I just can't stop worrying about the ruins near the Tower of Fantasy.

daily10-coco-002.Content: It's said that... specters are hanging around there!

daily10-coco-003.Content: Yes, Tsubasa was really serious when telling me that!

daily10-coco-004.Content: She said that, in the abandoned areas with unstable signals, she heard vague sounds of someone singing...

daily10-coco-005.Content: When she followed the sound near its origin, it just stopped all of a sudden.

daily10-coco-006.Content: And then! Suddenly! A white figure flashed by!

daily10-coco-007.Content: After that, the song started vaguely again, coming from somewhere far, far away...

daily10-coco-008.Content: Ahhh, I can't retell that anymore!

daily10-playercoco-003.Content: If that comes from Tsubasa... could it possibly be a prank?

daily10-playercoco-004.Content: Isn't that just a horror story? Sounds kinda fake to me.

daily10-playercoco-005.Content: If you are really worried, what about we check it out together?

daily10-coco-011.Content: Ah... Hmm... Guess I'll be... good...

daily10-coco-012.Content: I've just changed my mind! Maybe I'm not that worried!

daily05-kldy-001.Content: Is everyone into desserts these days?

daily05-kldy-002.Content: I've seen crowds around the beehive.

daily05-kldy-004.Content: So I thought desserts or candies might be trendy now.

daily05-kldy-006.Content: But why does everyone squat there? Don't they get numb legs?

daily05-playerkldy-004.Content: Maybe that's some... unique skills for the honey collection.

daily05-kldy-008.Content: If you need anything sweet, just tell me.

daily05-kldy-009.Content: I have prepared some snow lotus soup and sweets.

daily05-kldy-010.Content: But do hold back on it, or you'll get cavities!

daily06-kldy-001.Content: Does Meryl... like roses in white?

daily06-kldy-002.Content: Last time I saw her, she seemed to be staring at them in the magazine.

daily06-kldy-003.Content: Better give her a bouquet when I meet her again.

daily06-kldy-004.Content: Well, speaking of a gift, I should pick the materials myself, right?

daily06-kldy-005.Content: If you are interested, we should go to floral design classes together.

daily06-kldy-007.Content: We might get some surprisingly nice ideas.

daily07-kldy-001.Content: Nice, we completed all daily missions for another day.

daily07-kldy-002.Content: That's really some nice teamwork between us.

daily07-kldy-003.Content: I can't thank you enough, as you are exactly the reason that I achieved my goal.

daily07-playerkldy-003.Content: Claudia's goal, if my memory is right...

daily07-kldy-004.Content: Keep sticking to my own justice, and traveling the path I decide to take...

daily07-kldy-005.Content: This is the will firmly held by me and "me."

daily07-kldy-006.Content: It was because of you that I could keep moving forward without hesitations.

daily07-kldy-007.Content: In the future, I hope to fight by your side.

daily07-kldy-008.Content: I can't thank you enough, as you are exactly the reason that I achieved my goal.

daily07-kldy-009.Content: Keep sticking to my own justice, and traveling the path I decide to take...

daily08-kldy-001.Content: Ugh, I met... a somewhat troublesome kid today.

daily08-kldy-002.Content: A kid was coming at me swinging a Maul and yelling something like, "We should fight."

daily08-kldy-003.Content: I have no idea what I should do!

daily08-kldy-004.Content: Look at her tiny body... It feels like I'm bullying her.

daily08-playerkldy-003.Content: So that's Ene, why not fight her properly?

daily08-playerkldy-004.Content: If that's Ene, it should be fine.

daily08-kldy-005.Content: As you said so, it should be fine, right?

daily08-kldy-006.Content: Okay, I'll take it seriously and fight her next time!

daily08-kldy-007.Content: Who do you think would win? Make your guess now?

daily08-kldy-008-005.Content: Hahaha, I'm happy to hear your approval.

daily08-kldy-009-006.Content: Oh? Guess I'll have to prepare even better for it.

daily08-kldy-010-006.Content: Picking a tough fight is indeed a precious opportunity.

daily09-kldy-001.Content: If you have time, what about taking a walk outside?

daily09-playerkldy-002.Content: I'm thinking about a walk, too.

daily09-kldy-002.Content: Haha, if possible, I'd like a travel to the Crown Mines.

daily09-kldy-003.Content: It is said that there are corners in the Mines where the sunshine can't reach.

daily09-kldy-004.Content: Bullying the weak, and depriving their chances for living... Things like that keep happening.

daily09-kldy-005.Content: If possible, I want to check it out with my own eyes, and see the corners where crime is neglected.

daily09-kldy-006.Content: I would never tolerate anything like that in my sight.

daily09-kldy-007.Content: If I should see any, I'll lend a helping hand to the weak, and teach the bullies a lesson.

daily09-playerkldy-004.Content: Your thoughts might be too idealistic.

daily09-playerkldy-005.Content: But the peace brought might be temporary.

daily09-kldy-009.Content: Sure, I know it's by no means enough, and I might never actually make a change to the situation there.

daily09-kldy-010.Content: But I still want to do that.

daily09-kldy-011.Content: Even though justice like that is tiny as a seed, I still believe in it.

daily09-kldy-012.Content: As long as it's planted, a tenacious sprout will finally spread itself, and take its root in the soil.

daily09-kldy-013.Content: So, someone must be doing this. You'll be my support, right?

daily06-hilda-001.Content: Hah! I've heard about it! There's another Orienteering match!

daily06-playerhilda-001.Content: Hilda seems to be really active.

daily06-hilda-003.Content: I, Hilda, am the famous drifting artist in Banges.

daily06-hilda-004.Content: You can find me wherever there is a match takes place!

daily06-hilda-005.Content: I haven't been doing a race by using all the skills under my belt for a millennium year! I can't wait!

daily06-playerhilda-003.Content: But I'm kinda terrible at these matches...

daily06-hilda-009.Content: Alright! You have been blessed by THE drifting artist in Banges.

daily06-hilda-010.Content: Now, you will definitely win all the matches without breaking a sweat! Go go go!

daily07-hilda-001.Content: I've been thinking... Why did we just catch fish with our hands instead of using a fishing rod?

daily07-hilda-002.Content: Maybe everyone is more used to catching fish without any tools?

daily07-hilda-003.Content: Or do the same thing as Echo, hold a long spear and just poke!

daily07-hilda-005.Content: Anyway, it's still a shame that we don't have a fishing rod.

daily07-hilda-006.Content: I have long wanted to carry a tiny bench to the seaside, and sit there fishing for a whole day.

daily07-hilda-007.Content: But I might not be getting many fishes and just sitting there the whole day gazing at the sea.

daily07-hilda-008.Content: Well, that sounds suitable for me, right? As I'll be chilling out the whole day for a fair reason.

daily08-hilda-001.Content: Wow, I had a wonderful dream, and I was eating as much fried chicken as I wanted in it!

daily08-hilda-002.Content: I'm soooo happy, and I'm passing the happiness to you!

daily08-playerhilda-001.Content: Why does Hilda like fried chicken so much?

daily08-hilda-003.Content: Eh? I haven't actually thought about that.

daily08-hilda-004.Content: It's probably because, since childhood, my prototype has been totally convinced that fried chicken is the most delicious thing in the world!

daily08-hilda-005.Content: As for the exact reason... Let me think.

daily08-hilda-006.Content: It's probably because Granny Eileen made it for me when we first met, when I was really hungry.

daily08-hilda-007.Content: Hehe, as you know, I was abandoned at the Banges Port. When Granny brought me home, I had been hungry for quite some time.

daily08-hilda-008.Content: We had fried chicken legs on the first meal together! I remember that soooo very well!

daily08-hilda-009.Content: Hehe... There was actually other delicious food on the table, but fried chicken impressed me the most.

daily08-hilda-010.Content: And then... It has become my favorite!

daily08-hilda-011.Content: So! Fried chicken today? Happiness should always be shared!

daily09-hilda-001.Content: Shelter resources, camping necessities... and this, utility tool kit!

daily09-hilda-002.Content: Alright! Everything is set! Preparation complete!

daily09-hilda-003.Content: Birthday presents for Bai Ling, Echo, and Cobalt-B! I'm getting those in advance.

daily09-hilda-004.Content: I'll be counting on you to send the presents!

daily09-hilda-005.Content: They will definitely get the thoughtfulness!

daily09-hilda-007.Content: Everyone here in Banges is my good friend! All the memories shared with them, are always cherished in my mind.

daily09-hilda-008.Content: For something so important as a birthday, preparations must be done beforehand!

daily09-hilda-009.Content: I've got it ready long ago! But...

daily09-hilda-010.Content: No one would tell you about a birthday surprise!

daily09-hilda-011.Content: Please rest assured! And hold your expectations!

daily09-hilda-012.Content: I'm looking forward to that day, too! Heehee...

daily10-hilda-001.Content: Um, I've been thinking... Will you leave here someday?

daily10-hilda-002.Content: Like, continuing your adventure in another continent, and not coming back for a long time.

daily10-hilda-003.Content: You know, just adventuring and traveling somewhere else all the time.

daily10-hilda-004-003.Content: Ha-ha! That's because, you might continue your adventures anywhere!

daily10-hilda-005-004.Content: Oh, really? But I was saying that, it's okay even if what I said comes true.

daily10-hilda-006.Content: But if you have the chance, you'll come to visit sometime, right?

daily10-hilda-007.Content: When you're traveling somewhere else, we will surely miss you.

daily10-hilda-008.Content: Yes! So, when that time comes, remember to come back for a visit!

daily15-ag-004.Content: It's a continent with sand everywhere.

daily15-ag-005.Content: Though I have traveled every corner of Aesperia, nothing alike had I ever seen.

daily15-ag-006.Content: Unknown continent, unknown species, unknown people, and unknown stories.

daily16-ag-002.Content: Can we still have roast fish there...?

daily16-ag-004.Content: I guess simple, delicious roast fish won't be available...

daily16-ag-r-003.Content: Whether there is roast fish or not, I might find other tasty things!

daily16-mle-003.Content: That should be a special scene.

daily16-mle-005.Content: ... something different from the Warren Snowfield.

daily16-mle-r-002.Content: You are really a snow lover, Meryl.

daily16-mle-r-003.Content: If located in the cold area, it might snow.

daily16-mle-r-004.Content: But not really in the tropics.

daily15-zero-r-002.Content: Um, you might have got it wrong.

daily15-zero-r-003.Content: I don't think that's what he meant...

daily15-zero-007.Content: I hacked into the communication channel, and found people talking about this guy looking for Zero.

daily15-zero-r-004.Content: Stop hacking into communication channels carelessly...

daily15-zero-r-005.Content: If he's really looking for you, I'll tell you about it.

daily05-xi-002.Content: When I was just passing by, someone wanted to touch my kitty ears again today.

daily05-xi-003.Content: Well, I'm not just saying no to everyone...

daily05-xi-004.Content: But if all these people just come surrounding me...

daily05-xi-005.Content: I would be troubled, you know, I'm not a child anymore...

daily05-xi-r-005.Content: I'll talk them out of it next time.

daily05-xi-r-006.Content: (I might have seen the potential of a business)

daily05-xi-r-007.Content: So it's true that everyone likes Ene a lot.

daily05-xi-r-008.Content: Yes, everyone wants to get close to Ene.

daily05-xi-007.Content: Well... You can't just touch them whenever, either...

daily06-xi-001.Content: I haven't been out for so long.

daily06-xi-003.Content: Let me out please, I want to fight!

daily06-xi-005.Content: What enemies will we bump into?

daily06-xi-006.Content: I look so much forward to that!

daily07-xi-001.Content: Nemesis is also a droid, right?

daily07-xi-002.Content: I get the feeling that she is special.

daily07-xi-003.Content: I want to know more about her.

daily07-xi-r-004.Content: She would be happy about it.

daily07-xi-r-005.Content: I mean it, she really is a nice girl.

daily07-xi-005.Content: Okay, I will give it a try!

daily16-xl-001.Content: The weather's nice today, wanna go out with me

daily16-xl-003.Content: Huh! Why did I just send it again?

daily16-xl-008.Content: I was asking if you want a trip to the seaside with me.

daily16-xl-rb-004.Content: I've got things to deal with.

daily16-xl-r-005.Content: I'll see you there once I'm done.

daily16-xl-017.Content: Tee-hee... Then, I'll see you there!

daily17-xl-003.Content: Device set, parameters test complete, no error detected in operation.

daily17-xl-r-001.Content: Every time in these situations, Shiro just becomes so reliable.

daily17-xl-006.Content: Well, seems that we've got trouble now.

daily17-xl-007.Content: The detector indicates a group of Hyenas is coming near.

daily17-xl-008.Content: I'll need to grab the Chakram of the Seas. There's no way they're interfering with my research.

daily17-xl-013.Content: Seems that the alarm is canceled, and there's no need for you to come...

daily18-xl-008.Content: You, you! You didn't see anything!

daily18-xl-013-daily18-xl-011.Content: Try harder if you haven't forgotten!!!

daily18-xl-018.Content: You're not kidding me, are you?

daily19-xl-004.Content: In my memory, that was an area covered in green.

daily19-xl-005.Content: I wonder what happened to it.

daily19-xl-r-002.Content: I realized that you had visited every corner of Aida.

daily19-xl-007.Content: After all, I'm the one who completely measured the oceanographic distribution on the surface of Aida.

daily19-xl-r-003.Content: That's so amazing, Shiro. You've contributed so much to all humans.

daily19-xl-008.Content: You... flattering would do you no good.

daily19-xl-009.Content: It doesn't make me happy, no way.

daily19-xl-012.Content: I wonder what Vera looks like now.

daily17-ag-002.Content: She's one of the Heirs of Aida, right?

daily17-ag-003.Content: If I remembered it right, she's even among the special ones there.

daily17-ag-004.Content: The name should be... Angel of Clemency?

daily17-ag-r-003.Content: Yes, Frigg is an Angel of Clemency.

daily17-ag-005.Content: What is she up to this time?

daily17-ag-006.Content: If you find her, please take me with you!

daily17-ag-007.Content: I'll definitely stop her, if she's really planning something wicked.

daily18-ag-001.Content: Whenever I see someone buried deep in suffering due to the Cataclysm.

daily18-ag-002.Content: I can't help but feel sadness inside me.

daily18-ag-003.Content: I once witnessed how a child exposed to radiation turned into an aberrant, little by little.

daily18-ag-004.Content: While her elder brother and I just watched, there was nothing we could do.

daily18-ag-005.Content: I put an end to that child with my own hands...

daily18-ag-r-003.Content: That must be a painful decision.

daily18-ag-008.Content: He collapsed to the ground, murmuring these words repeatedly.

daily18-ag-010.Content: His eyes when he kept saying that are still engraved in my mind.

daily18-ag-011.Content: Well... enough of the sad past. It's all my fault that we're talking about this.

daily18-ag-012.Content: I haven't seen him for quite a while, and I wonder how he's doing. If possible, I want to visit him.

daily18-ag-013.Content: By that time, hope he'll have put himself together and started a new life!

daily18-ag-014.Content: If he ever needs anything, I'll try my best to help!

daily18-ag-r-006.Content: When that time comes, let's visit him together.

daily17-mle-004.Content: That is... somehow embarrassing to say...

daily17-mle-r-004.Content: I'll go make some for you.

daily17-mle-r-005.Content: What flavors do you like, Meryl?

daily17-mle-005.Content: I want... want something cold and light...

daily17-mle-r-006.Content: Okay, I'll go make some right now.

daily18-mle-004.Content: Seems that it's summoning up energy...

daily18-mle-006.Content: Whenever we're heading for somewhere untraveled...

daily18-mle-r-007.Content: It's said that a spiritual blade takes after its master...

daily18-mle-r-008.Content: Could it be that Meryl is excited, too?

daily19-mle-r-001.Content: Are you talking about the battle today?

daily19-mle-r-002.Content: After all, Meryl's Frost Barrier stops anyone from escaping.

daily19-mle-r-005.Content: It's fine as long as we complete the mission.

daily18-xi-001.Content: You wonder how I would engage in combats in a new environment?

daily18-xi-002.Content: Well, I'll keep everything well-maintained, do my homework when I'm in a new environment and have the resources ready in case I need them.

daily18-xi-004.Content: And smash all the enemies with my hammer!

daily18-xi-006.Content: Why are you asking? Do we have missions somewhere new?

daily16-zero-001.Content: I have to admit, there is only one system that greets me with failure.

daily16-zero-r-001.Content: You are the IT genius who hacked Hykros' system...

daily16-zero-r-002.Content: What is the thing that greets you with failure...?

daily16-zero-002.Content: The emergency brake insurance system in the Tower of Fantasy.

daily16-zero-004.Content: The Tower of Fantasy most likely used a quantum encryption system upon its construction.

daily16-zero-005.Content: The system serves as the safety net for continuous Omnium reaction in the Tower of Fantasy.

daily16-zero-r-005.Content: What if the system fails or gets hacked?

daily16-zero-008.Content: So, when there is an error in the system, the Omnium reaction would continue without a break.

daily16-zero-r-008.Content: Promise me, never get your mind on that system, okay...?

daily16-zero-013.Content: I tried. But I totally gave up on the idea after noticing the function of the system, and how difficult hacking it would be.

daily16-zero-014.Content: The system generates random quantum keys nonstop.

daily16-zero-015.Content: Hacking that system would require a prophet, who knows the key before it's generated.

daily16-zero-016.Content: Without such a hacker, the system would run forever.

daily16-zero-r-009.Content: In order to utilize Omnium safely, people worked really hard.

daily16-zero-017.Content: Yes, that's the safest encryption I've ever seen.

daily16-zero-018.Content: No one would ever hack it, so rest assured.

daily17-zero-002.Content: I'm going through a key stage of the calculation.

daily17-zero-003.Content: I just got hungry for something sweet.

daily17-zero-r-002.Content: We don't have anything suitable now...

daily17-zero-006.Content: No? Then find some or make some...

daily17-zero-007.Content: All in all, I want it right now, right here, right away. Be quick.

daily18-zero-001.Content: How's the advancement with your ability points?

daily18-zero-004.Content: That's alright, I can get the information myself.

daily18-zero-005.Content: There's no electronic archive out of my reach, and your secrets are nothing in front of me.

daily18-zero-007.Content: Why didn't you change a bit?

daily18-zero-r-004.Content: I've been slacking off a bit...

daily18-zero-009.Content: Are you making fun of me?

daily18-zero-012.Content: Go improve your average ability points by 20 at least.

mes001-rabbit-002.Content: D-did you greet them? Lin always tells me that I should greet others immediately.

mes001-rabbit-003.Content: I don't really know other people...

mes001-rabbit-004.Content: Urgh, how should I put it... I will try my best to learn how to get along with you.

mes001-rabbit-005.Content: Oh, that's not right. I will definitely get along with you, but I need to learn how to...

mes001-rabbit-006.Content: ... Why does it come out wrong every time...

mes001-rabbit-r-004.Content: I understand what Ruby is saying.

mes001-rabbit-007.Content: Well, let's both give it our all.

mes002-rabbit-001.Content: Well, when I said hi last time, I don't think I asked.

mes002-rabbit-002.Content: What am I supposed to do...?

mes002-rabbit-r-001.Content: Ruby, what do you usually do?

mes002-rabbit-003.Content: Train, read picture books, and play with Dolly.

mes002-rabbit-ra-002.Content: Then you can continue living like this.

mes002-rabbit-005.Content: Ohhhh? It seems different from what I had in mind...

mes002-rabbit-006.Content: Well, I'll do what I usually do, but I'll try to coordinate with you more in battle.

mes002-rabbit-007.Content: Lin said this is called teamwork. That's why we need to help each other out and look out for each other.

mes002-rabbit-008.Content: I want to observe you more when you fight... Is that okay?

mes002-rabbit-009.Content: Like this, I should be able to coordinate with the fighting style you're used to...

mes002-rabbit-010.Content: Do they call this a Test Weapon...? Argh! I can't figure it out.

mes003-rabbit-001.Content: Right, Dolly, nice to meet you...

mes003-rabbit-r-001.Content: Is it the rabbit doll you hug all the time?

mes003-rabbit-003.Content: Dolly was a gift to me from a very, very important person.

mes003-rabbit-004.Content: She is also my only and best friend.

mes003-rabbit-005.Content: So... I need to introduce her to you.

mes003-rabbit-007.Content: Dolly said she was very happy to make a new friend.

mes003-rabbit-008.Content: Shall we play together if we get the chance?

mes003-rabbit-009.Content: But it's best if you don't go out so often... I'm not used to it.

mes004-rabbit-001.Content: You interact with a lot of people every day.

mes004-rabbit-002.Content: Many strangers. I'm not very used to it...

mes004-rabbit-003.Content: Oh, yes. I'm a little afraid of strangers...

mes004-rabbit-004.Content: I'm always alone because I'm always with Dolly.

mes004-rabbit-005.Content: I don't really get to meet other people, so... I guess I don't know how to deal with other people.

mes004-rabbit-r-002.Content: Is Ruby also afraid of me?

mes004-rabbit-006.Content: The first time we met, there was just a little. Just a little...

mes004-rabbit-008.Content: After all, I rarely deal with others and barely go out...

mes004-rabbit-009.Content: In fact, I've been thinking: "Is it appropriate to say this? Will you be mad at me if I say something wrong...?"

mes004-rabbit-010.Content: Okay, okay! That's what Dolly said too. She said I don't have to worry about it at all, so I only worried about it for a little while.

mes004-rabbit-011.Content: But Lin said I need to have more interaction with other people...

mes004-rabbit-012.Content: But the others aren't the same as you and Lin! I'm still... afraid of them.

mes004-rabbit-ra-004.Content: It's alright. Let's take it slowly.

mes004-rabbit-013.Content: Yes, yes... I should be brave...

mes005-rabbit-r-001.Content: The device that prevents people from aberrating.

mes005-rabbit-002.Content: Do all the people of Aesperia carry this?

mes005-rabbit-003.Content: It's because the ground is full of...? What's that?

mes005-rabbit-004.Content: Yes, well, we need to carry a suppressor because of the Omnium radiation. Something terrifying will happen if the suppressor is broken...

mes005-rabbit-005.Content: Without it, people would become aberrants, enemies of the people... They'll no longer be able to live with their family.

mes005-rabbit-007.Content: I didn't know this before... I have no idea what's been going on in the outside world.

mes005-rabbit-009.Content: That's why you must be careful in battles when you're adventuring. Never forget that!

mes005-rabbit-010.Content: I don't want to leave the people that are important to me again... I don't want to leave you.

mes006-rabbit-001.Content: Cetus Island is so beautiful! It looks like a fun place to play.

mes006-rabbit-002.Content: Hanna, Melo, Enfi... I now have their names memorized.

mes006-rabbit-r-001.Content: Did you make any new friends?

mes006-rabbit-004.Content: I just got to know everyone a little...

mes006-rabbit-ra-002.Content: You've taken the first step then.

mes006-rabbit-005.Content: Eh, I didn't think of that. Is that why we're going to Cetus Island?

mes006-rabbit-006.Content: Thank you! Thank you for everything you've done.

mes006-rabbit-007.Content: Cetus Island is very fun, and the smart servants are so cute. Ruby doesn't usually have this much fun.

mes006-rabbit-008.Content: Shall we go together next time? I think it'll be great to travel together once in a while.

mes006-rabbit-009.Content: Maybe Hanna and I will become friends next time! That's what Dolly told me.

mes006-rabbit-010.Content: Dolly's instincts are very accurate! Yes, that's right!

mes007-rabbit-001.Content: I had a scary nightmare... It should just be a nightmare, right?

mes007-rabbit-002.Content: I dreamed that you forget about us...

mes007-rabbit-003.Content: You forgot me, forgot Dolly, and forgot Lin... You forgot many, many people.

mes007-rabbit-004.Content: Then you... left. We couldn't move, so we could only watch as you became smaller in the distance until you disappeared...

mes007-rabbit-005.Content: After that, the world became dark... and it ended.

mes007-rabbit-006.Content: Although I know this is just a nightmare, I have never dreamed of these things, so I must confirm something...

mes007-rabbit-007.Content: I don't know why I had such a dream. In the past, I've also had dreams where I couldn't tell fact from fiction.

mes007-rabbit-008.Content: Something this scary can't be true... right?

mes007-rabbit-009.Content: Since I dreamed of these things... Does that mean I'm really afraid that these events will become real?

mes007-rabbit-010.Content: So... Don't forget us... Don't leave us... Don't turn the dream into reality, okay?

mes008-rabbit-r-001.Content: Why are you saying this suddenly?

mes008-rabbit-002.Content: I've been adventuring for a while now. Thank you for taking care of me all this time, so I really want to express my thanks.

mes008-rabbit-004.Content: I haven't really interacted with others like this... I also didn't talk to people very often.

mes008-rabbit-005.Content: But after I joined you, I feel like it isn't so hard to communicate with others.

mes008-rabbit-006.Content: It isn't such a bad thing to go out and about.

mes008-rabbit-007.Content: It must be because you're an easygoing person who is willing to listen to me and take me to all many places...

mes008-rabbit-008.Content: So you've given me just enough courage to face even more things and people from the outside.

mes008-rabbit-009.Content: It's because of your influence, @player_name, that I've changed like this.

mes008-rabbit-010.Content: So, please continue to take care of Dolly and me in the future.

mes009-rabbit-001.Content: I had a really amazing dream last night.

mes009-rabbit-002.Content: I dreamed that there was no more Omnium radiation in the world.

mes009-rabbit-003.Content: Everyone could take off the suppressors and live happily together.

mes009-rabbit-004.Content: After that, we went to Cetus Island together and played at all the amusement facilities.

mes009-rabbit-005.Content: Hanna gave me a balloon, which took me and Dolly up into the air...

mes009-rabbit-006.Content: After that, I looked down from really, really high up in the sky and saw everyone playing together happily.

mes009-rabbit-007.Content: Yes, @player_name was holding Dolly with me. We were flying together, and looking at everyone from a very very high place in the air.

mes009-rabbit-008.Content: The dream was so nice that I didn't really want to wake up...

mes009-rabbit-009.Content: Maybe what I saw in my dream will become real some day in the future.

mes009-rabbit-010.Content: I hope my dream will come true.

mes009-rabbit-011.Content: That's why everything we're doing now is meaningful...

mes009-rabbit-013.Content: I believe that day will certainly come.

mes010-rabbit-001.Content: What will the future be like...?

mes010-rabbit-002.Content: I don't think I've considered this question seriously before.

mes010-rabbit-003.Content: But I think I am starting to see the answer.

mes010-rabbit-004.Content: Together, we will go to more and more places and meet more people...

mes010-rabbit-005.Content: We may have our fair share of difficulties or trouble, but I believe everything will be fine with you here, @player_name.

mes010-rabbit-006.Content: Yes... I'm also looking forward to the future.

daily01-rabbit-001.Content: Story books told me about a magical potion. It has many, many flavors.

daily01-rabbit-002.Content: Hmm... It's "the flavor mixture of cherry pie, cream cake, pineapple, roast turkey, Taffy and hot cream bread."

daily01-rabbit-ra-001.Content: I might have heard about that...

daily01-rabbit-003.Content: More importantly, people will shrink very much in size if they drink it up. They will be tiny as those we see in telescopes.

daily01-rabbit-004.Content: So everyone turns into tiny little people like that, and runs here and there.

daily01-rabbit-rb-004.Content: That would be Lilliput in real life.

daily01-rabbit-005.Content: Let me think... If you become tiny, you might be even smaller than Dolly.

daily01-rabbit-006.Content: When I hold you in my arms, would you fall by accident...? I'm worried.

daily01-rabbit-r-005.Content: Then you are the one to protect me, Ruby.

daily01-rabbit-007.Content: Don't worry, leave it to me.

daily01-rabbit-008.Content: I'll take care of you and Dolly. I will hold you together when we go out, or put you in my hat.

daily01-rabbit-009.Content: And sleep... Let me think, I can expand Dolly's house, and you can move in.

daily01-rabbit-011.Content: Ah, if only that could actually happen.

daily02-rabbit-002.Content: I dreamed that... Dolly... ran away...

daily02-rabbit-003.Content: I know it's just a dream, and I saw Dolly beside me when I woke up. But I'm still very sad.

daily02-rabbit-r-003.Content: Why did you dream like that?

daily02-rabbit-004.Content: I don't know... Seems that Dolly thought I have grown up and doesn't need her anymore, so she ran away.

daily02-rabbit-005.Content: I never thought about anything like that... But older kids don't really seem to play with dolls.

daily02-rabbit-006-a.Content: If everyone does that, maybe I would do that, too.

daily02-rabbit-007-a.Content: But I don't want to lose Dolly. I want to stay with her forever and ever.

daily02-rabbit-009-b.Content: I see, I didn't know you are still playing with dolls.

daily02-rabbit-010-b.Content: You play with dolls even after you grow up, and people don't think that's strange? Is that true?

daily02-rabbit-r-006.Content: That is just normal, and we don't need to care about others' ideas.

daily02-rabbit-011.Content: Hm? Um, that should be true. I don't know...

daily02-rabbit-012.Content: Actually, I don't care about what others think. But why do they stop playing with dolls, if they liked it before?

daily02-rabbit-013.Content: Will I change like that? I have no idea... I'm even a little afraid of growing up.

daily02-rabbit-014.Content: But as for me, I will like Dolly forever and ever. Dolly is a friend I can't say goodbye to... I hope... I won't change.

daily02-rabbit-015.Content: That makes me feel much better. Thank you.

daily03-rabbit-001.Content: Spark seems to be really happy today.

daily03-rabbit-002.Content: Let me ask Spark about it... Hmm... He said that he's getting better in cooperation with you!

daily03-rabbit-003.Content: In the future, even faced with more and more troublesome situations, you will be okay!

daily03-rabbit-005.Content: I'm serious! I will try very hard, and will not be your burden.

daily03-rabbit-006.Content: In the future days... I'm counting on you!

daily03-rabbit-007.Content: If we work together, we can do anything!

daily03-rabbit-008.Content: Dolly said the same thing, so I believe that, it will come true.

daily03-rabbit-009.Content: That should be my line, and I'm looking forward to that.

daily04-rabbit-001.Content: So how can we make deep-fried tofu... I want to know, so badly.

daily04-rabbit-002.Content: Um... maybe not that much. Deep-fried tofu is Lin's favorite, so I want to learn and try making it.

daily04-rabbit-003.Content: Dolly and I like fruit cake the most, but again, we don't know how to make that.

daily04-rabbit-004.Content: Oh, I don't know about other dishes, either...

daily04-rabbit-005.Content: So you just throw the ingredients in like that, and boom, the dish is cooked nice and fresh?

daily04-rabbit-006.Content: Wow, the cooker is impressive. Maybe I should set the cooker as my next goal and learn from it!

daily04-rabbit-007.Content: Trying making deep-fried tofu... fruit cake... What is your favorite food? I want to try that, too.

daily05-rabbit-002.Content: It's an unhappy nightmare... And I'm still kinda afraid now.

daily05-rabbit-r-001.Content: Want to tell me about it?

daily05-rabbit-003.Content: Hmm... Actually, I can't really remember.

daily05-rabbit-004.Content: But I have a feeling of "Something terrible just happened! So don't recall it no matter what!"

daily05-rabbit-005.Content: A strong feeling like that... So I'm so worried now... Should I try to recall it or not...?

daily05-rabbit-r-003.Content: But that's only a nightmare, so why don't we just leave it like that?

daily05-rabbit-007.Content: I did mix up dreams and realities before, that happened...

daily05-rabbit-008.Content: Then I mistook what I had done for a dream, and did it all over again.

daily05-rabbit-009.Content: So I think that maybe I should note everything down in my dream, so that I won't mix up dreams and realities again.

daily05-rabbit-r-004.Content: If needed, I will remind Ruby, okay?

daily06-rabbit-001.Content: I want... a pet animal or something like that.

daily06-rabbit-002.Content: Ah, I don't really know. I have only seen those fluffy animal pictures in books.

daily06-rabbit-004.Content: But I want a sheep the most.

daily06-rabbit-005.Content: Because the main character in the storybook really loves his electronic sheep...

daily06-rabbit-006.Content: And when the electronic sheep got broken, the main character was sad. So was me...

daily06-rabbit-007.Content: Besides, he has never seen a real sheep. Guess they can't ever find a living sheep that actually jumps around in that world.

daily06-rabbit-008.Content: That's probably the reason why I want a real sheep.

daily06-rabbit-009.Content: That should be a tiny little sheep, living in a small cardboard box. Guess it doesn't eat too much grass.

daily06-rabbit-010.Content: It's white and fluffy and feels like a cloud if I hold it in my arms.

daily07-rabbit-001.Content: If you have time, what about playing together?

daily07-rabbit-002.Content: Look at all the sand on the ground, let's build a sandcastle over there.

daily07-rabbit-rb-003.Content: The ground is not a safe place to be.

daily07-rabbit-003.Content: Ah, is that so... Guess I'd better stay here then...

daily07-rabbit-004.Content: I hear about other kids building sandcastles by the sea, so I want to try, too...

daily07-rabbit-005.Content: That shouldn't be too different from building blocks, right? Just that we have so many and countless building blocks made with sand.

daily07-rabbit-006.Content: We can build a big big house, where we can actually live.

daily07-rabbit-007.Content: Oh, and a little garden for Dolly, too... She loves watering roses.

daily07-rabbit-008.Content: Mmhm... So, build sandcastles with me... Remember that, will you?

daily08-rabbit-002.Content: Ah... I think that sounds cool, so I'm just trying to say that line.

daily08-rabbit-003.Content: The character in the books said that.

daily08-rabbit-004.Content: When stepping forward to protect his friends, he said those words.

daily08-rabbit-005.Content: I want to be a knight like him, and I want to protect my friends, too.

daily08-rabbit-006.Content: Of course, that's more than lip service. I hope to be someone truly outstanding and reliable, just like you and Lin.

daily08-rabbit-007.Content: Benevolence, wisdom, generosity, honor, and valor...

daily08-rabbit-008.Content: I hope to achieve all of those, even though I'm still far away...

daily08-rabbit-009.Content: Well... Mmhm... I'll be stepping forward towards my goal.

daily09-rabbit-001.Content: After I started traveling with you, I have known other friends...

daily09-rabbit-002.Content: The guy who likes performing little tricks, the lady who cares a lot about me, or the other lady who doesn't say much, but is very strong...

daily09-rabbit-ra-001.Content: How did Ruby get along with them?

daily09-rabbit-003.Content: I-I didn't really talk to them... I just watched them in the distance...

daily09-rabbit-004.Content: But the guy who likes performing tricks would invite me to stand closer and watch him, and one of the ladies would walk by and cuddle me like a big sister...

daily09-rabbit-005.Content: Oh, there's another girl who is fond of pranks... I saw her pulling a prank in the distance, and she told me to keep it secret.

daily09-rabbit-006.Content: Everyone is so nice here. I like this place.

daily09-rabbit-007.Content: Really? Lin would think the same.

daily09-rabbit-008.Content: Well, I haven't known anyone other than Lin till now... Lin said that's not right, that I should talk to other people.

daily09-rabbit-009.Content: If Lin sees me now, she'll be... Hmm, a little bit happier, I guess.

daily09-rabbit-010.Content: I hope the prototype Ruby could live a life like me, knowing more people and seeing more beautiful views.

daily10-rabbit-001.Content: Sometimes I'll be thinking... Are you my family? Or a friend?

daily10-rabbit-003-a.Content: Another family member of mine... I will cherish that.

daily10-rabbit-004-b.Content: So you are... my second friend...

daily10-rabbit-005-b.Content: But you're different from Dolly, so you should be my first... human friend? Real friend?

daily10-rabbit-006-b.Content: Hmm... both sound a bit weird...

daily10-rabbit-007.Content: To be honest, I was worried for a moment. I was afraid to hear "neither"...

daily10-rabbit-008.Content: I won't know what to do if that happens...

daily10-rabbit-009.Content: Because you're very important to me, too.
